description.hltext_display: 하종� 현대그룹 사장 "佛은행 대출, 브릿지� 맞다"(상보)
description.content:
[이데일리 안재만 기자] 하종선 현대그룹(현대상선(011200)) 전략기획본부 사장은 프랑스 나티시스 은행으로부터 빌린 1조2000억원이 브릿지론이라고 확인했다.
하 사장은 22일 서울 서초구 중앙지방법원에서 열린 `양해각서(MOU) 해지 금지 가처분 신청` 첫 심리가 끝난 뒤 기자들과 만나 "나티시스은행에서 빌린 1조2000억원은 일각의 예상대로 브릿지론이 맞다"면서 "브릿지론은 해외 대형 M&A에서 일반적으로 나타나는 형태"라고 밝혔다.
브릿지론은 일시적으로 자금을 연결하는 다리(Bridge)가 되는 대출(Loan)을 뜻한다. 추후 유상증자를 통해 2조원을 조달하기로 계획을 세우고, 이에 앞서 채권단으로부터 자금 조달 능력을 인정받기 위해 브릿지론을 받은 것으로 추정된다.
앞서 현대그룹은 현대상선 프랑스법인의 예금 1조2000억원이 대출금인지 여부, 어떤 조건으로 대출했는지 여부에 대해 여러 의혹을 받아왔다. 현대그룹은 끝내 대출계약서 제출을 거부하면서 MOU가 해지되는 사태를 맞았고, 이후 프랑스법인을 통해 국제적투자자들로부터 2조원 규모의 유상증자를 추진하겠다는 입장을 밝힌 바 있다.
하 사장은 "대출금과 함께 넥스젠 등 유럽계 투자자, 중동 및 미국 투자자로부터 2조원을 조달하는 방안을 마련 중"이라며 "애초에 현대상선 프랑스법인을 특수목적회사(SPC)로 쓰기 위해 컨소시엄에 참여시켰던 것"이라고 설명했다.
이에 앞서 현대그룹측 변호인은 심리에서 "나티시스은행과 넥스젠은 처음부터 현대건설 인수전에 함께 나설 생각이었다"면서 "다만 연대보증에 대한 부담 때문에 대출 방식으로 변경한 것이며, 보증이나 담보는 절대 없다"고 강조했다.
현대그룹은 또 본안소송에서 대출계약서를 제출하기로 약속했다. 대리인은 "나티시스은행과 협의를 맺고 대출계약서를 제출하도록 할 것"이라고 말했다.
한편 현대그룹은 이날 열린 첫 신문기일에서 `MOU 해지 및 SPA계약 거부의 불법성`, `대출계약서 제출 요구 부당` 등을 집중적으로 문제 제기했다. 재판부는 24일 오후 2시 358호 법정에서 심문기일을 한 차례 더 열기로 했다.
▶ 관련기사 ◀
＜ⓒ종합 경제정보 미디어 이데일리 - 무단전재&재배포 금지＞

description.hltext_display: 新媒体大战 《非诚勿扰》栏目视频靠什么领跑
description.content: 新媒体收视率大战 “数字电视才代表未来，电脑将会卷土重来，取得最后的胜利。电脑即电视。”这是16年前MIT教授尼葛洛庞帝在他那本畅销全世界的著作《数字化生存》中提出的预言。但观今日，我们早已深陷数字化生存的时代。曾经担忧视频网站抢夺电视收视率的广电大军们，也已借着三网融合的大好局势，纷纷“试水”网络电视，点燃了新媒体市场收视率大战的硝烟。作为全国广电媒体的排头兵，江苏卫视的新媒体战略也是意在领跑。江苏卫视手握《非诚勿扰》这样夺人眼球的内容王牌，借助国内先进的的CDN网络加速平台提升用户体验，积极抢占网络收视高地。 尼葛洛庞帝的著作刚在中国流行的时候，全国的广电媒体也许还没感觉到数字化生存的危机。但当网络视频用户规模将达3.88亿的时候，广电军团们都坐不住了。三网融合的大门一开，广电系应声而入网络电视市场，把电视领域的收视争夺战线延长到了网络上。地方卫视领头雁――江苏卫视今年全力打造的江苏网络电视台，凭借鲜明的品牌定位和内容特色，借助领先的流媒体播放和加速技术，在这场网络电视跑马圈地战中异军突起，把“幸福中国”的牌打得有声有色。 2010年的中国电视圈，江苏卫视尤为抢眼。从年初高调发布“幸福中国”的新定位，到《非诚勿扰》以全年广告标底4亿身价成全国综艺节目之最，江苏卫视收视率一路飘“红”。为了迎合网络媒体和受众特点，应运而生的江苏网络电视台依托电视台的资源和品牌优势，打出了“视听互动”牌。王牌栏目《非诚勿扰》的官网，每日视频点击逾万。然而面对每日如此巨大的流量，江苏网络电视台的视频播放却依然清晰、流畅，保持了极好的用户体验和评价。对此，江苏卫视新媒体技术负责人透露，这背后离不开一支来自网宿科技的专业网络加速团队。 优势内容更需强势技术支持 “江苏网络电视台对该领域的技术发展趋势有着极好的洞察力，在新技术的应用方面尝试的意愿也比较强烈。这给我们提供了一个极好的平台，让网宿科技的技术能力在这里得到了充分的展现。”网宿科技副总裁刘洪涛表示。 江苏网络电视台技术部负责人肖强告诉记者，优势的内容更需要优势的技术支持。江苏网络电视台一切技术措施都是从用户体验出发，这是新媒体竞争的需要。为了给网民带来更清晰、更流畅的视听体验，在直播技术上采用了全球领先的微软Silverlight流媒体技术，同时选择与国内领先的CDN服务商网宿科技合作为直播视频进行加速。 据悉，针对江苏网络电视台的实际需求，网宿科技为其专门定制了个性化的流媒体加速解决方案。通过独有的流媒体加速、智能负载均衡系统、防盗链等技术有效保证了网络视频播放的流畅性、安全性，并能轻松应对突发流量。此外，鉴于江苏网络电视台流媒体播放采用的微软Silverlight技术，网宿科技还专门与微软和江苏网络电视台的技术团队进行多次探讨和深入的技术研发，设计出了更适合这种新流媒体播放平台的CDN加速解决方案。 根据网宿科技监测平台数据统计显示，在采用了网宿科技的CDN加速服务后，江苏网络电视台《非诚勿扰》栏目视频访问速度提高超过1倍，访问可用性能接近100%。 [编辑: 王好] 分享: 【 大 中 小 】【 rss订阅 】【 打印 】【 关闭 】 近日热点 市场预期年内或再加息 各大银行提前还贷潮涌现 2010 12/20 06:56 "年终工作总结"愁煞上班族 恶搞版网上疯传 2010 12/21 14:46 媒体称明起汽柴油每吨分别上调310元300元 2010 12/21 17:31 白领该去哪打拼 中国未来5大"聚宝地"(图) 2010 12/21 14:26 银行收费项目太多? 教你做"逃费达人" 2010 12/21 14:09 月供3000元 中年教师家庭如何过上无忧生活 2010 12/20 15:17 济南推出奢华圣诞大餐10万一桌 吃的不是饭 2010 12/20 15:41 80后硕士生回收废品 毕业前买车买房揽女友 2010 12/21 14:19 李宁进军体育地产受挫 市值一天内缩水30亿 2010 12/21 14:26 最牛购房者出书 与开发商死扛三年获赔(图) 2010 12/20 15:43

description.hltext_display: Turn Your House Into A Lovely Home
description.content:
We all want to live in a fully furnished beautiful place. An abode where we can have peace of mind, spend quality time with the family, and won't be ashamed to welcome our friends and guests. In short, we want our house to be called a home. So we typically improve its appearance by using modern furniture, wall arts, and adding decorations inside and out.
Some of the most fascinating addition to our home are plants and flowers. They not only add beauty to our surroundings but they can also give us fresh air and help save Mother Nature. Today, a backyard garden is no longer necessary just to add a greenery outside our home. Though our gardening giftswill never go to waste because there are already a lot of ways on how we can grow plants inside and out of our homes.
1. Hanging baskets. They can be fascinating decorations on our porch, patio, or any other outdoor spaces. Put cascading plants on hanging baskets and they will definitely make your home more charming and attractive.
2. Window Box. Accentuate your windows with colorful flowers by placing them in a window box. There are different styles of window boxes that you can use to perfectly match the color or design of your house. You may use metal, PVC, fiberglass, or hay rack. Using any of them will definitely add pizazz to your windows.
3. Planter Box. Bring the charm and aroma of your flowers inside your home by placing them in planter box. Even your herbs can be brought in too. With the wide selection of planter boxes today, it will not be hard for you to choose which fits in your interior or exterior decorations at home.
With the variety of gardening ideas today, it is up to your creativity to use them and make your house turn into a beautiful and lovely home. You can look for designs of home decorations using hanging baskets, window boxes, or planter boxes on the internet and follow their patterns. You can even follow the designs of luxurious hotels even if you do not use expensive materials. Just mix and match the various resources that you can afford and you will achieve the beautiful home that you have in mind.

description.hltext_display: 예금금리를 각각 0.25%p 높은 5.56%, 2.5%로 인상했다. 지난달 중국의 소비자물가가 � �년 동월대비 5.1% 상승, 28개월 내 가장 높은 수준을 보이며 추가 인상 가능성도 높아지� 있다. 지난 주 인민
description.content:
[금리인상 시 내년 추가 약세 보일 것…인플레 막는다면 호재될 수도]
중국 채권이 금리인상 우려로 인해 올해 아시아에서 가장 저조한 투자 성적을 기록한 것으로 나타났다.
22일 블룸버그 통신에 따르면 위안화 표시 중국 국채는 올해 투자자들에게 1.7%의 수익률을 제공하며 아시아 10개국(일본 제외) 채권 가격을 추종하는 HSBC 홀딩스 지수 중 가장 낮은 성적을 냈다.
반면 초저금리 정책이 지속되고 있는 인도네시아는 19% 오르며 아시아 국채 평균 투자 수익률을 끌어 올렸다.
중국 국채 10년물 금리는 9월 이후 50bp 오르며 2007년 6월 이후 가장 큰 분기 상승세를 기록했다. 중국 국채의 약세는 인민은행이 인플레이션을 막기 위해 금리 인상을 더 공격적으로 진행할 것이라는 우려 때문으로 풀이된다.
인민은행은 지난 10월 19일 기준금리인 1년 물 대출금리와 예금금리를 각각 0.25%p 높은 5.56%, 2.5%로 인상했다.
지난달 중국의 소비자물가가 전년 동월대비 5.1% 상승, 28개월 내 가장 높은 수준을 보이며 추가 인상 가능성도 높아지고 있다. 지난 주 인민은행은 국민들의 생활 안정화를 위해 물가가 `긴급하게` 안정화 될 필요가 있다고 강조하며 추가 금리 인상 가능성을 시사했다.
전문가들은 내년 1~2%p의 추가 금리 인상을 전망하고 있다.
소시에떼제네랄은 인민은행이 향후 1년간 기준금리를 1%p 인상하며 현재 3.38% 수준인 10년 물 국채 금리가 4.75%까지 갈 것이라 전망했다. 궈 차오민 공상은행 채권 애널리스트는 10년물 국채 금리가 내년 4.5%를 넘어설 것이라 예상했다.
동남아 최대 은행 DBS 그룹과 타오 동 크레디트스위스 수석이코노미스트는 내년 인상폭을 각각 1.25%p, 2%p로 내다봤다.
소시에떼제네랄의 로버트 레일리 아시아 채권 공동 대표는 "인플레 우려와 금리 인상설에 채권 시장이 약세를 보이고 있다"며 금리가 워낙 낮은 수준이기 때문에 오를 수밖에 없다고 설명했다.
한편 중국 최대 증권사 씨틱증권은 내년 금리 인상으로 인플레 우려가 수그러들 경우 채권 시장에 오히려 약이 될 수 있다고 주장했다.
후 한규 씨틱증권 채권 애널리스트는 "상반기 금리가 인상된다 할지라도 내년 전체적으로 봤을 때 채권 시장이 반드시 약세를 보이리라고는 할 수 없다"며 "내년 상반기 2~3차례 금리 인상으로 10년 물 금리가 6월 4.2%까지 오른다 할지라도 하반기 3.8%까지 하락할 수 있다"고 전망했다.
채권 가격은 금리와 반대로 움직이며, 인플레 상승은 채권 가격 하락으로 이어진다.
[권다희기자 dawn27@]

description.hltext_display: Get crow away from your home
description.content:
Crows are sleek black in color, inquisitive dark eyes and a loping gait. They got the intelligence level that far outreaches that of their lighter colored winged brethren. The black bringers of doom, crows and their worse but equally problematic cousins the ravens, are causing a pain in the neck for many a person. Crow scares, crow decoys, raven repellents, raven traps and crow traps fail to work, almost always, and the headache causing crow sound and raven sound is beginning to become a health concern for many Australians.
The most unfortunate things about these birds are that they are black and are associated with evil, doom and death. They seem to be at all the places where death or doom or bad luck has happened or is about to happen. In fact even our ancestors use to try their best to get rid of crows and get rid of ravens using the best possible crow control from their times because they also knew that these pesky non-vegetarian birds are the first signal of death, doom and bad luck.
Unfortunately for many crows and ravens are very intelligent birds. It is said that if a crow or a raven sees you putting in crow traps / raven traps in your house or farm, they will tell the others and even work their way around the traps! These pesky birds love to feed on some of the berries in the farm or eat up farmers sun dried tomatoes or leave their excreta in every jar of pickle and preserve left to dry out in the sun. Not only do they do that, they tend to harm the crops and because they are non-vegetarian, they even harm small animals like new born sheep / lambs and chickens and invariably eat them up as well.
And it is not just farms that want to implement some form of crow control; many an Australian household wants to get rid of crows and ravens as well. So many Australians complain that when they wake up early morning for a stroll on the pavement or a walk in the garden, the extremely loud crow sound and raven sound is difficult to bear. On top of that crow and raven excreta smells all over the place with dead bones of animals and fish lying strewn about and that, like anybody would say, is not the best way to start a morning.
If you are planning to get rid of crows consider various options. First you must understand the crows are not evil, and they are not intentionally trying to torture you. They are only being crows, trying to live their lives and trying to feed their families. Actual property devastation is one thing that might need action, but just being irritating is something else. Try to be grateful for the crows for the interesting birds they are. If you get over that barrier, the frustrating habits (you suppose) become much less annoying. They do many things that may be annoy you, but love them and be willing to overlook (most) of the annoying things because the relationship is primarily affirmative on the whole. Or get the humane way to crow control, which will not only drag the crows and ravens away but also assured your humanity to stand still and also long lasting deterrent for crows. To get more on getting the crows away do visit.

description.hltext_display: 市场飞速发展 香港人民币债券市场活力迸发
description.content: 王宇 财政部12月14日宣布，其在香港面向个人投资者发行的30亿元人民币国债超额完成认购，加上之前面向机构投资者成功发行的50亿元人民币国债，仅2010年人民币国债在香港发行80亿元。 财政部透露，香港个人投资者积极参与，认购申请超过25000份，认购总金额达到71.2亿元，认购倍数为2.37倍。这似乎预示着香港人民币债券市场正迎来新的春天。 香港债券市场在亚洲金融危机之后快速发展，同时为更好发挥国际金融中心的融资功能，香港人民币债券离岸市场发展与建设近年备受瞩目。 2007年内地首次规定境内金融机构经批准可在香港发行人民币债券，并发布《境内金融机构赴香港特别行政区发行人民币债券管理暂行办法》，香港人民币债券市场正式推出。同年6月，国家开发银行在香港发行第一笔人民币债券。香港人民币债券市场的推出，扩大了香港银行人民币资产范围，为香港金融市场增加了新的投资工具，亦为人民币回流内地增加了新渠道。 随着香港人民币债券市场飞速发展，特征也更加鲜明。 一是发行规模逐年攀高。 二是发行主体不断丰富。由最初的内地金融机构，后到财政部、香港银行在内地的附属公司，今年更扩大到内地红筹公司、港资企业、跨国公司和国际金融机构。 三是发行成本具有优势，期限结构不断完善。在香港发行人民币债券的发行利率不断创出新低。如亚洲开发银行发行的人民币债券，票面利率2.85%，比中国内地政府债券的收益率低了大约57个基点。 四是期限结构不断完善，以前香港人民币债券都是3到5年期限，这次亚行发行了10年期人民币债券，拉长了期限结构，有助于香港人民币债券收益率曲线的不断完善。 五是人民币债券今年首次进入香港交易所上市交易。由亚洲开发银行发行的首批12亿元人民币国际债券成为第一只在港上市交易、并用人民币报价的人民币产品。 近年来香港人民币债券市场规模不断创新高，首先是政策制度的放宽和简化激励了发行效率和发展空间，二是市场需求直接推动市场规模筑高。发展香港的人民币债券市场不仅有助于吸引更多的机构到香港发债筹资，巩固香港的国际金融中心地位，完善金融基础设施建设，又可扩大在港人民币业务，使香港发挥人民币离岸中心功能。而且可以促进内地与香港两个市场的协同发展，实现“互利互促”和“一体共赢”，引导境外资本进入内地，为内地的经济建设提供融资服务，还有助于推进人民币国际化和利率市场化进程，有助于推动统一的亚洲债券市场的发展，增强我国在亚洲债券市场统一进程中的话语权。 随着香港人民币规模的扩大，境外人民币将会通过香港这个国际金融中心进行人民币产品投资。而随着香港政府激励政策的出台和相关基础设施的完善，未来人民币债券的投资需求将更加旺盛，可以预见，随着人民币国际化进程的加快，香港人民币债券市场在未来几年将会保持持续增长势头。 [编辑: 王好] 分享: 【 大 中 小 】【 rss订阅 】【 打印 】【 关闭 】 近日热点 市场预期年内或再加息 各大银行提前还贷潮涌现 2010 12/20 06:56 "年终工作总结"愁煞上班族 恶搞版网上疯传 2010 12/21 14:46 媒体称明起汽柴油每吨分别上调310元300元 2010 12/21 17:31 白领该去哪打拼 中国未来5大"聚宝地"(图) 2010 12/21 14:26 银行收费项目太多? 教你做"逃费达人" 2010 12/21 14:09 月供3000元 中年教师家庭如何过上无忧生活 2010 12/20 15:17 济南推出奢华圣诞大餐10万一桌 吃的不是饭 2010 12/20 15:41 80后硕士生回收废品 毕业前买车买房揽女友 2010 12/21 14:19 李宁进军体育地产受挫 市值一天内缩水30亿 2010 12/21 14:26 最牛购房者出书 与开发商死扛三年获赔(图) 2010 12/20 15:43

description.hltext_display: Mechtronic Solutions Takeover Completed
description.content:
National Technical Systems of California has completed acquisition of Mechtronic Solutions Inc., increasing its defense and aerospace business.
MSI, a privately held engineering services firm with headquarters in New Mexico, has annual revenues of about $7.5 million and an extensive customer base in the aerospace and defense industries.
The company is developing several airborne sensor systems for deployment on both manned aircraft and unmanned aircraft systems. Sensor systems designed and built by MSI have been deployed globally.
National Technical Systems said that under the leadership of its current management, MSI will continue to operate from its facilities in Albuquerque.
Terms of the transaction weren't disclosed.
"The addition of MSI to the NTS family significantly advances our full-service integrated engineering services capabilities and provides us with additional established customers in the aerospace and defense industries," NTS President and Chief Executive Officer William C. McGinnis said. "We now offer full product life-cycle support for a broad range of our customers' product engineering requirements, making NTS a true single-source solution.

event_or_fact.property: The addition of MSI to the NTS family significantly advances our full-service integrated engineering services capabilities and provides us with additional established customers in the aerospace and defense industries
President and Chief Executive Officer, National Technical Systems

description.hltext_display: 加息通胀预期下 中行专家建议存短期弃债券基金
description.content: 针对市民加息通胀预期下的理财困惑，昨日中行江汉支行理财师给出了应对建议。 定期存款：勿盲目转存，宜短期，以灵活应变 银行人士表示，市民应根据自己存款期限以及存入时间仔细计算，不要盲目提前支取转存，以免得不偿失。若定期期限定长了，加息后再提前支取转存，则转存之前存款均按活期计息，可存短期，待加息后再逐步将期限定长，以享较高利率。 基金：弃债券型基金，选偏股基金、货币型基金 进入加息通道后，债券型基金失宠，对于已经持有债券型基金的投资者应区分对待，短期持有的影响不大，长期持有的就应该慎重考虑转向。为避免负利率带来的资产贬值，可通过投资来抵抗通胀侵蚀，偏股基金眼下还是主要的投资选择。 此外，加息对货币市场而言是长期明确的利好，中长期将抬高货币基金的收益，稳健型的投资者可以适当介入。 理财产品：抗加息的理财产品 近期各家大量推出七天、十几天、一个月、三个月等超短期的人民币理财产品，产品的期限越来越短。之所以此类超短期人民币理财产品受到投资者青睐，主要还是在人民币有加息可能的情况下，短期产品有利于及时调整投资策略。 中行人士建议，投资者在选择能够联动加息的理财产品的时，要关注产品的诸多要求,如：投资门槛、起点金额、投资期限、预期收益率、流动性，自身的风险偏好，以及风险承受能力。 [编辑: 王好] 分享: 【 大 中 小 】【 rss订阅 】【 打印 】【 关闭 】 近日热点 市场预期年内或再加息 各大银行提前还贷潮涌现 2010 12/20 06:56 "年终工作总结"愁煞上班族 恶搞版网上疯传 2010 12/21 14:46 媒体称明起汽柴油每吨分别上调310元300元 2010 12/21 17:31 白领该去哪打拼 中国未来5大"聚宝地"(图) 2010 12/21 14:26 银行收费项目太多? 教你做"逃费达人" 2010 12/21 14:09 月供3000元 中年教师家庭如何过上无忧生活 2010 12/20 15:17 济南推出奢华圣诞大餐10万一桌 吃的不是饭 2010 12/20 15:41 80后硕士生回收废品 毕业前买车买房揽女友 2010 12/21 14:19 李宁进军体育地产受挫 市值一天内缩水30亿 2010 12/21 14:26 最牛购房者出书 与开发商死扛三年获赔(图) 2010 12/20 15:43

description.hltext_display: UBS streicht 'Short Term Buy' für UPM Kymmene - weiter 'Neutral'
description.content:
Die UBS hat die "Short Term Buy"-Empfehlung für UPM Kymmene nach der angekündigten Übernahme von Myllykoski gestrichen und die Einstufung auf "Neutral" mit einem Kursziel von 12,70 Euro belassen. Die Akquisition sei zwar ein wichtiger strategischer Schritt, doch reiche er nicht aus, um die strukturellen Überkapazitäten in der Papierindustrie abzubauen, schrieb Analyst Myles Allsop in einer Branchenstudie vom Mittwoch. Dazu wäre eine stärkere Sektorkonsolidierung notwendig, die derzeit kaum vorhersehbar sei. Zudem gebe es auch Nachfrage- und Wechselkursrisiken.
AFA0004 2010-12-22/09:32

description.hltext_display: Choose the Right Garden Shed Plans for Your Gardening Needs
description.content: Running out of storage space is not rare. Finding a spot to store all the extra non-casual stuff takes more storage space. Use of the garage, attic or basement is common when storing spare things. As a family grows and has more activities and holidays, that space will fill rapidly. Older houses may just have the garage which may not allow space for additional storage. Your garage may be a shop if you are a car enthusiast or woodworking is a hobby. If there is no space in the garage for other storage, what could you do?Purchasing a portable building would be a option to accessing more storage room. The assorted sizes and styles of portable sheds can be seen at your local big box retail stores. Purchasing direct from a manufacturer of portable storage is also possible. Manufacturers and retail shops both will have storage sheds available on their websites where you can look at sizes, styles and floor plans. If you have fencing around your house, it may be needed to take that down when having the portable building delivered.Another choice is you can borrow an offsite storage place too. This way can be an expense that you may not want each month. Every time you have a need or desire to get some thing out of storage, the offsite way can be a troublesome. Certain hours and days may be allotted to enter in your storage unit. offsite storage won't be commodious if you have items in there you may need on a more frequent basis unlike holiday decorations.If these two alternatives are good for you, what other ways can you solve your storage problem? Construct your own storage shed! The garden shed plans available on the internet for building your own storage are numerous. There are books at retailstores and libraries too. A search on the internet will find you so many options for storage shed plans you may have a hard time choosing which one you want! Building plans for anything, even storage sheds, are available in easy to comprehend instructions. Select a source that offers pictures or diagrams as well as text.Once you have found the how-to guide material that has the garden shed plans you like, then you can design where you want it built and start shopping for the stuffs required. Complete plans for building a shed will include a list of materials required. How many wood boards, what type of boards and other stuffs needed should be included in the plans you selected. Before starting your project, make sure you have the nails and any other things that may be required. Will your storage shed require hardware such as nails or hinges?

description.hltext_display: 资深银行家:香港人民币债券发行量明年或增一倍
description.content: 香港--某资深银行家表示，人民币债券作为香港当前最大的金融热点之一，其市场规模将随著借款方资金渠道的拓展和人民币升值预期下投资者需求的猛增而轻松扩容一倍。 今年2月份，中国大陆开始允许境外注册公司发行人民币债券，掀起了“点心债券”的发行热潮。据Dealogic数据显示，这之后有14家公司先后发行人民币债券，共融资人民币324.8亿元(合50.8亿美元)，较2009年的23.4亿美元扩大一倍以上。 相比中国大陆债券市场，香港的离岸人民币债券市场依然很小。Dealogic数据称，中国大陆今年以来的人民币债券发行总额高达1,636.5亿美元。但UBSGlobalCapitalMarkets的董事总经理PaulAu指出，香港人民币债券市场的发行方正在蓄势待发，明年香港的人民币债券发行规模有望轻松扩大一倍。这就意味著，到2011年底，香港市场“点心债券”的发行总额有望升至100亿美元。 Au向道琼斯通讯社(DowJonesNewswires)表示，明年区域内和区域外不同行业的机构将发行大量的人民币债券；这些机构要么有真实的人民币需求，要么希望实现融资渠道多样化。 自从6月份中国大陆宣布将增强人民币汇率弹性以来，投资者对人民币资产的需求就一直升温。人民币兑美元今年至今的升值幅度达到2.4%。而中国大陆近期允许境外银行和企业购买人民币并鼓励使用人民币结算跨境贸易，也进一步刺激了人民币存款的增长。香港10月份人民币存款较2009年末增加了2.5倍，至人民币2,171亿元。 Au表示，人民币债券的发行方呈现多元化趋势，发行方的信用结构更加复杂；起初发行此类债券的是信用质量较高的准主权机构，例如红筹公司和公用事业公司，但目前由房地产开发商和博彩公司发行的未经评级的债券也开始出现。 Au说，计划在离岸人民币市场发行债券的公司来自不同行业。今年9月份，俄罗斯铝业联合公司(UnitedCo.RusalPLC,0486.HK,简称：俄铝)宣布正考虑发行人民币债券，而近期卡特彼勒公司(CaterpillarInc.,CAT)和麦当劳(McDonald'sCo.,MCD)也发行了人民币债券，这显示出非金融行业正在进入香港人民币债券市场。 鉴于企业将人民币资金汇入中国大陆需要中国国家外汇管理局的批准，人民币债券发行方可能无法立即将发行所得用于中国大陆的项目。 Au表示，客户经常询问能否把他们的资金汇回中国大陆，这个问题不太容易回答。 Au称，有些企业发行人民币债券是为了减少对美元债券及债务工具市场的依赖，这样他们不必担心外汇风险。 他补充说，这些企业与对手方签订互换协议，把人民币资金换成其他货币。 但Au也指出，人民币互换市场还不成熟，交易对手少，交易量也不大。 [编辑: 王好] 分享: 【 大 中 小 】【 rss订阅 】【 打印 】【 关闭 】 近日热点 市场预期年内或再加息 各大银行提前还贷潮涌现 2010 12/20 06:56 "年终工作总结"愁煞上班族 恶搞版网上疯传 2010 12/21 14:46 媒体称明起汽柴油每吨分别上调310元300元 2010 12/21 17:31 白领该去哪打拼 中国未来5大"聚宝地"(图) 2010 12/21 14:26 银行收费项目太多? 教你做"逃费达人" 2010 12/21 14:09 月供3000元 中年教师家庭如何过上无忧生活 2010 12/20 15:17 济南推出奢华圣诞大餐10万一桌 吃的不是饭 2010 12/20 15:41 80后硕士生回收废品 毕业前买车买房揽女友 2010 12/21 14:19 李宁进军体育地产受挫 市值一天内缩水30亿 2010 12/21 14:26 最牛购房者出书 与开发商死扛三年获赔(图) 2010 12/20 15:43

description.hltext_display: 中 채권, 금리인상 우� �에 亞 최악 성� �
description.content:
[금리인상 시 내년 추가 약세 보일 것…인플레 막는다면 호재될 수도]
중국 채권이 금리인상 우려로 인해 올해 아시아에서 가장 저조한 투자 성적을 기록한 것으로 나타났다.
22일 블룸버그 통신에 따르면 위안화 표시 중국 국채는 올해 투자자들에게 1.7%의 수익률을 제공하며 아시아 10개국(일본 제외) 채권 가격을 추종하는 HSBC 홀딩스 지수 중 가장 낮은 성적을 냈다.
반면 초저금리 정책이 지속되고 있는 인도네시아는 19% 오르며 아시아 국채 평균 투자 수익률을 끌어 올렸다.
중국 국채 10년물 금리는 9월 이후 50bp 오르며 2007년 6월 이후 가장 큰 분기 상승세를 기록했다. 중국 국채의 약세는 인민은행이 인플레이션을 막기 위해 금리 인상을 더 공격적으로 진행할 것이라는 우려 때문으로 풀이된다.
인민은행은 지난 10월 19일 기준금리인 1년 물 대출금리와 예금금리를 각각 0.25%p 높은 5.56%, 2.5%로 인상했다.
지난달 중국의 소비자물가가 전년 동월대비 5.1% 상승, 28개월 내 가장 높은 수준을 보이며 추가 인상 가능성도 높아지고 있다. 지난 주 인민은행은 국민들의 생활 안정화를 위해 물가가 `긴급하게` 안정화 될 필요가 있다고 강조하며 추가 금리 인상 가능성을 시사했다.
전문가들은 내년 1~2%p의 추가 금리 인상을 전망하고 있다.
소시에떼제네랄은 인민은행이 향후 1년간 기준금리를 1%p 인상하며 현재 3.38% 수준인 10년 물 국채 금리가 4.75%까지 갈 것이라 전망했다. 궈 차오민 공상은행 채권 애널리스트는 10년물 국채 금리가 내년 4.5%를 넘어설 것이라 예상했다.
동남아 최대 은행 DBS 그룹과 타오 동 크레디트스위스 수석이코노미스트는 내년 인상폭을 각각 1.25%p, 2%p로 내다봤다.
소시에떼제네랄의 로버트 레일리 아시아 채권 공동 대표는 "인플레 우려와 금리 인상설에 채권 시장이 약세를 보이고 있다"며 금리가 워낙 낮은 수준이기 때문에 오를 수밖에 없다고 설명했다.
한편 중국 최대 증권사 씨틱증권은 내년 금리 인상으로 인플레 우려가 수그러들 경우 채권 시장에 오히려 약이 될 수 있다고 주장했다.
후 한규 씨틱증권 채권 애널리스트는 "상반기 금리가 인상된다 할지라도 내년 전체적으로 봤을 때 채권 시장이 반드시 약세를 보이리라고는 할 수 없다"며 "내년 상반기 2~3차례 금리 인상으로 10년 물 금리가 6월 4.2%까지 오른다 할지라도 하반기 3.8%까지 하락할 수 있다"고 전망했다.
채권 가격은 금리와 반대로 움직이며, 인플레 상승은 채권 가격 하락으로 이어진다.
[권다희기자 dawn27@]

description.hltext_display: No Preset Spending Limits Can Hurt Your Credit Score
description.author: LaToya Irby
description.content:
People with the best credit scores are often offered credit cards with no present spending limit. That doesn't mean there's no credit limit on the card. Instead, the credit limit changes based on your credit history and spending and payment habits.
Not having a credit limit may be harmful for your credit score - but it's not your fault, it's the way credit card companies report your credit limit that's the problem. Some credit card issuers report your highest balance, others report your credit limit at the time, and others don't report anything at all. When the highest balance is used, it can look like your credit card is maxed out and when there's no credit limit reported, the FICO score doesn't consider that credit card.
If you're wondering how your no preset spending limit card is reported to the credit bureaus, take a look at a recent study by CardHub.com. Scroll to the bottom to see a table with information for the major credit card issuers.
Credit Cards With No Preset Spending Limit
Bank of America Power Rewards Visa American Express Premier Rewards Gold Card ZYNC Card From American Express

description.hltext_display: to offer curbside Christmas tree pickup after all
description.content:
The Salt Lake Tribune
Updated 40 minutes ago Updated Dec 22, 2010 12:52AM
The image of an elderly woman struggling to cram her dry, dead Christmas tree into one of the city’s now-mandatory 90-gallon brown cans proved too much for Mayor Ralph Becker.
In a move that belies the mayor’s push for sustainability — at least temporarily — city officials announced Tuesday they will offer curbside Christmas-tree pickup after all. But only during the first week of January.
“Although the brown bins are the city’s preferred method for Christmas tree disposal, I have heard public concern about the difficulty some residents may have cutting up their trees to place in the brown bins,” Becker said in a news release. “Hopefully, this one-time pickup will ease the transition towards a more sustainable yard-waste program, which aims to create a smaller carbon footprint for Salt Lake City.”
Residents must have their trees curbside, and in plain view, by the morning of Jan. 3. In case of heavy snow, pickup schedules may be adjusted, according to the Mayor’s Office, which says the reversal was made at the request of Becker and City Council members.
Controversial when it was adopted over the summer, the brown-can policy was designed to help the environment, even though it meant more work for residents.
This fall, all residents who didn’t already have one were given a brown bin. In return, the orange leaf-bag program was eliminated, and the city asked allhomeowners to stuff leaves in the bin instead, even if it meant several weeks of work. Curbside tree pickup also was eliminated to cut down on drive time of the city’s fleet. Becker and the council were inundated with complaints after the change, but did not budge — until now.
City Hall instructs residents to call the public services hot line at 801-535-7116 with questions or concerns about the pickup. After the first week in January, chopped-up trees will continue to be picked up in the brown cans.

description.hltext_display: 예금 총액 가운데 현금으로 보� 하는 비율로 중국의 지준율은 18.5%다. 인민은행은 올 들어 지준율을 6번 인상했다. 루 이코노미스트에 따르면 23%는 역대 최� 수준이다. 그는 "미국의 양� �
description.content:
[中 산업은행 이코노미스트 "내년 인플레이션 부담 커질 것"]
중국 정부가 내년 은행 지급준비율(지준율)을 23%까지 올릴 수 있다는 전망이 나왔다.
22일 중국 관영 차이나데일리에 따르면 루 젱웨이 중국 산업은행 수석 이코노미스트는 한 자산 관련 포럼에서 중앙은행이 인플레이션을 완화하기 위해 내년 지준율을 23%까지 올릴 것이라고 밝혔다.
지급준비율은 은행이 고객의 요구에 대비해 예금 총액 가운데 현금으로 보유하는 비율로 중국의 지준율은 18.5%다. 인민은행은 올 들어 지준율을 6번 인상했다.
루 이코노미스트에 따르면 23%는 역대 최고 수준이다.
그는 "미국의 양적완화, 국내 시장의 초과 유동성, 보수 인상 등으로 내년 중국의 인플레이션 부담은 더욱 커질 것"이라고 말했다. 이로 인해 인민은행은 지준율을 최고 수준까지 올릴 것이라는 설명이다.
그는 인민은행이 내년 1분기 중 지준율을 인상할 것으로 내다봤다. 지준율이 23%까지 인상될 경우 최소 1조3000억위안(1950억달러)이 묶이게 된다.
지난달 중국의 CPI(소비자물가지수) 상승률은 5.1%로 28개월래 최고치를 기록했다. 전달 역시 4.4%로 정부 목표치인 3%를 훌쩍 넘어섰다.
루 이코노미스트는 내년 정부의 긴축에도 불구하고 CPI 증가율은 5~6%로 높은 수준을 유지할 것으로 전망했다.
그는 "내수를 부양시키기 위한 정부 정책과 노동력 부족 현상의 심화로 내년 근로자 보수는 증가할 것"이라며 "이로 인해 인플레이션 압박은 고조될 것"이라고 말했다.
이어 "보수 인상이 물가를 높이고, 그 결과 다시 보수가 올라가는 현상이 반복되고 있다"고 덧붙였다.
한편, 애널리스트들은 중국의 물가 급등을 야기시킨 가장 중요한 요인으로 초과 유동성을 꼽았다. 올 들어 지난달까지 신규 대출은 총 7조4500억위안으로 올해 목표치인 7조5000억달러에 육박했다.
이에 중국은행감독위원회는 상하이 은행들에게 연말까지 고정 자산 대출을 전면 중단할 것으로 요구하기도 했다.
[김경원기자 damdadi@]

description.hltext_display: 叶檀：明年扩大银行自主利率浮动区间？
description.content: 在《中国金融》第二十四期上，央行官员朱微亮与吴晓光发表了题为《利差管理的经济含义》一文。 利差管理是寻找控制流动性的第三条道路。所谓利差法，即控制利息收入和利息支出的差额，其中包括存贷款利差管理、长短期利差管理、存款利率上下限区间或者贷款利率上下限区间管理、政策性金融机构与商业银行利差管理等多个方面，既不是加息等价格手段，也不是上调存款准备金率等数量手段。 央行官员最近发表的一系列言论，充分地发挥了金融官员云山雾罩的特色，大概像格林斯潘一样，是为了防止市场兴风作浪。此处利差管理也一样。难道我们没有动用利差管理法吗？我国银行收益90%来自于存贷款利差，实在是将利差管理发挥到极致，充分地让银行实现了无风险盈利。 通读全文，你会发现作者真正想表述的是，放开利率市场化的权限，让央行拥有比目前更大的利率制定权。以往的利率管制是集中资源大干快上、高速投资的经济模式所必须，而现在随着中国经济结构的调整，以往的利率定价模式已经不符合市场所需，但又不可能一步改革到位，彻底实现市场定价，因此需要走中间道路，比以往的非市场化更市场一步，比彻底的市场化有所控制，这样才能实现软着陆下的经济结构调整。 最近，央行行长周小川在各个场合大谈特谈利率市场化：12月15日，在北京大学专门讨论了“十二五”规划建议中关于金融部分，第一句话就是“建立逆周期的宏观审慎管理框架”；12月17日选择第二句话“逐步推进利率市场化”。总体而言，是中国金融机构改革至今，已经形成了一定条件的硬约束，可以扩大利率市场化的范围。换句话说，就是可以实现更灵活的利差管理法。 这样的表达方式在中文的特殊语境下很清晰，但在市场的语境下解释起来实在成本过高。这不，《华尔街日报》中文网作了个摘要，标题竟然是《央行官员：加息可能阻碍中国经济软着陆》，基本属于驴唇不对马嘴，但这一摘要内容出口转内销，到处流传，这些估计会让央行官员哭笑不得。 目前中国经济中存在一系列的两难处境，加息担心影响软着陆，会引发热钱流入，银行资金较紧，但社会资金泛滥，为前途未卜的房地产提供了源源不断的资金。 可以设想一下，如果商业银行不停止向房地产市场贷款，按照信托成本和民间资金成本，所获收益在20%以上，可谓一本万利。银行向房地产商与房地产投资者张开钱袋，不过代价是付出高息，搭上你未来数十年的生活质量。 目前的货币政策确实动辄得咎，监管层为力保全年信贷红线不失。据悉，为了防止全年信贷突破7.5万亿元，监管层暂停固定资产贷款，以防止经济过热。对于监管层的能力不必怀疑，如果到了7.5万亿元的关口，只要一声令下禁止各家银行放贷就能守住红线。但保得住红线，不一定意味着信用泡沫变小。事实上，我们的信用泡沫一直在上升，银行的信贷收缩成为民间资金活跃的背景，各种各样暗度陈仓的手段层出不穷。 银行为规避检查将资产纳入表外，为做大资产规模互相购买资产，真是兄弟情深。据统计，2009年我国的信贷规模是9.6万亿元，而影子银行体系的规模在2万亿元以上。在表外资产银信通等产品受限时，直接委托给信托公司赚取手续费，而在信托受到监管时，则通过消费信贷等暗度陈仓，促进内需政府总是鼓励的吧。 这真是一场累死人的猫捉老鼠的游戏。这还不算完，这里在收紧信贷，那边以其他开工发放的资金源源不断。以债券为例，我国业已进入债券市场大发展的时代，根据中国结算公司11月的数据，11月的债券发行量合计达到6130.33亿元，本年总计91804.88亿元，超过货币大量发行的2009年86474.71亿元的规模。其中记账式和储蓄国债30106.48亿元，其他的债券都可以直接转换成购买力。谁说中国信贷紧，信用泡沫就小了？只会比去年大。央行其实在暗中扩大银行的资产规模，扩大社会流动性。 面对银行与货币政策的困境，央行的办法就是利差管理，不必由央行宣布加息，只要控制住银行间隔夜拆借利率，任由商业银行提高贷款利率浮动上限即可。既不兴师动众，银行有了稳定的生财之道，经济热度也会下降，而市场化利率也朝前推进了一步。 按照央行的主意，明年需要的不是加息，而是扩大银行的自主利率浮动区间。 [编辑: 王好] 分享: 【 大 中 小 】【 rss订阅 】【 打印 】【 关闭 】 近日热点 市场预期年内或再加息 各大银行提前还贷潮涌现 2010 12/20 06:56 "年终工作总结"愁煞上班族 恶搞版网上疯传 2010 12/21 14:46 媒体称明起汽柴油每吨分别上调310元300元 2010 12/21 17:31 白领该去哪打拼 中国未来5大"聚宝地"(图) 2010 12/21 14:26 银行收费项目太多? description.hltext_display: South third for 'big four' stores
description.content:
Central southern England had the third highest number of applications approved from the 'big four' supermarkets in the past two years, the BBC has found.
Councils have given 53 planning and advertising proposals from Tesco, Asda, Sainsbury's and Morrisons the go-ahead during the two years to 1 November.
Tesco had the most approved with 35, Sainsbury's had 13, Asda had three and Morrisons had two.
London had the highest number approved in the UK with 110.
The research covers the BBC South transmission area, which covers Hampshire and Isle of Wight, east Dorset, east Wiltshire, Oxfordshire, west Berkshire, west Surrey, West Sussex, Brighton and central Buckinghamshire.
The BBC asked each local authority to reveal how many planning and advertising applications from the 'big four' supermarkets were approved over the two years from November 2008 to November 2010.
In the South, two further applications have been approved by councillors where the supermarket chain involved was unknown.
And there are 25 applications still pending across the region. Sainsbury's has 13 applications still waiting for a decision, Tesco has six, Morrisons has four and Asda two.
One of the successful applications saw Tesco open a new Express store in a former Methodist church in Bournemouth, Dorset.
It retained the stained glass windows while funds from the sale went back into the local church group.
In the region about 10% of the population work in retail, with a further 12% employed in support sectors like wholesale, transport and distribution, figures from the showed. But not everyone has welcomed the new stores.
Tony Kippenberger has been fighting plans for a new Sainsbury's in Bishop's Waltham in Hampshire. He said: "We are a market town of 6,000 residents with 33 supermarkets within 10 miles, nine of which are Sainsbury's. "It will kill our high street, the likes of the butcher, fishmonger and baker." Sainsbury's said it was "committed" to supporting local retailers and is set to provide 300 jobs.
Others in the industry believe many businesses welcome the spread of the major supermarket companies.
Ginette Gower, from , said: "The majority of businesses see them as a good thing bringing jobs to an area. "There are pockets in smaller towns where shops have closed down but I think that is more of an indication of the recession rather than the supermarkets." She believes the region has one of the highest amounts of approved applications due its population concentration. "It would seem obvious where there is more people there is more demand for supermarkets, and the South East has a very high concentration of people," she added. Jeff Bray, senior lecturer in retail management at Bournemouth University, also pointed to higher income levels in the region as a factor for attracting retailers. "With a greater proportion of working couples in the South, demand for convenience retail formats, such as Tesco Express, is also likely to be higher," he said. "With new stores being built year after year it would be easy to imagine that we could end up with too many food shops. "However we have seen small independent food stores replaced with cafes and nail bars... and since the 1980s not insignificant rises in our population have contributed to increased demand for such stores." Councillor Paul Carter, chairman of , believes small businesses will make a return. "High streets have become boring. You go down one in France and see the difference, that is what we have to get back to," he said. "But commercial rates are falling like a stone so the opportunity to rent retail property for the best rates in 20 to 25 years is going to present the chance to take on the big supermarkets." Tesco said it always put customers first and had invested in the UK despite the recession, creating tens of thousands of jobs. "Most of our new store applications are not for large supermarkets but for small, local convenience stores, the likes of which millions of customers have relied on to get food in the bad weather," it added.

description.hltext_display: 张敬伟：降低票价让高铁带着民众飞
description.content: 19日起，铁路上海站开始受理2011年寒假学生团体票预售。记者发现，春运步入“高铁时代”，对于家住长三角地区的学生而言，返乡成本增加，面对几乎翻番的票价，不少手头偏紧的学生只好改坐长途车返乡。(12月21日《重庆晚报》) 中国开始步入高铁时代，这本是可喜可贺的事情。可是，奔驰的列车飞过，竟然也传出令人尴尬的消息数节车厢只有1人或数人。 对于这种现象，如果用公交车的高峰与低谷解释，从逻辑上似乎可以说得通。可是，运营方却在有意忽略民众最关心的常识问题：是不是票价太贵了？今年4月13日，曾经有报道称，湖北省首趟卧铺动车组汉口-青岛的D352/3次将于4月15日起暂停运行，16日起青岛开往汉口D354/1次卧铺动车也停运，该趟车开行时间仅5个月；同一天，京福动车也已停止售票。当时的报道称，动车组被叫停的原因有很多，但主因是票价过高，消费者不买账，导致经济效益不佳，甚至严重亏损。 对此，有关方面也有话要说，即高成本当然高票价。看上去也有道理，但这毕竟是大道理，而且是不服民生水土的大道理。长三角大学生寒假回乡望高铁兴叹，就使得这样的大道理变得没有道理。 高铁，由点到线，目前正成网络之势布局于中华大地。这意味着高铁不是飞奔于铁轨上的形象工程，而是让国人享受便捷生活的交通设施。有关方面在对高铁给予激情礼赞时也不吝称其为“公交”，更凸现其公共性质。事实上也是如此，且不说高铁归口于铁道部，即便修建中融进了其他资本金，公共投资也占了相当成分。因此，高铁票价高是可以的，但绝对不能高过公众的心理预期，让普通人没钱乘坐、不敢乘坐。当高铁只是某些特定人士独享的交通工具时，修建高铁的意义不仅远离民意，而且是绝对的不经济。最简单的经济学常识就是，降低成本、薄利多销。 如果说连大学生们都不敢乘坐高铁了，高铁的票价问题就不容忽视了。现在的大学生虽说是没有收入的消费群体，但由于这个群体喜欢追求时尚，且他们多为独生子女，父母在金钱上不会亏待他们。何况，长三角的学生家庭经济状况相对要好一些，而现在他们都叫票贵，那即将来临的春运，那些返乡的打工者又该怎么办？ 更尴尬的是，高铁贵则贵矣，如果说还有其他选择，如T字头、K字头，一般车辆让乘客们有多种选择萝卜白菜各有所爱，也是可以的。很遗憾，由于要让路给动车组，普通列车正在不断减少。这就让相当一部分人没得选择，只能无奈“被高铁”。 沪宁高铁的高票价，让长三角的大学生叫苦不迭而远离高铁，已经敲响了中国高铁运营的警讯。因为这段高铁处于中国最发达的地区，如果是京沪高铁实现全路段运营，其中间还有经济欠发达地区，对于高铁票价的反弹或更为强烈。照此情势发展下去，高铁上座率堪忧。怕就怕在上座率越低，运营方越焦虑，越要提高票价收回成本，而如此乘坐者愈少。如此怪圈，纠结下去，很难破解。 所以，远离民生的高铁，只是一道风景；亲密接触民生的高铁，才是受欢迎的高铁。套用电影《让子弹飞》的台词：降票价吧，让高铁带着民众飞。 [编辑: 王好] 分享: 【 大 中 小 】【 rss订阅 】【 打印 】【 关闭 】 近日热点 市场预期年内或再加息 各大银行提前还贷潮涌现 2010 12/20 06:56 "年终工作总结"愁煞上班族 恶搞版网上疯传 2010 12/21 14:46 媒体称明起汽柴油每吨分别上调310元300元 2010 12/21 17:31 白领该去哪打拼 中国未来5大"聚宝地"(图) 2010 12/21 14:26 银行收费项目太多? 教你做"逃费达人" 2010 12/21 14:09 月供3000元 中年教师家庭如何过上无忧生活 2010 12/20 15:17 济南推出奢华圣诞大餐10万一桌 吃的不是饭 2010 12/20 15:41 80后硕士生回收废品 毕业前买车买房揽女友 2010 12/21 14:19 李宁进军体育地产受挫 市值一天内缩水30亿 2010 12/21 14:26 最牛购房者出书 与开发商死扛三年获赔(图) 2010 12/20 15:43

description.hltext_display: 예금� �보 등 데이터를 복수로 � �장해뒀다는 걸 알� �기 때문이다. 이에 따라 미국 은행 � 객들은 금융기관들의 � � �한 � �산관리로 자� 들의 투자� �보가 사라� � 손실을
description.content:
[은행들 제3 지역에 백업 센터 마련...전면전 경우엔 `안심` 못해]
2001년 9·11 테러 당시 미국 금융권은 추가 테러 위협에 노출돼 있었다. 뉴욕 월스트리트에는 미국 주요 은행들의 본부가 자리잡고 있었는데, 이들 본부에 테러가 발생할 경우 은행 전산시스템에 타격을 입을 가능성이 높았다.
그러나 당시 뉴욕에선 뱅크런(대량 현금인출 사태)은 발생하지 않았다. 현금인출기 앞에도 평소보다 두세명 정도 더 줄을 서있는 정도였다. 이처럼 미국인들이 준전시 상황에서도 평정심을 잃지 않았던 것은 금융기관들이 고객들에게 예금정보 등 데이터를 복수로 저장해뒀다는 걸 알렸기 때문이다. 이에 따라 미국 은행 고객들은 금융기관들의 철저한 전산관리로 자신들의 투자정보가 사라져 손실을 입을 일은 없을 거라 확신할 수 있었다.
남북 사이에 긴장감이 감돌면서 국내 은행 고객들 사이에서도 "전쟁나면 은행에 맡긴 내 돈은 어떻게 되나"라는 걱정 섞인 목소리가 나오고 있다. 만약의 사태가 발생하면 열심히 모아뒀던 목돈이 날라가는 것은 아닌지 하는 불안감에서다.
22일 금융권에 따르면 국내 은행들은 전쟁이나 이에 준하는 비상사태, 천재지변 등을 대비해 마련해 놓은 비상대책(컨틴전시 플랜)에 따라 위기대응에 나설 수 있어 큰 문제는 없다는 입장이다.
은행들은 실제로 고객정보 및 예금정보 등은 서울시내 메인 전산센터와 경기권 내 백업센터 1곳, 그리고 제3의 지역에 주요 정보만을 따로 추린 백업센터를 따로 두고 관리하고 있다. 전산센터를 3군데로 분산해 운영하고 있어 전국적인 전면전이 아니라면 고객 투자 정보가 사라지는 일은 발생하기 힘들다는 설명이다.
은행들은 아울러 전시에도 은행 업무를 지속할 수 있는 대체사업장도 별도로 마련해 두고 있다. 본점 등이 붕괴되는 비상사태에 대비한 조치다. 대부분 서울 외곽지역에 마련된 대체사업장은 유가증권거래, 환딜링, 외화송금, 대출승인 등 본점 업무를 처리할 수 있도록 본점과 똑같은 시스템을 갖추고 있다. IT센터, 콜센터와 전산망이 연결된 것은 물론 심지어 본점 전화번호까지 그대로 사용할 수 있다.
그러나 전국적인 전면적으로 번질 경우 고객 정보가 파기되는 상황이 올 수도 있다. 전국적인 전면전으로 확대돼 비밀문서, 화폐, 증권, 주식 등에 대한 보호가 힘들 경우 비상지출 또는 파기에 대한 계획에 따라 정보를 파기하게 된다.
한 시중은행 IT기획부장은 "해외 백업을 검토했지만 국내와 똑같은 시스템을 해외에 두고 관리하는데 비용부담이 커서 힘들다는 결론을 내렸다"며 "전면전 상황에서는 고객 정보를 완벽히 지켜낼 대책이 없다"고 말했다.
아울러 은행들은 정부가 북한의 급변 사태에 대비해 만든 `충무계획`과 한국은행, 금융당국의 지침에 따라 단계별 조치를 취하도록 돼 있다. `충무계획3`(데프콘3에 준함) 상황이 전개되면 사용 가능한 범위 내에서 고객에게 예금을 지급하거나 전시물자를 지원하게 된다.
한편 금융감독원에선 지난 4월 천안함 침몰 사태를 계기로 전시 상황에서 발생할 뱅크런 사태에 대한 대비책 등을 담은 컨틴전시 플랜을 마련했다. 아울러 예금보험공사에서는 전쟁 등으로 금융기관이 파산한 경우 고객들에게 최대 5000만원(원리금)까지 예금을 지급한다.
[오수현기자 so2218@]

description.hltext_display: Tattle: Lilo: Fighting addiction - and rehab staffers?
description.author: Howard Gensler
description.content:
IT'S ONLY nine days until 2011, so Tattle wishes to thank Lindsay Lohan for returning to give our page a little punch.
Maybe a kick.
Or perhaps a slap.
Possibly even hair pulling.
Even though Lindsay is still rehabbing at Betty Ford, she is under investigation for an alleged misdemeanor battery against a female staffer there, authorities said yesterday.
Riverside County Sheriff's Deputy Herlinda Valenzuela said officers responded to a Betty Ford Center facility in Palm Desert on Dec. 12 shortly after a.m. for an incident involving Lindsay.
Dec. 12? What have the folks at Radar and TMZ, which finally reported the incident, been doing for the past 10 days?
Valenzuela says that a female staffer - who was fired yesterday after giving an interview about the incident - reported having a dispute with the "Mean Girls" star and that she wanted to pursue charges. Valenzuela says detectives continue to look into the case.
Their results will be presented to Riverside County prosecutors, who will decide whether to file a criminal case, Valenzuela said.
Bride Wars:
Royal Edition
Buckingham Palace, the world's only talking palace, announced yesterday that Zara Phillips, Queen Elizabeth II's eldest granddaughter, is engaged.
Phillips, the daughter of Princess Anne and an accomplished equestrian, will marry longtime boyfriend and rugby star Mike Tindall, the palace said.
No date has been set. Phillips is close friends with her cousin Prince William, who plans to marry Kate Middleton at Westminster Abbey on April 29, so that date is out of the question - although pairing up the weddings might make it a little easier for out-of-town guests.
Zara, 29, is 12th in line to the throne.
The eleven ahead of her may want to make sure she never sees Alec Guinness in "Kind Hearts and Coronets." * In other news from England, 60 firefighters were brought in to fight a blaze that engulfed two tour buses belonging to Kings of Leon at London's O2 Arena.
No one was injured in the fire, but that must have been one massive spliff.
Tattbits * "30 Rock" star Tracy Morgan is recovering from a kidney transplant.
A statement released by Morgan's publicist says he is doing well and taking "much-needed time" to recover from the surgery earlier this month. Another "30 Rock" cast member, Grizz Chapman, also received a new kidney this year.
Hopefully not the same one.
* According to TMZ.com, police were called to 50 Cent's 52-room mansion in Connecticut yesterday after security guards saw a suspicious car in the driveway.
Officers promptly arrested two men, both of them in possession of marijuana, after finding one of them drinking wine in a clo

description.hltext_display: Mxico y EU crearn parque binacional en la frontera
description.content:
Luis Videgaray, diputado federal y presidente de la Comisión de presupuesto en San Lázaro, compartió a través de su blog su opinión con respecto a la Ley de Competencia Económica (LEC).
“El pasado 4 de abril el Presidente de la República envió a la Cámara de Diputados una iniciativa de reformas a la Ley de Competencia Económica (LCE). De inmediato al conocer su contenido me pronuncié a favor de su aprobación, pues la iniciativa propuso corregir la que en mi opinión es la principal debilidad de la LCE vigente en México: las muy bajas sanciones que pueden imponerse a quienes incurran en prácticas contrarias a la competencia económica”, escribió el legislador mexiquense.
Dicha legislación fue aprobada por la Cámara de Diputados, que solo realizó modificaciones menores. Dicha reforma considera “modificaciones respecto a las facultades de la Cofeco y otras de carácter procesal, todas ellas positivas. Pero insisto: el corazón de la reforma es elevar las sanciones para los infractores y con ello crear una verdadera disuasión en contra de las prácticas que lesionan la competencia económica”, escribió el diputado.
Sin embargo, el Senado detuvo la iniciativa y la devolvió a la Cámara de Diputados, pues propuso modificaciones a la forma de nombrar a los integrantes de la Comisión Federal de Competencia, por lo que esta ley será discutida hasta febrero de 2011.
“¿Qué debe hacer la Cámara de Diputados? Mi postura no ha cambiado respecto a la primera vez que discutimos la reforma hace ocho meses: por congruencia y convicción debemos aprobar la reforma en los términos en que ya la aprobamos la primera vez, con el objetivo de dotar a la ley de sanciones efectivas, y aprobarla lo antes posible”, puntualiza Videgaray al respecto.
Y concluye que “Cada día que pasa sin modificar el límite de las sanciones económicas es un día más en que los consumidores de bienes y servicios estamos a expensas de empresas que no temen ser sancionadas si incurren en prácticas contrarias a la competencia económica. Más allá de aspectos procesales o de la forma en que se integre la Cofeco, la prioridad debe ser promover la competencia en beneficio de los consumidores, y eso hoy en México, significa elevar las sanciones aplicables a quienes violen la ley. Hagámoslo pronto”.

article.source: El Heraldo de San Luis Potosí

description.hltext_display: SEC Probe Makes Sense, Says Hurd Spokesman
description.content:
A spokesman for Mark Hurd, said U.S. regulators were right to look into the executives' departure from Hewlett-Packard, but said he had done nothing wrong.
Hurd, the former chief executive officer at the 12th largest technology company, "acted properly in all respects," spokesman Glenn Bunting said, the San Jose, Calif., Mercury News reported Tuesday.
But Bunting said, "It is understandable that the Securities and Exchange Commission is looking into the events surrounding Mark's departure, which was followed by a precipitous drop in the value of HP's stock."
Before Hurd resigned at HP stock was selling above $46. It is currently selling at under $42.
Hurd's quick departure from HP was also accompanied by media reports of a relationship with former marketing contractor Jodie Fisher.
The scandal surfaced five weeks before Hurd resigned. HP said Hurd had not violated company policy, but also said the executive had shown "a profound lack of judgment" in his involvement with Fisher.
Hurd paid Fisher an undisclosed figure to drop sexual harassment charges and Fisher, later, recanted her story.
It was also alleged that Hurd had submitted false expense accounts, some of them involving dinners with the contractor, and that he had disclosed to her, two months ahead of a public announcement, that HP was thinking of buying Electronic Data Systems.

event_or_fact.property: the executive had shown "a profound lack of judgment" in his involvement with Fisher
It is understandable that the Securities and Exchange Commission is looking into the events surrounding Mark's departure, which was followed by a precipitous drop in the value of HP's stock.

description.hltext_display: 预期收益与实际差53% 民生银行"非凡理财"水分大
description.content: 今年下半年，对人们生活影响最大的可能就是对通胀的心理预期，在每个人都对货币缩水有切肤之痛的今天，自然更注重财富的保值增值。临近岁末，经济导报记者对部分银行一年来销售的理财产品进行了调查，发现个别银行理财产品给出诱人的超高预期收益，结果却出现难以想象的大幅亏损，甚至跑不赢定期存款。 预期高收益成“大忽悠” 相关统计显示，截至11月30日，今年以来共有3406款银行理财产品到期。其中，实际收益与产品介绍中的“预期收益”不符的共有141款产品。导报记者发现，这些产品中为数不少的一部分非但“达不到”投资者的心理预期，且实际收益和预期之间相差最大的达到53.27%，有严重夸大收益之嫌。 中国民生银行今年1月16日到期的“非凡理财FOF-基金精选人民币理财产品(1年)”预期年化收益率高达50%，但实际收益率为-3.27%。尽管该产品的亏损幅度在所有到期产品中看起来并不大，但两个数据之间相差53.27%的“水分”使其成为百余款“不达标”产品的代表。 导报记者还统计了这些产品中“水分”较大的前20款产品，发现其宣称的预期收益率从4%-25%不等，十分吸引眼球，而实际到期后所实现的收益率最低的只有-4.11%，最高也只有4.61%。粗略统计发现，这些产品的实际收益平均要比预期收益低5%。 但在现实销售中，“预期最高”、“上不封顶”的字样频频被印在宣传彩页最显著的位置，成为理财产品销售的重点推广部分。民生银行“非凡理财”FOF-基金精选产品的说明书上，收益率说明：10%-50%(且上不封顶，非承诺收益)。产品说明书上还特意单列“预计最高年收益率50%”。 多款产品跑不赢定存 导报记者发现，今年到期的3406款银行理财产品虽然大部分达到了预期收益，但和CPI的增速相比，有七成以上未能跑赢CPI，有的则连银行定期存款都跑不赢。 今年10月，CPI同比上涨4.4%，11月为5.1%，创28个月新高。从到期银行理财产品的年化收益率看，能够跑赢单月CPI的寥寥无几。据统计，今年到期的3406只银行理财产品中，仅有44只到期年化收益率超过5%；超过4.4%的，也不到70只。 导报记者调查发现，今年到期的129只投资期限为6个月的银行理财产品，只有58只到期年化收益率为2.2%以上，占比仅为45%，其他超过55%的半年期理财产品，到期年化收益率均比不上银行半年定存的收益。今年到期的8只两年期的理财产品多数表现也较差，除3只达到预期收益外，其余5只均大幅度低于预期收益，表现最好的一只年化收益率不到2.4%，有的还出现亏损。 某股份制银行理财规划师向导报记者透露，银行理财产品投向不明确的问题一直存在，其宣传和说明，很少有客户能够看懂，有的银行在产品的包装宣传上五花八门，难免有夸大宣传的意味，难怪有客户质疑个别银行理财产品不是站在客户角度考虑，而是为了收取手续费和从市场圈钱。上述高达50%的预期年化收益率怎么可能获得呢？今年基金表现一般，投资于基金的理财产品自然也不可能获得高收益，夸大宣传的银行理财产品更多像是在赌博。 （责任编辑：华青剑） [编辑: 王好] 分享: 【 大 中 小 】【 rss订阅 】【 打印 】【 关闭 】 近日热点 市场预期年内或再加息 各大银行提前还贷潮涌现 2010 12/20 06:56 "年终工作总结"愁煞上班族 恶搞版网上疯传 2010 12/21 14:46 媒体称明起汽柴油每吨分别上调310元300元 2010 12/21 17:31 白领该去哪打拼 中国未来5大"聚宝地"(图) 2010 12/21 14:26 银行收费项目太多? 教你做"逃费达人" 2010 12/21 14:09 月供3000元 中年教师家庭如何过上无忧生活 2010 12/20 15:17 济南推出奢华圣诞大餐10万一桌 吃的不是饭 2010 12/20 15:41 80后硕士生回收废品 毕业前买车买房揽女友 2010 12/21 14:19 李宁进军体育地产受挫 市值一天内缩水30亿 2010 12/21 14:26 最牛购房者出书 与开发商死扛三年获赔(图) 2010 12/20 15:43

description.hltext_display: Der Rohstoff-Zock 2011: Gold-, Uran-, Eisenerz-Per ...
description.content:
Rohstoffe ziehen derzeit so viele Anleger in ihren Bann wie schon ewig nicht mehr. Insbesondere Gold und Uran stehen bei den Investoren hoch im Kurs und dürften auch 2011 zu den großen Gewinnern zählen. Genauso wie diese Rohstoff-Perle, die mit Gold, Uran und Eisenerz gleich bei drei heißen Rohstoff-Trends mitspielt. Schon bald dürfte zudem der Sprung vom Explorer zum Produzenten gelingen. Lange sollte die Aktie also nicht mehr für weniger als einen Euro zu bekommen sein.
Die Experten sind sich einig: Der Rohstoff-Boom dürfte sich auch im kommenden Jahr fortsetzen. Eine Schlüsselrolle wird einmal mehr China zugesprochen. Zuletzt wurden die Leitzinsen in der Volksrepublik nicht erhöht, weswegen Markteilnehmer mit einer Fortsetzung des chinesischen Rohstoffhungers rechnen. Zu den großen Anlagethemen 2011 dürften demnach Eisenerz, Uran und insbesondere Gold zählen. Anleger sollten deswegen auf den neuen Rohstoff-Highflyer setzen, der diese drei heißen Trends in nur einer Aktie vereint.

description.hltext_display: Fight looms after Texas gets 4 new US House seats
description.author: JAY ROOT
description.content:
AUSTIN, Texas -- A surge of Hispanic residents and other population gains have Texas poised to add more congressional clout than any other state, but a partisan fight now looms over exactly where the new seats should go.
Texas is gaining four seats in the U.S. House, twice as many as Florida, the only other state to pick up multiple ones, according to new population figures announced Tuesday by the U.S. Census Bureau. All told, Republican-leaning states will pick up at least a half dozen House seats thanks to the 2010 census, which found the nation's population growing more slowly than in past decades but still shifting to the South and West.
With Texas Republicans using recent elections to fortify their already solid control of the state Legislature, the political process of redrawing the state's congressional map would seem to benefit the GOP, too.
But Democrats say not so fast.
Boyd Richie, chairman of the Texas Democratic Party, said Hispanic and black population growth account for the additional seats, and he vowed to fight for a redistricting plan that takes their numbers into account.
"A legal and fair redistricting process must produce new congressional districts that reflect the Hispanic and African American population growth," Richie said. "Our Democratic numbers may be down, but we are not out. Democrats cannot and will not allow our voices to be silenced in this critical process."
The Census Bureau said the nation's population on April 1 was 308,745,538, up from 281.4 million a decade ago. The growth rate for the past decade was 9.7 percent, the lowest since the Great Depression. The U.S. population grew by 13.2 percent from 1990 to 2000. Michigan was the only state to lose population during the past decade. Nevada, with a 35 percent increase, was the fastest-growing state.
The new numbers are a boon for Republicans, with Texas leading the way among GOP-leaning states that will gain House seats, mostly at the Rust Belt's expense. Following each once-a-decade census, the nation must reapportion the House's 435 districts to make them roughly equal in population, with each state getting at least one seat.
In all, the census figures show a shift affecting 18 states taking effect when the 113th Congress takes office in 2013. The political power follows the high population growth, shifting toward the south and west and away from the industrial Midwest and northeast.
With reapportionment settled, the far more politically divisive process of redistricting is set to begin. In Texas, both major parties were bracing for a showdown over the state's new residents, beginning a fight that is sure to spark court action. But with Republican supermajorities in the Legislature, the temptation to run the table will be strong.
Rep. Pete Gallego, D-Alpine, said if the federal courts don't intervene to compel fairness, Republicans will likely produce a map that gives their party the advantage in three or perhaps even all four of the new seats.
"It is very easy to overreach when you're holding the map and have the pen in your hand," he said.
Despite the party's recent gains in the November legislative elections, Republicans won't have unchecked authority to draw the state's congressional map to benefit themselves.
Civil rights laws require that the interests of minority voters be protected as district boundaries are redrawn, and Texas is one of the states whose redistricting plans require "pre-clearance" by federal authorities under the Voting Rights Act.
Democrats are also counting on an assist from the Obama administration, which could have a significant voice in the pre-clearance process. It is the first time since the Voting Rights Act passed that the Justice Department will be in Democratic hands during the redistricting process.
Hispanic growth doesn't automatically translate into Democratic growth, though. Two heavily Hispanic congressional seats in South Texas flipped to Republicans this year. There also are several new Latino GOP members about to be sworn into legislative seats.
South Texas Rep. Aaron Pena, who recently left the Democrat Party and became a Republican, said Texas Latinos are more conservative than their counterparts in western states such as California and Nevada.
Pena, who sits on the House Redistricting Committee, said his "educated guess" was that Republicans would get three of the four seats.
"The Hispanic community is increasingly up for grabs," Pena said. "It's truly a swing population."
Texas already had the largest Republican delegation in Congress, holding 20 of the state's 32 seats. In the 2010 elections, the party picked up another three seats, two of them in heavily Latino districts in South Texas. With all the new growth, Texas will now have 36 seats and 38 presidential electoral votes.
Federal lawsuits are essentially guaranteed as part of the process, and if the past is any guide, the courts will have a major say in how the lines are finally drawn. In 2001, the Texas Legislature deadlocked on Congressional redistricting, leaving the federal courts to redraw all the districts. In 2006, the U.S. Supreme Court ordered that new lines be drawn in several districts to protect the rights of Hispanic voters in South Texas.
Starting early next year, most state governments will use detailed, computer-generated data on voting patterns to carve neighborhoods in or out of newly drawn House districts, tilting them more to the left or right. Sometimes politicians play it safe, quietly agreeing to protect Republican and Democratic incumbents alike. But sometimes the party in control will gamble and aggressively try to reconfigure the map to dump as many opponents as possible.
The U.S. is still growing quickly relative to other developed nations. The population in France and England each increased roughly 5 percent over the past decade, while in Japan the number is largely unchanged, and Germany's population is declining. China grew at about 6 percent; Canada's growth rate is roughly 10 percent.
The 2010 census results also are used to distribute more than $400 billion in annual federal aid and will change each state's Electoral College votes beginning in the 2012 presidential election.
Apart from the respective four- and two-seat gains in Texas and Florida, Arizona, Georgia, Nevada, South Carolina, Utah and Washington are all picking up one new U.S. House seat. Ohio and New York will lose two House seats each. Losing one House seat are Illinois, Iowa, Louisiana, Massachusetts, Michigan, Missouri, New Jersey and Pennsylvania.
Each House district represents an electoral vote in the presidential election process, meaning the political map for the 2012 election will tilt somewhat more Republican.

event_or_fact.property: It is very easy to overreach when you're holding the map and have the pen in your hand
Texas Latinos are more conservative than their counterparts in western states such as California and Nevada

A legal and fair redistricting process must produce new congressional districts that reflect the Hispanic and African American population growth; Our Democratic numbers may be down, but we are not out. Democrats cannot and will not allow our voices to be
The Hispanic community is increasingly up forgrabs; It's truly a swing population.
his "educated guess" was that Republicans would get three of the four seats
Hispanic and black population growth account for the additional seats, and he vowed to fight for a redistricting plan that takes their numbers into account
if the federal courts don't intervene to compel fairness, Republicans will likely produce a map that gives their party the advantage in three or perhaps even all four of the new seats

description.hltext_display: Sometimes, critics make us see red
description.content:
I would like to dedicate today's column to all my old college professors, and I want to assure each and every one of them that when I use the word "maggots," a little later on, I am not referring to them personally.
And, even if I am, I mean it in a loving and affectionate way.
I read a report, not long ago, that professors at Texas State University have "explained" why the sky is red in Edvard Munch's famous 1893 painting "The Scream." You know the one. It's a spooky depiction of a man crying out in anguish as he crosses a bridge.
It turns out, according to the scholars, that the great 1883 eruption at Krakatoa, in what is now Indonesia, threw enough debris into the atmosphere to create red twilights visible even in Europe, WHERE MUNCH LIVED! So he undoubtedly observed this phenomenon, and very likely remembered it 10 whopping years later when he started his painting! Or so the scholars conclude.
Well, you know, as I was reading this scholarly report, I came to a scholarly conclusion of my own, which is that the taverns in Texas must have been open late on the big night these guys were doing their brainstorming, because obviously they were higher than kites.
The way I see it, there are two major problems with their research:
1. It may be wrong. Munch may have painted the sky red to suggest peril. Or maybe it's a plain old sunset. Or maybe he painted it red because he just felt like it. He was in a red mood, OK?
Even if the scholars are right, so what? Does it matter? Does this detail add anything worthwhile to our understanding or appreciation of the painting?
Now, don't get me wrong. Scholars are OK. As long as they keep quiet and stay out of sight, they probably don't represent a direct threat to society. Let them write their little papers and give their little lectures.
It's like letting the tots watch television, or the teens play their video games. Sure, it's a pointless and mind-rotting waste of time, but it keeps them occupied and gives the rest of us some peace and quiet.
And consider this. If university-level scholars weren't the kind of critics who write scholarly dissertations, which they do, they probably would be the kind of critics who write on-deadline reviews, which means we actually would have to pay attention to them.
Reviewers are bad enough, but at least they operate in the here and now. They criticize a book, movie, play, painting or other work of art right after it's created. They move quickly. Their work is current and up-to-date, and it appears in newspapers or magazines, or on television, where the public has to take note of it.
Scholars, on the other hand, are critics gone to seed. They still are chewing on, and slowly digesting, works of art that were created centuries ago. Don't ask them about this week's bestseller list. They're still buzzing over the Bronte sisters. And don't even think of asking a scholar to tell you whether a work of art is "good" or "bad." Those words are too short for them, and they won't even pretend they heard you. They are only interested in questions that can be answered with words like "disassociative tautologies" or "analogous conundrums."
If you actually were to persuade a scholar to write a review of some current work of art, he or she would spend several years writing it, and it would be hundreds of pages long, and you wouldn't understand a word of it. It wouldn't be fit to print, except in the sort of scholarly publications that go wild over stuff like that.
Mind you, I'm not running down scholars in order to glorify reviewers. Heavens no. Reviewers are raptors and carrion feeders. They prey on the work of others. But at least they go after fresh meat.
Think of reviewers as the jackals who plunge into the forest, locate their kill and bring it down. Think of scholars as the maggots who don't start their work until the carcass is well past its prime. They don't even see the forest, or the trees, or even the whole carcass, only the little bit of it they're nibbling on.
Hey, I should lighten up a little. It's good not only to enjoy art, but to think about it. Absolutely. But you don't want to overthink it. You might break the spell, ruin the magic. The early 19th century essayist Charles Lamb bemoaned the fact that Sir Isaac Newton had explained rainbows in purely scientific terms, breaking them down into their physical parts. For Lamb, this spoiled the illusion. Newton, he said, had "destroyed all the Poetry of the rainbow by reducing it to a prism."
Art is even more delicate than a natural wonder. It can be damaged by overhandling. Analysis is fine, surely, but over-analysis becomes clutter, and it gets in the way. It disrupts the process and distorts the effect. It's like holding a book too close to your eyes, or standing too close to a painting. You can't see it as well, or enjoy it as much.
OK, I'm done for now. No more huffing and puffing. And remember, I used the word "maggots" lovingly.
Read more John Weeks at http://sbsun.com/johnweeks and http://blogs.sbsun.com/sb/weeks/. Contact him by email at john.weeks@inlandnewspapers.com.

event_or_fact.property: destroyed all the Poetry of the rainbow by reducing it to a prism.
rainbows in purely scientific terms, breaking them down into their physical parts

description.hltext_display: 예금계좌(보통·� �축예금)를 개설하는 � 객에 대해 개설 목� �을 확인해, 목� �이 불문명하면 계좌 개설이 거부되는 것이다. 이에 따라 이번 단속에서는 � 규 계좌 뿐만 아니라 기존
description.content:
전화금융사기 의심계좌 집중단속 실시
전화금융사기 의심계좌 집중단속 실시
[아이뉴스24] 입력 2010.12.22 16:08
내블로그에 저장
금융감독원은 전화금융사기 근절을 위해 23일부터 17개 국내 은행과 신협, 우체국, 새마을금고 등 금융회사와 공동으로 사기에 이용될 가능성이 있는 모든 계좌에 대해 집중 단속을 실시한다.
금감원은 "사기범들이 주로 신규 계좌를 사기에 이용했으나 올해 3월부터 `단기간 다수계좌 개설목적 확인 제도` 시행으로 사기에 이용할 신규 계좌 확보가 여의치 않게 되면서 최근 대출을 미끼로 기존거래계좌를 수취해 사기에 사용하는 사례가 많아지고 있다"며 단속 배경을 설명했다.
단기간 다수계좌 개설목적 확인 제도란, 최근 1개월간 2개 이상의 예금계좌(보통·저축예금)를 개설하는 고객에 대해 개설 목적을 확인해, 목적이 불문명하면 계좌 개설이 거부되는 것이다.
이에 따라 이번 단속에서는 신규 계좌 뿐만 아니라 기존 거래계좌도 대상에 포함된다. 특히 현금지급기나 폰뱅킹을 통해 자금이 입금된 지 얼마 안돼서 인출거래가 발생하는 계좌를 중점적으로 점검할 계획이다.
금감원에 따르면 올해 들어 적발된 사기계좌 수는 8천25건으로, 지난해 하반기 6천72건에 비해 30% 이상 늘었다.
금감원은 "사기범들이 끊임없이 신종 사기수법을 개발하고 있어, 앞으로도 전화금융사기 피해예방 라디오 공익광고를 실시하는 등 홍보를 강화할 것"이라고 말했다.
/김지연기자 hiim29@inews24.com
IT는 아이뉴스24 연예ㆍ스포츠는 조이뉴스24
(Copyright ⓒ 아이뉴스24. 무단전재 및 재배포 금지)

description.hltext_display: 湖南药品生产企业质量信用拟分四等
description.content: 红网长沙12月22日讯(潇湘晨报实习生李文记者蔡胤)昨日，在省食品药品监督管理局的组织下，17名专家、学者一致通过了药品、医疗器械企业划分诚信信用等级的听证。将来，湖南省药品、医疗器械生产企业质量信用将分四等，拟于明年上半年起实施。 此次听证的是《湖南省药品、医疗器械生产经营企业质量信用等级评估实施办法》(以下简称《评估办法》)和《湖南省药品、医疗器械企业质量信用信息采集与披露管理办法》。此次听证会过后，省食品药品监督管理局将会把两项《办法》以及听证会代表提出的意见一同提交到上级部门。 按照《评估办法》的规定，全省范围内的药品、医疗器械生产企业的企业质量信用等级将分为守信(A级)、基本守信(B级)、失信(C级)、严重失信(D级)四个等级。企业质量信用等级，每两年评估一次。评估为守信等级的企业由省级评估委员会颁发证书，并向社会公告，对严重失信的企业则纳入黑名单，依法向社会公告其违法违规行为。 [编辑: 王好] 分享: 【 大 中 小 】【 rss订阅 】【 打印 】【 关闭 】 近日热点 市场预期年内或再加息 各大银行提前还贷潮涌现 2010 12/20 06:56 "年终工作总结"愁煞上班族 恶搞版网上疯传 2010 12/21 14:46 媒体称明起汽柴油每吨分别上调310元300元 2010 12/21 17:31 白领该去哪打拼 中国未来5大"聚宝地"(图) 2010 12/21 14:26 银行收费项目太多? 教你做"逃费达人" 2010 12/21 14:09 月供3000元 中年教师家庭如何过上无忧生活 2010 12/20 15:17 济南推出奢华圣诞大餐10万一桌 吃的不是饭 2010 12/20 15:41 80后硕士生回收废品 毕业前买车买房揽女友 2010 12/21 14:19 李宁进军体育地产受挫 市值一天内缩水30亿 2010 12/21 14:26 最牛购房者出书 与开发商死扛三年获赔(图) 2010 12/20 15:43

description.hltext_display: 基层保险机构加强财务管理工作的思考（上）
description.content: 目前，国内保险市场尚未成熟，依然处于低层次竞争阶段,承保费率已降至低谷，加上各项费用，许多保险主体综合经营成本较高，创利空间较小，公司经营管理不到位，特别是财务管理达不到精细化，难免会影响创利。可以说，财务管理工作是保险企业经营管理的重要组成部分，是企业核算的中心环节，关系到企业的生存与发展。尤其作为基层主体的市、县级保险分支机构，其财务管理的好坏潜在影响创利。 加强财务管理工作的 作用和意义 企业进行经济活动的同时也伴随着资金活动，要对企业的经济活动进行管理，就要对资金活动进行管理，这就是财务管理问题。基层保险企业作为具有独特财务运动规律的行业，财务管理工作自然不能忽视。尤其县区级保险主体是行业发展的命脉，是保险业的细胞，是创利的单元。基层公司强化财务管理，首先要积极开展保险业务，聚拢基金，充分履行经济补偿职能，以满足基层社会和个人对保险的需求；此外，作为经营自负盈亏的经济实体，还要取得一定利润，以增加资本金积累，增加公司实力实现可持续发展。否则，保险企业无法经营，会成为无源之水、无本之木。保险财务管理的重要意义在于处理好企业运营过程的经济关系，在于通过合理的财务制度安排、财务战略设计和财务策略运作，有效培育和配置财务资源，以求利益最大化和协调化。因此，加强基层保险财务管理工作，是有计划而合理地组织资金运动、提高资金使用效率和效果的战略举措，是科学归集并梳理综合经营成本、严细发展管控的重要手段，是助推企业提升创利水准、保持健康经营的有效路径。 基层财务管理工作 存在的不足 当前，一些县区基层公司在发展与效益问题上存在着认识上的误区或偏差，对经营效益有一定的负面影响，重规模轻效益，财务管理不到位，主要体现在以下几方面： 1.重视程度不高，在某种程度上还是重业务发展、轻财务管理。每年上级公司下达的保费收入、综合成本率、利润等经营目标，在一些县区公司领导和员工心目中往往只认为必须先上保费，后考虑利润任务。在工作指导思想、措施办法等方面，很注重业务发展，以保费论英雄，对业务结构调整不细化，导致直接轻视效益，以致于一些基层公司长期效益观念淡薄，重数量轻质量、讲业务进度不讲经营核算，在财务管理上达不到精细化。为此，由于不注重财务管理、业务分析，没有科学的数据支撑，忽视业务结构改造，导致无效发展。 2.基层财务人员年龄结构不对称，业务素质普遍不高。一些国有基层公司现有财务人员年龄偏大，知识僵化，新的业务知识接受慢，业务素质普遍不高，自学能力又不强，对于上级公司下发的文件、学习材料等学不深、学不透，有的仅凭财务老本做事，多数财务人员业务能力平平。基层也有新增财会人员，虽说基本上都是大专以上学历，但缺乏系统性、专业性金融保险财会知识；具备中、高级职称的更是寥寥无几。 3.人员少、业务量大。随着保险业空间的飞速拓展，保险业务规模的快速增长，加之财务基础规范工作的细化要求，现有财务人员、数量已远远不能适应业务的发展需要。基层公司周六、周日常需要财务人员加班，处理收付费业务。由于业务量的增加、人员匹配不足，会计基础工作往往达不到要求，一天忙于基础工作，导致财务管理淡薄。 4.管理职能得不到充分发挥。有的县区公司不设财务科（室），财务归属综合办公部门管理，大部分综合部门主管不是财务人员，不懂财务却履行财务管理监管职能。因此，财务主管人员的管理、监督职能得不到充分、科学的发挥，各项财务管理制度得不到科学、细化的落实，各项财务工作得不到相应的提高。而且，一些基层公司财务人员用工机制、体制不顺，导致财务人员不能很好地工作。 加强和完善基层财务 管理的几点建议 1.切实转变经营观念，提高认识，确立财务管理工作的核心地位。 近年，随着行业转轨，几乎所有保险公司的经营班子都增强了效益观念，认识到利润的重要性，但却没有从追求业务总量（销售优先、规模优先）的惯性思维中彻底改变过来。与其他行业相比，保险公司的特殊性之一是收在前、赔在后，更容易诱使一些人追求眼前的“业绩”和“政绩”，而不考虑以后的问题，很多损失就是在这种情况下发生的。公司要想提高效益，必须以效益为先，真抓实干，发展与管理两手抓，不能只讲“多”、“快”，而不讲“好”、“省”，更不能为好看而做数字游戏，否则会“按下葫芦浮起瓢”，落下赔本的“干热闹”。根据目前仍存在的重发展轻效益情况，上级公司必须切实在加大对效益指标考核力度的同时，把利润作为基层的主要年度指标，将其费用、薪酬、奖惩、人员晋升等全部与盈利能力、创利指标完成情况挂钩，坚定不移地长期坚持下去，促使基层努力学经营，抓管理，创效益，真正确立财务管理工作的核心地位。 2.切实加强队伍建设，加大培训和准入制度，精心打造财务管理团队。 随着市场经济化的进一步发展，财会队伍作为协助各级经营核心层管理的重要助手群体，其职能的发挥，越来越受到重视。为了适应新形势下保险工作的需要，促进财会人员业务素质的提高，必须加强公司系统财会人员的“准入证”管理，即基层公司从事财会岗位工作的人员必须具备初级会计资格证书，必须熟练掌握《会计基础》、《初级会计电算化》、《财经法规与会计职业道德》等基础专业知识，以加强基层会计从业资格的基础知识普及；同时，基层县级保险主体财务科管理在实行垂直的基础上，市、县两级公司对其财务工作实施双重考核，并对基层公司科学调配财务人员岗位职数，以适应业务快速发展的需要。只有财务人员与业务发展规模达到一定的配比，并适度保证待遇，才能充分发挥财务人员的积极性，财会工作质量及管理水准才会相应提升。另外，要强化财务人员专业知识的培训，提高业务素质。无论是新、老保险企业，都应重新审视现有财务管理团队，舍得投入，实现培训工作的常态化，采取内育、外引、专业合作等多种方式，通过学习日新月异的财务知识，不断更新财务理念，将竞争观念、风险观念、盈利观念、效率观念、资金的时间价值观念和法制观念等深深根植在脑海中，并以此指导实际理财工作。 [编辑: 王好] 分享: 【 大 中 小 】【 rss订阅 】【 打印 】【 关闭 】 近日热点 市场预期年内或再加息 各大银行提前还贷潮涌现 2010 12/20 06:56 "年终工作总结"愁煞上班族 恶搞版网上疯传 2010 12/21 14:46 媒体称明起汽柴油每吨分别上调310元300元 2010 12/21 17:31 白领该去哪打拼 中国未来5大"聚宝地"(图) 2010 12/21 14:26 银行收费项目太多? 教你做"逃费达人" 2010 12/21 14:09 月供3000元 中年教师家庭如何过上无忧生活 2010 12/20 15:17 济南推出奢华圣诞大餐10万一桌 吃的不是饭 2010 12/20 15:41 80后硕士生回收废品 毕业前买车买房揽女友 2010 12/21 14:19 李宁进军体育地产受挫 市值一天内缩水30亿 2010 12/21 description.hltext_display: The year that was 2010
description.content:
In this year end review, CIO Asia looks at 2010 which many CIOs and IT experts billed as a rollercoaster year of transition. In this article, we highlight issues and technologies that mattered to the Asian IT industry in 2010. By CIO Asia writers
Tools sponsored by
Looking in the rear view mirror, 2010 looks like a year that made the IT industry gasp—first with expectation of a recovery, then because of the rush of unprecedented growth. Even though the industry grew at a healthy clip, CIOs faced numerous challenges—from adjusting the IT budgets to grappling with labour issues. But they always felt at their heels this gnawing anxiety of possibly falling off the cliff once more.
But luckily, it has not been a bad year. The industry has been spared the pain of inching back to growth from the deep abyss of the credit crunch that it saw just a year ago.
The year 2010 was dominated by the global economic recovery where the major economic superpowers were solidly entering back into the growth phase, says Looi Kien Leong, president of ASOCIO (Asian-Oceanian Computing Industry Organisation). “This had positive impact on the ICT industry as demand picked up. The Asia and Oceania region saw faster recovery and were less affected by the slowdown,” he says.
“The ICT industry in Asia-Oceania should congratulate itself for experiencing solid growth despite the difficult times,” says Looi.
Year of two halves
Looi’s thoughts are echoed by James Loo Wai Kheong, COO, Y3 Technologies and CIO, YCH Group, Y3Technologies. “For me, this is a year of two specific halves,” he says, “The first half of the year we were coming out of a very difficult 2009 without really knowing for sure that the recovery would last – it was a transition period and we wanted to catch the drift before it was gone. We got our IT projects completed in double quick time, pushing the project deadline to their limits.”
“The second half,” he continues, “is much better paced; the number of projects didn’t get reduced but further increased. We were able to manage with a better organisational structure and streamlined processes to support the sustained business growth.”
“Surprisingly, 2010 has been the year of growth (for us),” concurs Waleed Hanafi, senior vice president and CIO, Global Blue. “We started the year working on contingencies for an extended economic downturn, and this was reinforced by the Icelandic volcano which resulted in the closure of most airports in Europe. That brought our business to a standstill. By May, our volumes were up, and by July, we were facing unprecedented growth.”
“2010 has been a complete rollercoaster,” says Hanafi, “from contemplating how to downsize to managing unprecedented growth, and with new technologies and vendor offerings that actually have some value for a change”.
The same sentiment was largely true of the public sector as well, says Steve Hodgkinson, research director, Ovum. The year was “not as bad as we were expecting”, he tells CIO Asia, and “the economies in the region have proven to be more resilient than expected and have bounced back from the global financial crisis surprisingly well.”
Recovery a worry
From Malaysia to Singapore to Australia, the sentiments have been similar. Speaking of Hong Kong, Daniel Lai and Sunny Lee, members of the Hong Kong Computer Society, say that, fuelled by economic recovery, enterprises across the region are now doing much more to reach their full innovation potential.
Recovery was one worry. The other was the balancing act that CIOs are always performing—managing IT resources.
Post-recovery, Lai points out that the prevailing IT model is no longer about reducing budgets but rather focused on doing more with current resources. “To drive IT innovation and maximise the value of their IT resources, corporate leaders have utilised, or are planning to adopt, cloud computing and virtualisation initiatives,” says Lai.
“The CIO’s top activity for 2010 has been to prioritise resource allocations to work on the right things in an uncertain business environment,” says John Roberts, vice president and distinguished analyst, CIO research, Gartner. “CIOs are striving to deliver more IT-driven growth and innovation to the business with the same or fewer resources. There is a premium on focus and speed of execution to capture volatile market opportunities. CIOs have been creating leaner and more responsive IT organisations.”
For CIOs, Roberts says, 2010 has been “a year of transition – from providing quality services at a managed cost, to extending information and processes to the business edge and focusing on doing fewer things faster”.
“If 2009 was cost management, then 2010 is liquidity management as the top priority for YCH Group,” says James Loo. “Our IT is perfectly aligned to both these priorities. I am glad we have managed and done well with introducing the right technologies and applications at the right time for the group.”
Tough act
It’s an achievement but a tough task for Loo and his team. “Hectic is one word to sum it up and I have never seen IT being so stretched and challenged with having to manage seemingly impossible deadlines,” he says.
Steven Miller, dean and professor of information systems, practice, for Singapore Management University, says that senior IT executives are increasingly finding themselves in new organisational roles.
More firms are combining IT with various parts of organisational operations and shared services, and senior executives, responsible for both ‘tech’ and ‘ops’, are becoming prevalent.
“Often, it is the IT veterans who take the lead position in these integrated organisations because of their strong experience with working across processes, operations, business logic, business functions, software applications, and the physical and infrastructure side of IT,” says Miller. “Some CIOs are being co-branded as chief innovation and information officers (CI2O) and some are being referred to as head of technology and shared services,” he adds.
“Hopefully, 2010 will be the last year to consume valuable time in internal and external meetings that end with the obvious conclusion that IT must work together with the business.”
Gartner’s Roberts agrees: “Some CIOs have been taking leadership positions to redesign business processes, and have become the process and information architect across the enterprise. Most CIOs recognise that IT has to change, and change is always difficult. CIOs are striving to position IT as a partner with the business by demonstrating IT’s value proposition.”
It’s the people
One of the most important, and most delicate, elements of IT management is not the machines, but the people—the IT staff. Managing staff has been one of the most challenging areas for CIOs in 2010.
When asked, what have been the CIO’s top management priorites this year, Hanafi says: “It never changes—it is always people. Finding, retaining, and managing talented people.”
That challenge—finding, retaining and managing the right talent—reverberates across the industry.
“Meeting project deadlines and working within budgets, managing users’ and customers’ expectations, working with technology suppliers; these issues come with the territory all the time,” says Wu Choy Peng, group chief information officer, Neptune Orient Lines. “If I have to single out any issue, I would say finding and recruiting high quality IT professionals has been more challenging than we have anticipated. I think we need to critically review our sourcing strategy if the shortage of high quality IT professionals continues.”
One of the contributing factors is the erratic supply of IT talent.
Citing results from the Singapore infocomm Technology Federation (SiTF) members’ survey 2010, Tan Yen Yen, chairman of the association, says although many companies are upbeat about the recovering economy and are indeed projecting business growth more aggressively as compared to the previous year, the shortage of talent is a major challenge this year.
“The tight labour market is not likely to ease anytime soon, with some government assistance schemes making exit plans under the improving business climate,” Tan says.
The situation is not much better in Malaysia. “The heavy reliance on foreign unskilled labour and increasing unemployment among the local graduates, due to lack of employability skills, has given rise to a human capital conundrum,” says PIKOM (National ICT Association, Malaysia) president Shaifubahrim Saleh. “Specifically, the development of the ICT sector suffers from being continuously plagued with an inadequate supply of qualified personnel,” he says.
What technologies?
What were the technologies that evolved to matter in 2010? There is not one that dominates but many CIOs and industry experts cited cloud computing and mobile technologies as key shapers of the IT narrative in the year 2010.
“The main technology drivers include mobile commerce (m-commerce), Web 2.0, cloud computing, voice over Internet protocol (VoIP) and open source,” says Shaifubahrim.
According to ASOCIO’s Looi, key industry drivers include cloud computing, unified communications, tablet and mobile devices. “The keywords are wireless, mobile, anywhere-anytime and ubiquitous, as consumers are on-the-go. This applies to both the business and consumer demands. In the Asia-Oceania region, mobile device penetration has the highest growth.”
Hong Kong’s Lee adds that in terms of 2010 market opportunities, cloud computing and virtualisation present highly compelling business benefits for the industry. With the wide-spread emergence of commercially viable cloud capabilities, more and more enterprises are receptive to the possibilities of using shared services and platforms, and are further looking at cloud computing as a driver of growth in the Asia Pacific region.
Lee says the ample cloud offerings, together with enhanced wireless infrastructure in support of the development of mobile computing, have especially made 2010 very exciting for enterprise IT.
“The top technology priorities have been cloud and virtualisation, with a strong focus on reducing costs by improving the efficiency of IT,” agrees Roberts from Gartner. “Technology is in transition as heavyweight, owner-operated models give way over time to lightweight, service-based models.
“However, we also see a continuing focus on business intelligence and information management to overcome information overload and deliver the right information in the right format at the right time to impact decisions up, down and across the enterprise.”
Hanafi also acknowledges cloud computing as a technology priority for 2010 but only after operational integrity and data growth.
“Cloud – beyond all the hype and misinformation (SaaS is not cloud), the availability of utility computing – buying what you need when you need it, self provisioning, and on demand scalability, has opened up a lot of alternatives,” Hanafi says. “The challenge is to bring along the security, audit, and operational teams to keep up with the possibilities.”
Government commitment
In public sector too, cloud computing is a dominant theme. There is a growing momentum behind cloud computing, Ovum’s Hodgkinson says, but there’s also increasing pressure for on-shore cloud and for less talk and more action by vendors … “cloudy is as cloudy does”.
“The rise of government commitments to investing in on-shore cloud computing facilities as a matter of national competitiveness” is what makes 2010 special to the IT industry, says Hodgkinson. According to him, desktop virtualisation is starting to gain traction, driven by the catalyst of Windows 7 migration, increasing pressure to minimise business-as-usual ICT costs, plus Government 2.0 generating lots of talk, but little real value.
Other technologies and devices that dominated the scene, says Hodgkinson, include the iPad and virtualisation. “The iPad is proving to have a bigger impact than anticipated – desktop virtualisation (XenDesktop and VMware View) enables the desktop to be accessed via an iPad and it is proving surprisingly useful as a mobile, enterprise-grade, cloud access device,” he says.
But cloud computing was not top of the mind for everyone. “Migration from legacy systems to new systems, enterprise reporting and business analytics, data and master data management – these are the top technology priorities in 2010, and will continue to be so for the next two to three years,” says Wu Choy Peng.
Rise of e-commerce
On the other hand, in Malaysia, a focus on IT services, the rise of e-commerce and broadband penetration drew the attention of the digiterati.
PIKOM President Shaifubahrim Saleh notes a continuing shift of the business model in ICT in Malaysia from production to services. “Major trends appear to be focused on two aspects on a sectoral shift at macro level and in the e-commerce segment, which is PIKOM’s current focus for 2010.
“Looking ahead, in the technological arena the e-commerce is expected to increase,” says Shaifubahrim. “The year 2010 may well be remembered as the year when Malaysia surpassed the 50 per cent broadband penetration for households.”
Summing up, after the financial crisis of the two preceding years, CIOs have navigated a difficult bend with aplomb. “We had predicted a tough year for CIOs, but we had expected a greater turnover of CIOs,” says Roberts. “However, they have proven themselves to be resilient in adapting to change through tough times.”

description.hltext_display: Gas utility gets pared-back rate hike
description.author: Marty Schladen \ El Paso Times
description.content:
Texas Gas Service will get just 12 percent of the rate increase it originally requested, the Texas Railroad Commission ruled last week.
Under the ruling, most El Paso residential customers will see no increase in their natural gas rates, while most businesses will see an increase of about 1 percent, Norman Gordon, the attorney who represented the city in the rate case, told the City Council on Tuesday.
Earlier this year, the gas utility requested a $7.2 million increase to pay for employee bonuses, for improvements to its lines, for growth of its network, for safety measures and for moving its headquarters. It later reduced the request to $5.1 million.
But in April, the City Council refused that request after its advisers said the utility should reduce rates by $1.4 million. So Texas Gas Service appealed to the Railroad Commission, which regulates gas utilities.
The commission ruled that Texas Gas Service would get an $846,000 increase, but that figure does not include costs to make sure pipelines are safe or the cost of the rate case that resulted in the ruling.
Texas Gas Service Community Affairs Manager Pete Parraz read a statement Tuesday.
"We are evaluating the decision from the commission," he said. "Until we have a better understanding, we are unable to specify what the impact will be to the community and the customer."
Parraz declined to answer other questions such as whether his company would appeal the decision in U.S. District Court. But Gordon said
the courts tend to side with state regulators in such cases.
"District court appeals in these cases are difficult," he said.
As part of its ruling, the Railroad Commission disallowed travel expenses the gas utility wanted to build into the increase. The commission also disallowed 90 percent of the bonuses the utility asked for.
"This is a huge victory," city Rep. Steve Ortega said.
Texas Gas Service overreached in asking for the increase, Gordon said.
"The company asked for too much, and it could not justify its request," he said.
The latest case was the second time in two years that Texas Gas Service tried to raise rates for El Paso customers. In 2008, it got an 80-cent-a-month increase.
Marty Schladen may be reached at mschladen@elpasotimes.com; 546-6127.

description.hltext_display: � �화금융사기 의심계좌 집중단속 실시
description.content:
전화금융사기 의심계좌 집중단속 실시
전화금융사기 의심계좌 집중단속 실시
[아이뉴스24] 입력 2010.12.22 16:08
내블로그에 저장
금융감독원은 전화금융사기 근절을 위해 23일부터 17개 국내 은행과 신협, 우체국, 새마을금고 등 금융회사와 공동으로 사기에 이용될 가능성이 있는 모든 계좌에 대해 집중 단속을 실시한다.
금감원은 "사기범들이 주로 신규 계좌를 사기에 이용했으나 올해 3월부터 `단기간 다수계좌 개설목적 확인 제도` 시행으로 사기에 이용할 신규 계좌 확보가 여의치 않게 되면서 최근 대출을 미끼로 기존거래계좌를 수취해 사기에 사용하는 사례가 많아지고 있다"며 단속 배경을 설명했다.
단기간 다수계좌 개설목적 확인 제도란, 최근 1개월간 2개 이상의 예금계좌(보통·저축예금)를 개설하는 고객에 대해 개설 목적을 확인해, 목적이 불문명하면 계좌 개설이 거부되는 것이다.
이에 따라 이번 단속에서는 신규 계좌 뿐만 아니라 기존 거래계좌도 대상에 포함된다. 특히 현금지급기나 폰뱅킹을 통해 자금이 입금된 지 얼마 안돼서 인출거래가 발생하는 계좌를 중점적으로 점검할 계획이다.
금감원에 따르면 올해 들어 적발된 사기계좌 수는 8천25건으로, 지난해 하반기 6천72건에 비해 30% 이상 늘었다.
금감원은 "사기범들이 끊임없이 신종 사기수법을 개발하고 있어, 앞으로도 전화금융사기 피해예방 라디오 공익광고를 실시하는 등 홍보를 강화할 것"이라고 말했다.
/김지연기자 hiim29@inews24.com
IT는 아이뉴스24 연예ㆍ스포츠는 조이뉴스24
