description.hltext_display: Unión de Juristas exige investigar a fondo a magistrados reprobados
description.content:
La activista social Marisela Escobedo, asesinada en Chihuahua, cuyo caso sigue generando reacciones de indignación en diversos sectores. Foto: OEM-Informex
Organización Editorial Mexicana
Manuel Carvallo / El Sol de México
Ciudad de México.- "Fue irregular, ilegal y sobre todo inmoral, lo que el Supremo Tribunal de Justicia del Estado de Chihuahua hizo al contratar a los magistrados del Tribunal Oral de Ciudad Juárez, Rafael Boudid, Catalina Ochoa y Nezahualcóyotl Zúñiga, pese a haber reprobado sus exámenes de calidad", aseguró el presidente de la Unión de Juristas de México (UJM), Eduardo Miranda Esquivel.
Tras darse a conocer que los tres magistrados del Tribunal Oral de Ciudad Juárez que liberó al homicida Sergio Barraza, habrían fracasado en su examen para ser jueces del nuevo sistema de justicia en la capital de Chihuahua en el año 2006, pero que pese a ello en Juárez sí fueron contratados por el Supremo Tribunal de Justicia, el presidente de la UJM, exigió:
"Debe investigarse a fondo el proceso de selección y nombramiento de estos magistrados para determinar si se llevó a cabo conforme a la ley, pero sobre todo con honestidad".
Y continuó: "En su caso, de encontrarse irregularidades, deberán fincarle las responsabilidades civiles, administrativas y penales tanto a Rafael Boudid, Catalina Ochoa y Nezahualcóyotl Zúñiga, como a quien indebidamente los contrató".
Exigió también que a todos se les debe juzgar por los delitos de uso indebido del ejerció del cargo y actos contrario a la administración de justicia.
Este caso, consideró, que además de las sanciones administrativas, civiles y penales a las que se hagan acreedores, tanto magistrados como quienes los contrataron, "deben exhibirse para el escarnio y repudio público, ya que su actuación ya costó otra vida inocente más".
"Este caso de corrupción, demuestra una vez más que en México las autoridades están cubiertas de corrupción que trae consigo la tan dañina impunidad en la que mantienen hundido al pueblo", subrayó molesto.

description.hltext_display: De Witte: "Er is toenadering tussen G4 en K11"
description.content:
Maandag hebben de Grote Vier (Anderlecht, Club, Gent en Genk) samengezeten met de elf kleine clubs over de competitiehervorming. Pro League-preses Ivan De Witte probeert de twee partijen te verzoenen. competitiehervorming
De G4 wil 16 clubs én play-offs, de K11 én Standard stemden voor een terugkeer naar 18 clubs. "De twee partijen mochten hun zeg doen en alle argumenten werden op tafel gelegd." "Anders dan de vorige keer verliep het gesprek nu rustig en constructief. Er is sprake van toenadering", zegt De Witte in Gazet van Antwerpen. "Ik geloof in een oplossing, maar dan eerder in de vorm van een compromis dan van een consensus." De Pro League-baas gelooft dus in zijn verzoeningsopdracht. "Anders was ik er niet aan begonnen. Een rol als Don Quichote is niks voor mij." "Het is nog lang niet zover, maar het is alleszins wel de intentie van de verschillende partijen om met één overeengekomen competitieformule naar de tv-zenders te stappen. Het is in het grootste belang dat de Pro League eendrachtig naar buiten treedt."

description.hltext_display: Schalke dank Farfán im Pokal-Viertelfinale
description.content:
Schalkes Raúl (l) jubelt nach seiner Vorlage für Farfán zum 1:0.
Augsburg (dpa) - Jefferson Farfán hat dem FC Schalke 04 die Titelchance im DFB-Pokal erhalten. Der Peruaner sorgte mit seinem Treffer in der 84. Minute für den Schalker 1:0 (0:0)-Sieg beim Zweitliga-Spitzenreiter FC Augsburg.
Nach dem eindruckvollen Bundesliga-Endspurt bot das Fußball-Team von Trainer Felix Magath im Cup-Achtelfinale aber eine über weite Strecken schwache Leistung. Dank des effizienten Auftritts und Farfáns Treffsicherheit konnte sich Magath dennoch freuen: Durch den Einzug in die Runde der letzten Acht erhält der Club garantierte 1,2 Millionen Euro an TV-Einnahmen.
Nach dem erfolgreichen Pokal-Fight verlängerte Magath seinen Schützlingen den Urlaub um fünf Tage bis zum 2. Januar. «Jetzt haben wir uns noch mal ein paar Tage mehr verdient», sagte Magath, der mit der Leistung seines Teams zufrieden war: «Natürlich war es schwer, aber das war zu erwarten. Augsburg steht nicht umsonst in der 2. Liga oben.» Der zweimal stark parierende Keeper Manuel Neuer meinte nach dem «harten Stück Arbeit». «Wir haben zwei gute Monate hinter uns. Wir hoffen, dass es weiter bergauf geht.»
Vor dem letzten Spiel des Jahres hatte Magath mit der Aussicht auf eine längere Weihnachtspause seine Spieler zusätzlich angestachelt. Doch trotz der Motivationsspritze fand der Champions-League-Achtelfinalist bei nasskalten Bedingungen vor 30 660 Zuschauern in der ausverkauften Impuls-Arena offensiv zunächst überhaupt nicht statt.
Zu zaghaft im Auftreten, zu ungenau im Passspiel - Schalke entwickelte lange keinerlei Zug zum Tor. Und das, obwohl Magath die Startelf vom 3:0 in Köln aufgeboten hatte. Erst ein Zusammenspiel von Pokal-Debütant Raúl und Farfán, mit Abstand beste Knappen, sorgte sechs Minuten vor dem Ende für Jubel im Schalker Lager.
Die Augsburger ließen in der zerfahrenen Partie keinen Klassenunterschied erkennen. Dem Halbfinalisten der Vorsaison fehlte aber die Durchschlagskraft aus dem Spiel heraus, zudem kamen die Standards zu unpräzise. Und so blieben die beiden Keeper Neuer und Simon Jentzsch im ersten Durchgang komplett beschäftigungslos.
Nach der Pause kamen die Gäste etwas bemühter aus der Kabine. Doch auf dem rutschigen Rasen fand der Favorit lange kein Mittel, um Augsburgs Defensive in Verlegenheit zu bringen. Es dauerte bis zur 59. Minute, ehe Raúl nach einem Pass von Klaas-Jan-Huntelaar den ersten Schalker Torschuss weit neben das FCA-Gehäuse setzte.
Die Hausherren, bei denen Trainer Jos Luhukay seinen «Notnagel» Michael Thurk nach Verletzungspause einwechselte (75.), verlegten sich mehr und mehr aufs Kontern. Und fast wäre dieses Konzept aufgegangen. Nach einem Pass von Daniel Brinkmann tauchte Tobias Werner (65.) in abseitsverdächtiger Position alleine vor Neuer auf, der Schalke vor dem Rückstand bewahrte. Zehn Minuten später rettete der Nationalkeeper gegen Thurk ein zweites Mal.
Auf der Gegenseite strich erst ein Raúl-Kopfball (70.) knapp vorbei, dann klärte Axel Bellinghausen (77.) auf der Linie. Kurz vor Schluss dann doch noch die Entscheidung in der regulären Spielzeit: Nach einem Pass von Raúl war der in der Hinrunde überragende Flügelflitzer Farfán zur Stelle und traf zum Siegtor ins lange Eck.

description.hltext_display: Kein Trost für Gladbach: Pokal-Aus in Hoffenheim
description.content:
Demba Ba (M) von Hoffenheim erzielt das Tor zum 2:0 gegen Torwart Christofer Heimeroth (r).
Sinsheim (dpa) - 1899 Hoffenheim hat sich mit dem Einzug in das DFB-Pokal-Viertelfinale ein vorweihnachtliches Geschenk beschert und beim 2:0 (1:0) Bundesliga-Schlusslicht Borussia Mönchengladbach endgültig die Festtage verdorben.
Dank eines ungefährdeten Sieges zogen die Nordbadener zum vierten Mal in der Vereinsgeschichte in die Runde der letzten Acht ein und sicherten sich damit eine Weihnachtsprämie von mindestens 1,2 Millionen Euro.
Vor 23 500 Zuschauern erzielten Gylfi Sigurdsson (35. Minute) per Freistoß und Demba Ba (63.) nach einem Eckball die Tore zum hochverdienten Erfolg. Für die Borussia setzte das Aus den negativen Schlusspunkt einer völlig verkorksten Hinrunde. Nur der Einsatz der Gäste stimmte. Dem Bundesliga-Achten Hoffenheim genügte eine durchschnittliche Leistung.
«Es kann nicht sein, dass man wieder durch zwei Standards verliert, auch wenn die Niederlage verdient war», ärgerte sich Gladbachs Trainer Michael Frontzeck nach der sechsten Pflichtspiel- Niederlage hintereinander. «Ich bin froh, dass die Seuchen-Hinrunde ein Ende gefunden hat.» Sein 1899-Kollege Ralf Rangnick war indes zufrieden: «Wir sind froh, dass wir es ins Viertelfinale geschafft haben. Damit haben wir uns sowohl in der Bundesliga als auch im Pokal einige Optionen gehalten.»
Das Wechsel-Gerede über Luiz Gustavo beeindruckte seine Mannschaft nicht. Überraschend tauchte der vom FC Bayern umworbene Brasilianer trotz Adduktorenprobleme in der Anfangsformation auf.
Gustavo & Co. begannen schwungvoll, doch an Möglichkeiten mangelte es lange. Die Gladbacher, mit 47 Gegentreffern die schlechteste Abwehr der Bundesliga, setzt auf die Deckung, nach vorn lief aber nichts. Igor de Camargo war einzige Spitze. Raul Bobadilla und zuletzt Mohamadou Idissou hatte Frontzeck suspendiert.
Zunächst ging seine Defensiv-Taktik auf. Nur Demba Ba (26.) konnte die Gäste schrecken, als er einen Pass von Sebastian Rudy einen Meter vor dem Tor verpasste.
Dass die Borussen dennoch vor der Pause in Rückstand gerieten, lag nicht an Hoffenheims Spielkunst, vielmehr verhalf Keeper Christofer Heimeroth dem Gegner zur Führung. Statt beim Freistoß von Sigurdsson (35.) in der Torwartecke zu bleiben, ging er einen Schritt in die Mitte, der Ball segelte ungehindert an ihm vorbei. «Das nehme ich auf meine Kappe. Ich dachte, der Ball fliegt in die andere Ecke», sagte Heimeroth selbstkritisch.
Nach hatte Hoffenheim zwar durch Boris Vukcevic (47.) die erste Chance in Halbzeit zwei, doch die Borussen spielten nun endlich mutiger nach vorn. Gefährlich waren sie nicht. 1899 lauerte indes auf Konter. Ein Treffer der Hoffenheimer wurde nach einiger Verwirrung aberkannt, weil Ba (53.) einen Schuss von Salihovic klar im Abseits liegend unhaltbar abgefälscht hatte.
Zehn Minuten später beendeten die Gastgeber das Aufbäumen des Teams von Niederrhein. Nach einem Eckball traf Ba umringt von drei Gladbachern aus kurzer Entfernung. Das war die Entscheidung. Die bemitleidenswerten Gäste mühten sich - doch zu mehr waren sie nicht fähig.

description.hltext_display: Favoriten sichern sich den Kreismeistertitel
description.content:
Medaillengewinner der Jugend B: Die Perleberger Adrian Imm, Tim Jannasch und Ricardo Grimm. Torsten Gottschalk
PRIGNITZ - Die Einzelkreismeister 2010 bei den Prignitzer Nachwuchskeglern stehen fest. Wie im Vorjahr sicherten sich Tim Jannasch (männliche Jugend B) und Nico Kanthak (männliche Jugend A, beide SG Traktor Perleberg) die Siegerpokale.
Am fünften und letzten Spieltag in Wittenberge wurden beide Spieler noch einmal ihrer Favoritenrolle gerecht. Bei der Jugend B holte sich Tim Jannasch am Sonnabend den Tagessieg mit einen Plusergebnis von 57 Holz. Mit 519 Holz verwies Ricardo Grimm (SG Traktor Perleberg) in Wittenberge Vizemeister Hendrik Imm (Perleberg, 491) auf Rang drei und sicherte sich nach Abzug des Streichergebnisses noch die Bronzemedaille. Vierter in der Endabrechnung wurde Vincent Lucht (SVL Seedorf). Der lange um die Medaillen mitspielende Christian Hübner (Traktor Perleberg) verpasste durch die Nichtteilnahme an den letzten beiden Turnieren eine vordere Platzierung und wurde am Ende Siebenter.
Vierter Tagessieg für
Nico Kanthak
Bei der Jugend A war Nico Kanthak (SG Traktor Perleberg) nicht zu stoppen. Nico brachte vier Tagessiege in die Wertung. Die nur mäßigen 556 Hölzer (80 Wurf) am letzten Spieltag reichten trotzdem zum Sieg. Mit 552 Holz und Platz zwei in Wittenberge sicherte sich Marcus Derlig (SG Traktor Perleberg) den Vizetitel. Den Bronzeplatz holte sich Phillip Metscher (SV Grün - Rot Wittenberge), der zum Abschluss auf seiner Heimbahn 548 Holz schob.
Bei der Jugend B weiblich war in diesem Jahr mit Laura Wiese (SVL Seedorf) nur eine Spielerin am Start, die sich so konkurrenzlos den Kreismeistertitel holte .
"Die Beteiligung der Vereine an der Kreismeisterschaft war gut. Sehr positiv war der Start der Nachwuchsarbeit beim SVL Seedorf. Wir hoffen, dass im nächsten Jahr auch die Nachwuchsspieler von Hertha Karstädt an den Meisterschaften teilnehmen", bilanzierte Axel Granzow, dessen Schützlinge .
Die vier Erstplatzierten der einzelnen Altersgruppen erspielten sich auch die Startberechtigung für die beiden Mannschaften des Prignitzer Keglerverbandes. Die spielen im kommenden Jahr bei Turnieren im Land Brandenburg um die Qualifikation zur Deutschen Meisterschaft. Dabei geht die Mannschaft der Jugend A als Titelverteidiger ins Rennen.

description.hltext_display: Fans der Bucaneros geben Gas
description.content:
ROSTOCK - Gestern war ein großer Tag für die Bucaneros. Das Rostocker Baseball-Team bekam eine Menge Stimmen und schloss zur Spitzengruppe auf. Machen Sie weiterhin fleißig mit, liebe Leserinnen und Leser. Es lohnt sich. Davon abgesehen, dass Sie mit Ihrer Stimme Ihre persönlichen Sportler des Jahres nach vorne bringen, können Sie nach Beendigung der Aktion auch attraktive Preise gewinnen.
Zur Verfügung stehen und werden unter allen Einsendungen ausgelost unter anderem:
• ein Wochenende mit einem der neuesten Modelle der Marken VW, Audi oder Skoda inklusive einer Tankfüllung, zur Verfügung gestellt von den Autohäusern der Firmengruppe Ferdinand Schultz Nachfolger
• ein Gutschein für ein Essen für zwei Personen im Blockhouse in der Breiten Straße in Rostock
• fünf Beem-Aluguss-Topf-Sets
• drei Edelstahl-Kaffee-Automaten
• fünf Bodenstaubsauger
• 15 Kästen Bier von der Hanseatischen Brauerei Rostock
Machen Sie mit und schreiben Sie an die NNN (Anschrift siehe links).
Mail: sp-nnn@nnn.de
Fax: (03 81) 4 91 16 87 05

description.hltext_display: Schweriner Kreismeister der Kegler in Lübeck ermittelt
description.content:
Reinhard Dallmann und Katja Müller (M.) siegten in der Mixed-Konkurrenz vor Marc Berger/Kathrin Gunia (l.) und Michael Heerkloß/Petra Drefers (r.). privat
LÜBECK - Auf der 12-Bahnenanlage in Lübeck-Schlutup wurden die Schweriner Kreismeisterschaften ausgetragen. 35 Aktive kämpften um den Kreismeistertitel bzw. um die Qualifikation zu den Bezirksmeisterschaften.
In einem spannenden Finale bei den Herren A gab es einen dreifachen Triumph der Einheit-Kegler. Neuer Kreismeister wurde Dirk Hausmann mit 910 Holz. Dagegen kam es um Platz 2 zu einem Stechen, denn Michael Heerkloß und Frank Fuchsa hatten zuvor jeweils 907 Holz gespielt. Dieses Stechen gewann schließlich Michael Heerkloß.
Einheit-Kegler Reinhard Dallmann holte sich mit 918 Holz den Titel bei den Herren B. Sein Vereinskamerad Wolfgang Hibner wurde in seiner Altersklasse Herren C neuer Kreismeister mit 924 (+84). Das war zugleich die Tagesbestleistung.
Neuer Titelträger bei den Damen-Paaren wurde das Duo Marianne Ahrendt/ Kathrin Gunia mit einem beachtlichen Ergebnis von 923 Holz vor den Titelverteidigerinnen Katja Müller/Petra Drefers 894 sowie vor Simone Schallock/Cindy Mihm (882/alle KC Einheit).
Die Entscheidung um den Titel im Herrenpaarkampf war äußert spannend. Hier setzte sich mit nur drei Holz Vorsprung das Einheit-Duo Frank Fuchsa/Dirk Hausmann mit 910 Holz vor den Vereinskollegen Michael Heerkloß/Reinhard Dallmann (907) und Dieter Behrend/Heiko Hacker (895) durch.
Bei den Mixed-Paaren legten Katja Müller/Reinhard Dallmann im zweiten Durchgang einen starken Endspurt hin und verwiesen mit 916 Holz Kathrin Gunia/Marc Berger (911) auf den Silberrang. Die Titelverteidiger Petra Drefers/Michael Heerkloß (alle KC Einheit) belegten am Ende mit 901 Holz den 3. Platz.

description.hltext_display: Strike 3: DNA confirms another Kensington Strangler attack
description.author: STEPHANIE FARR & DAVID GAMBACORTA
description.content:
THE FIEND WHOM much of the city calls the Kensington Strangler can now be known by another name: serial killer.
Police officials announced last night that DNA evidence has definitively linked the strangler to the murders and sexual assaults of three women, all of whom have been found partially nude in desolate Kensington lots in the past month.
Earlier in the day, many of those same officials announced a $37,000 reward for information that leads to the capture and conviction of the cold-blooded killer, whose specter continues to haunt much of the area.
Homicide Capt. James Clark said detectives had just learned that DNA evidence found on Casey Mahoney, 27, whose body was found facedown last Wednesday in a wooded lot at Front and Tusculum streets, matched genetic material found on the two other murder victims. "As a result of this being the third murder in a short period of time in the same area with the same type of victims," Clark said, "we do at this time consider this to be a serial murderer." The news came as little surprise to anyone who has been following the ever-worsening story of the Strangler, who is also a suspect in three attacks on women who were choked and sexually assaulted in Kensington since October.
Two of those victims helped police create a composite sketch of their attacker.
Investigators also found surveillance footage that shows the man who choked and beat a woman in an alley on Dec. 6; the man in the video appears to closely resemble the sketch.
Police Commissioner Charles Ramsey acknowledged that there could be other Strangler victims hidden in weeded lots or abandoned houses that police don't know about yet.
A task force of investigators from several units has been "doing everything they can to bring this predator to justice," Clark said. But despite it all - the surveillance footage, the sketches, the intense focus on anything suspicious that happens on Kensington Avenue - they've had nothing to show for it.
With that in mind, Ramsey, Mayor Nutter and other brass gathered earlier in the day at Cumberland and Jasper streets - where the strangler's second victim, Nicole Piacentini, was found on Nov. 13 - to announce a dramatic increase in the reward, from $3,000 to $37,000.
John McNesby, president of the Fraternal Order of Police Lodge No. 5, said $7,000 of that money - $5,000 from the FOP and $2,000 from Councilman Frank DiCicco - would be paid just for the suspect's arrest. "If the DNA matches, you can be paid by Christmas," he said. The other $30,000 - $25,000 from the city and $5,000 from the Citizens Crime Commission - will be paid upon the Strangler's conviction, Nutter said.
When the sum was announced, Kensington residents who had gathered around the throng of reporters let out a collective "Whoa!" "We are serious about getting this psycho off the streets of Philadelphia," Nutter said. Ramsey agreed, but cautioned against vigilante justice, especially after the photo and name of a man who is not a suspect appeared on Facebook and on fliers this week. "We don't need that sort of thing," Ramsey said. "We can solve this, but we can do so protecting the rights of all people." Deputy Commissioner William Blackburn said that 120 johns and prostitutes have been arrested since Nov. 19 and that 154 swabs have been taken from people along the Kensington corridor. Of those swabbed, 45 have been ruled out as a suspect. He said the remaining samples are in "various stages of genetic profiling." Ramsey said more than 150 tips have come in and police are following up on every one.
Throughout the news conference, residents shouted questions and statements at officials that went unacknowledged, such as "People are afraid!" "We want more foot patrols back!" and "Is there any clearer pictures you can release of this sicko?" Jay Wiley, a resident who participates in town watches, said he doubted he'd abide by officials' plea to call police and not go after the suspect on his own. "This guy is really sick, and I've got something to tell you: If the police don't get you, the town watch will get you and the neighborhood will get you," he said. "No violence. I will grab you and put you down on the ground and hold you for poli

description.hltext_display: 현대건설 매각 법� �공방 돌입
description.content:
현대건설 매각과 관련해 사실상 법정공방이 시작됐습니다.
현대그룹은 채권단의 중재안에 대해 다시 한번 거부의사를 분명히 했습니다.
김의태 기자입니다
현대그룹이 법원에 제출한 현대건설 매각 양해각서 해지 금지 가처분 신청에 대한 첫 심리가 오늘 오전 열렸습니다.
예상대로 현대그룹측과 채권단의 주장은 팽팽했습니다.
당초 현대그룹은 양해각서 해지 금지만 가처분을 냈지만 양해각서가 무의미해지면서 현대건설 매각작업 자체 중지 가처분으로 변경했습니다.
현대그룹은 "채권단이 현대그룹과의 맺은 주식매각 양해각서를 해지한 것은 부당하다며 현대차그룹에게 현대건설 주식을 매각하는 일체의 절차를 진행해서는 안된다"고 주장했습니다.
채권단은 이에 대해 "양해각서 체결시 약속했던 자료제출 요구에 현대그룹이 성실히 응하지 않았다"며 양해각서 해지는 정당하다고 맞섰습니다.
또 양해각서에서는 어떤 이유로 해지되더라도 법적인 문제를 제기하지 않기로 했다고 강조했습니다.
현대그룹은 법원 심리 이후 프랑스 나티시스 예금은 임시방편의 자금인 브릿지론이 맞다고 시인했습니다.
그렇지만 어떠한 보증이나 담보는 없다고 설명했습니다.
이어 재판부의 요청에 따라 본안소송에서 프랑스 나티시스은행 대출계약서를 제출하도록 하겠다고 덧붙였습니다.
채권단의 중재안에 대해서는 다시 한번 받아들일 수 없다는 입장을 분명히 했습니다.
이는 현대건설 소액주주를 비롯한 투자자들을 무시하는 것이라며 문제의 소지가 있다는 지적입니다.
법원은 현대그룹의 가처분 신청에 대해 이르면 다음주초 판결을 내릴 것으로 보여 현대건설 매각관련 법정공방을 가늠하는 첫 잣대가 될 전망입니다.
WOW-TV NEWS 김의태입니다.

description.hltext_display: Diego declina; PAN sin candidato fuerte
description.content:
Diego Fernández de Cevallos. Foto: El Sol de México
Organización Editorial Mexicana
Fernando Aguilar / El Sol de México
Ciudad de México.- El diputado federal del PRI Sami David David, señaló que con la negativa de Diego Fernández de Cevallos de convertirse en el candidato del PAN a la Presidencia de la República, Acción Nacional no tiene un candidato fuerte para el 2012.
En entrevista, el legislador chiapaneco declaró que esta decisión del excandidato presidencial panista termina con las esperanzas de la derecha para competir con un abanderado de gran trayectoria para contender en los próximos comicios presidenciales, por lo que aseguró que el Partido Revolucionario Institucional (PRI) sigue firme en su retorno a la residencia oficial de Los Pinos.
De acuerdo con las declaraciones emitidas a los medios de comunicación a 24 horas de haber sido liberado de un largo secuestro de más de siete meses, el también exsenador de la República, se descartó como candidato del Partido Acción Nacional, al señalar que él sólo trabajará para el aspirante a la Primera Magistratura del país que designe su instituto político.
Sami David David se apoyó en esas declaraciones para comentar que hasta el momento no se vislumbra a ninguna figura panista que pueda hacerle sombra no sólo a Enrique Peña Nieto, quien encabeza las preferencias nacionales, sino a los otros aspirantes del tricolor mencionados tanto por simpatizantes como militantes del PRI. (Beatriz Paredes, Manlio Fabio Beltrones).
"El partido cuenta con hombres y cuadros reconocidos tanto al interior como al exterior del instituto político, quienes garantizan desde este momento una victoria en los comicios del próximo año y sobre todo del 2012, a diferencia de otros partidos que tienen que hacer alianzas para designar a candidatos externos que en su mayoría fueron priístas, para tratar de competir con los abanderados priístas", aseveró el diputado Sami David David.
Por tal motivo, destacó, hoy por hoy el revolucionario institucional es y seguirá siendo la primera fuerza priísta en el país, como lo han demostrado los triunfos electorales recientes, al igual que la preferencia ciudadana que día a día se inclina más por nuestros candidatos al considerarlos los más preparados en todos los aspectos para sacar a México del estancamiento económico, político y social en el que lo han sumergido los 10 años de Gobierno panista.
Al hacer un balance de la labor políticoelectoral en este año que está a punto de concluir el diputado chiapaneco reconoció que si bien perdieron tres estados en los pasados comicios locales, la presencia territorial del partido se fortaleció lejos de debilitarse como auguraban algunos detractores de la oposición, quienes tuvieron que recurrir a candidatos externos para alcanzar el triunfo en las urnas, que no hubieran podido obtener de manera individual ante los abanderados tricolores.
Asimismo comentó, que los errores cometidos en la última década por las dos administraciones panistas, en materia económica y de seguridad, principalmente, han inclinado las balanzas de las preferencias ciudadanas a favor del PRI, lo cual se pone de manifiesto con los resultados de las últimas encuestas nacionales que dan como favorito al PRI como partido y al gobernador mexiquense, Enrique Peña Nieto como candidato para ganar las elecciones presidenciales del 2012.
"Hay un nuevo sentido de responsabilidad del PRI hacia el futuro. Tenemos un proyecto político que ve al futuro y no se basa en el poder por el poder, sino en la fuerza de los ciudadanos; en eso consiste nuestro compromiso", finalizó.

description.hltext_display: The Smart Grid: Expectations and Realities
维基解密网和Facebook 谁才是最大泄密者？(图)
description.author: TechWeb.com.cn
description.content:
阿桑奇和扎克伯格谁更糟？
【TechWeb报道】12月22日消息，据国外媒体报道，当你的隐私遭到攻击，你会关心吗？互联网原本被设想为一个巨大的知识库、或者一个全球性通讯工具，但是随着时光推移，互联网成了追踪用户每次鼠标点击以及浪费用户大量时间的帮凶。即使如此，人们仍为所谓的信息变革欢呼：瞧，我的Twitter账户有无数关注者；我的Facebook好友人数如此庞大。为什么我们感觉自己是走在数字道路上的羔羊，正走向屠宰场。
在最新的《时代》年度人物评选中，读者积极为维基解密网创始人阿桑奇投票，编辑最终选取了Facebook联合创始人扎克伯格。其实，这两位风头正劲的人物都对隐私保护造成了威胁。
从某种意义上来说，维基解密网要撕掉一切隐私的面纱，该网站鼓励接触到秘密信息的举报人去揭露虚伪、谎言。这是否是个好主意取决于你所处的立场。基于自己的定位，维基解密网做了两件事情：其一，诠释了网络究竟是要做什么，满足了信息和知识传播的原始幻想；其二是让虚伪者为自己的一切行为负责。它所作的一切都是通过网络。
越来越多的人花费大量时间在自己的社交网络张贴无聊的视频，这让我们将注意力再次转向全球最大社交网站Facebook。众所周知，Facebook首席执行官扎克伯格刚被《时代》杂志评选为年度人物，他创造了一种交换信息和改变人们生活方式的新系统，当然这种服务正在“试图私下隐私的面纱”。但扎克伯格说，这只是帮助人们“更好地连接和分享”。
实际上，该网站唯一的目的是收集成员的信息，然后通过这些数据赚钱。可以根据用户的兴趣投放广告，还可以向用户出售虚拟物品和礼物。Facebook收集了大量用户信息，该网站知道用户住在哪里，年纪多大，访问过哪些网站，在哪里工作，去哪里度假，有哪些朋友以及喜欢吃什么。用Facebook的说法，这是用户的“社交图谱”。
所有这些对营销者来说都是非常有价值的信息，因为他们希望最深入地了解客户，并成功卖出自己的产品。
阿桑奇和扎克伯格，谁对隐私威胁更大？
维基解密网的大部分文件很重要，但却不是惊天动地的，我们真的在乎那些大事件吗？只不过提醒我们不要看表面。另一方面，Facebook是那样的有趣，但也有黑暗的一面-用户正成为广告商的金矿。其实最重要的是和隐私捆绑在一起的安全问题。
维基解密网迄今为止提出的一个潜在问题，也是唯一的潜在问题，即披露的文件可能影响国家安全工作以及军事行动，但在线追踪用户却能威胁到用户个人安全。最典型的例子是用户在Facebook发布的状态信息导致自己被抢劫。现在，Facebook已经能做到让每个人都知道你在哪里，而且是按分钟计算的。
同时，没有网站是不受黑客和网络犯罪分子攻击的，比如最近有人在八卦网站披露了超过100万用户的密码。用户的电子邮件姓名、电话号码、地址以及生日信息等都能帮助犯罪分子攻入用户的银行账户或进行信用卡欺诈行为。
是不是人人都对隐私泄露表示担忧？
家长很明显是最有担忧情绪的人群。Common Sense Media发布的最新调查显示，相比5年前，85%家长更担心在线隐私问题。此外，91%的家长认为谷歌等搜索引擎以及Facebook等社交网络不应该分享孩子的地理位置。另外，由Gallup发起的投票显示，三分之二的互联网用户认为广告商不应该被允许追踪自己的信息，并基于自己访问过的网站发布目标广告。
科技公司及广告商则认为这种追踪是无害的，停止后会束缚在线商务的发展，而这可是笔大买卖。今年上半年，网络广告营收达到了121亿美元。与此同时，网络隐私问题已经引起了监管部门的注意。
那么，维基解密网和

description.hltext_display: Polgárháborús veszély Elefántcsontparton
description.content: Választási veresége ellenére televíziós beszédében Laurent Gbagbo elefántcsontparti elnök ismét leszögezte, hogy ő az államfő, de hajlandó tárgyalni ellenfelével, Alassane Ouattarával és az őt támogató nemzetközi közösséggel az eddig legalább 50 halálos áldozatot követelő belpolitikai válság megoldásának érdekében.

description.hltext_display: Yes, Virginia ? you can say 'Merry Christmas'
description.author: Jamie Katz December
description.content:
A pair of high-spirited teenage girls scurried across a busy Manhattan intersection, braving the crowds and frosty weather to hit one more Fifth Avenue shop before closing time. I was a step behind them as they passed a Salvation Army Santa ringing his bell and a traffic cop in earmuffs.
"Merry Christmas!" one of the girls sang out to the policeman, who returned the greeting with a big smile and a wave.
Right away the mood changed.
"How can you say that?" the second girl admonished her friend. "I mean, what if he's Jewish?'"
"Well, I don't care, OK? I'm just sick of this 'Happy holidays' stuff."
I wish I'd flagged them down, because there's something I'd like to have told them very clearly: It's all right to say Merry Christmas. In fact, it's lovely.
I happen to be Jewish. And I've lived most of my life in New York City, where, on the whole, contrary to rumor, people of every faith, language and hue do a pretty good job of getting along.
Not once, ever, publicly or privately, have I heard anyone — Jewish, Muslim, Hindu, Cherokee, atheist or Aqua Buddhist — say he or she was insulted by a sincere holiday greeting that included the word Christmas.
Of course, if you're aware that someone celebrates a different tradition, it's nice to acknowledge that too. And if you have no idea whether he or she prefers Kwanzaa, Hanukkah or Omisoka, you can always say, "Happy Festivus for the rest of us!" or even "Happy holidays!" It's not that bad.
But just as Americans of every stripe acknowledge English as the common tongue, we all know that a hefty majority of us profess Christianity in one form or another. As long as we are free to do otherwise, where's the problem? Sane adults understand that a cheerful greeting is not an intolerant decree.
The confusion arises when government gets in on the act. The Founding Fathers made freedom of religion No. 1 in the Bill of Rights for a reason. They were born when people still remembered the days of wholesale massacres and hideous punishments in the name of religious doctrine: It was Christians killing Christians — and a lot of them fled Europe for these shores to practice their beliefs in freedom. Some early colonials — such as the New England Puritans — did attempt to impose religious laws by government fiat. (Not a jolly bunch, they also disapproved of Christmas festivities and had them banned in Boston for part of the 17th century.) But with a proliferation of diverse groups, saner heads prevailed.
And now we are all free to enjoy Christmas — yes, the celebration of the birth of Jesus Christ — just as we wish. For anyone, it can be beautiful to acknowledge his joyous tidings of peace, charity, hope and love.
"If I could work my will," Scrooge declares in Dickens' "A Christmas Carol," "every idiot who goes about with 'Merry Christmas' on his lips should be boiled with his own pudding, and buried with a stake of holly through his heart. He should!"
Well, bah humbug to that. Even Scrooge melted before the joy of the season — and the fear of death without loving connection.
So go ahead and say it, one and all: Merry Christmas!
Jamie Katz is a freelance writer and editor from New York City.

description.hltext_display: Koreas: North Korea softens tone as South kicks off largest ever military drills
description.author: News Wires
description.content:
AFP - South Korea prepared Wednesday for a major live-fire drill involving fighter jets and tanks near the tense North Korean border, as Seoul and Washington reacted warily to overtures from Pyongyang.
South Korea's military said Thursday's ground and air firing exercise 20 kilometres (12 miles) south of the mainland border would also involve self-propelled guns and 800 soldiers.
Although similar drills have been held at the same firing range at Pocheon many times before, the latest exercise comes with Seoul on high alert for a possible attack from its wayward neighbour.
South Korea's navy meanwhile began a four-day firing drill Wednesday off the east coast, a relatively distant 100 kilometres (60 miles) south of the border with the North, mobilising six warships plus helicopters.
The military said it would practise responses to intrusions by North Korean submarines and patrol boats.
And South Korean marines were posted to guard a Christmas tree that was lit up Tuesday near the land border, reflecting fears that the North might fire on the display as a propaganda symbol. Tensions have been high since the North shelled an island near the contested western maritime border last month in response to a live-fire drill by the South. The bombardment of Yeonpyeong killed four people including civilians. The South staged a repeat drill on Yeonpyeong Monday but the North did not go through with threats to hit back, saying it "did not feel any need to retaliate against every despicable military provocation". A senior South Korean military commander said Thursday's drill at the Pocheon range would "demonstrate our solid military preparedness". "We will retaliate thoroughly if the North commits another provocative act like the shelling of Yeonpyeong," First Armoured Battalion commander Choo Eun-Sik told Yonhap news agency. The North's comments late Monday eased fears of war on the peninsula, and it also reportedly offered nuclear concessions to visiting US politician Bill Richardson. But Seoul and Washington have expressed scepticism about the apparent overtures, coming after an intense bout of sabre-rattling from Pyongyang, whose hardline communist regime is undergoing a generational power shift.

description.content:
"中 지준율 내년에 23%까지 오른다"
"中 지준율 내년에 23%까지 오른다"
[이데일리] 입력 2010.12.22 17:26
"정부, 물가상승 억제위해 지준율 올릴 것"
내블로그에 저장
[이데일리 임일곤 기자] 중국 은행권의 지급준비율이 내년에 사상 최고치인 23%까지 오를 수 있다는 전망이 나왔다.
22일(현지시간) 차이나데일리에 따르면, 류 정웨이 흥업은행 수석 이코노미스트는 중국 정부가 인플레이션을 억제하기 위해 내년에 지급준비율을 23%까지 올릴 것이라고 말했다. 이는 인민은행이 그동안 제시한 지급준비율 중 최고치다.
류 이코노미스트는 이날 한 포럼 연설에서 "미국의 양적완화 정책과 중국의 과도한 유동성 및 임금 인상으로 중국 정부는 내년에 인플레이션을 통제해야 한다"며 이같이 주장했다.
그는 당장 지준율이 내년 1분기 부터 오를 것으로 전망했다. 지준율이 현재 18.5%에서 4.5%포인트 오를 경우 되면 최소 1조3000억위안(1950억달러)의 유동성이 묶일 것이라고 분석했다.
앞서 장 샤오휘 인민은행 통화정책위원회 위원장도 올해초 성명서에서 지준율이 23.5%까지 오를 수 있다고 언급한 바 있다.
중국의 물가상승률은 최근 가빠른 추세를 보이고 있다. 지난 11월 중국 소비자물가지수(CPI)는 연율 5.1%를 기록해 28개월래 가장 빠른 속도를 보였다.
한편 중국 통화당국은 과도한 유동성 흡수를 위해 전체 예금기관을 대상으로 올 들어 6차례 지준율을 인상한 바 있다. 지난 10일 인민은행이 전체 예금기관에 지급준비율 0.5%포인트 인상한 것을 감안하면 오는 20일부터 6개 대형은행에 적용되는 지준율은 19%가 된다. 또한 기타 대형 은행들은 18.5%, 중소 은행은 16.5%가 적용된다.
＜ⓒ종합 경제정보 미디어 이데일리 - 무단전재&재배포 금지＞

description.hltext_display: Heartwarming Holiday Virals - ‘A Starry Night’ Uses iPads & iPhones to Bring Holiday Che (VIDEO)
description.content:
Whether or not you?re a big fan of the holidays, ?A Starry Night? is one viral video that everyone needs to check out. With its various iPad and iPhone users, people have never made electronics look so heartwarming.
For all the bah humbugs in your life, ?A Starry Night? is the perfect thing to send to brighten up the holiday spirit.
Check out the video yourself and get ready to warm your heart with smiles and the spirit of the holidays.

description.hltext_display: Hochwasser in Los Angeles - Orkan im Anzug
“인터넷 광고 빅뱅, 트렌드를 주도해야”
description.content:
“ 빅뱅, 트렌드를 주도해야” 정윤희 기자 yuni@zdnet.co.kr 2010.12.22 / PM 04:46 , , “지금 미디어 광고 시장은 한마디로 빅뱅입니다. 새로운 플랫폼들이 지속적으로 시장에 나오고 있죠. 그 안에서 트렌드를 선도해 나가야지, 아니면 답이 없습니다.”
스마트폰, 태블릿PC 등 디바이스들의 출현에 온라인 광고업계의 요동이 더욱 거세지고 있다. 최용석 대표는 현재 시장 상황에 대해 ‘빅뱅’이라고 잘라 말한다. 내년 시장은 ‘카오스’라 표현했다. 앞으로는 업계 트렌드를 따라가느냐, 아니면 끌고 가느냐가 더욱 중요해질 것이란 얘기다. ▲ 최용석 대표지난 2002년 설립된 는 업계 2위의 업체다. 인터넷, 모바일 광고컨설팅에서부터 자체 온라인 솔루션 개발까지 서비스 분야도 다양하다. 지난해 매출만 430억을 달성했으며 확보한 광고주만도 2천여곳이 넘는다. 본사에서 만난 최 대표는 IT 컨설턴트 출신답게 얼리어답터였다. 트위터를 즐겨 사용하며, 애플에 대한 관심이 많다. ‘애플의 전략’이라는 책도 썼을 정도다. 전반적인 시장의 트렌드에 민감하다보니 자연히 애플에 시선이 갈수밖에 없었다. 최 대표는 애플이 시장에도 큰 영향을 미쳤다고 생각한다.
“아이폰, 아이패드는 ‘울림’을 준 물건이라고 생각해요. 웹생태계에 큰 파장을 일으켰죠. 그동안 콘텐츠 사업자들의 길이 너무 좁았다면 이제는 업로드하는 것만으로 유통이 가능한 시장이 열렸습니다. 역시 마찬가집니다. 아이폰과 아이패드로 인해 모바일 광고 시장이 폭발적으로 성장하고, 다양한 광고 모델이 나오는 등 변화된 것이 많죠.”
■변화하는 마케팅 환경, ‘소통’이 무기
“초창기 온라인 광고에는 배너만 있었습니다. 포털 메인 배너나 이메일에 삽입되는 것 말이죠. 그러나 지금은 검색 광고가 대세죠. 지금에 와서는 소비자의 사용경험(UX) 자체가 과거와는 많이 바뀌고 있습니다. 기존 광고 시장이 검색을 하고 소비하는 단계에 머물렀다면, 지금은 커뮤니케이션 단계에 접어든 셈이죠.”
마케팅도 적극적으로 고객과 커뮤니케이션해야 한다는 얘기다. 과거처럼 대량 생산 식의 광고는 더 이상 소비자에게 통하지 않는다는 것. 최 대표는 일례로 최근 뜨고 있는 소셜네트워크서비스(SNS) 마케팅을 들었다.
“이제 가격을 무기로 하는 광고는 끝났습니다. 사용자도 적극적인 모습을 보이며, 온라인 광고도 소통을 중시하는 쪽으로 점점 바뀌는 추세죠. SNS 대응이 기업 마케팅에서 점차 중요한 위치를 차지해 갈 것입니다.”
다만, SNS를 소통의 수단이 아닌 단순 홍보 수단으로 사용하는 것은 지양해야 한다는 주문이다. 현재 는 온, 오프라인, 유무선 모두에서 사용자 행태를 지속적으로 분석하는 중이다. 여태껏 모아둔 이용자 행태의 데이터베이스(DB)를 무기로 좀 더 효과적인 마케팅을 진행하겠다는 것이 목표다.
“온, 오프라인을 통해 사용자 행태를 계속 주시 중이에요. 어떤 광고의 경우 온라인에서도, 혹은 오프라인에서도 높은 클릭을 보인다던가 하는 것 말이죠. 어떤 계절에는 이런 광고가 필요하더라 하는 것도요. 이런 식으로 쌓인 데이터는 저희뿐만 아니라 광고주의 무기가 될 것입니다.”
■마케팅 시장, 노력 없으면 뒤쳐져
최 대표는 끊임없이 자기 자신을 갈고 닦는다. 책을 읽는 것은 기본(?)이고, 마케팅 트렌드에 대한 칼럼을 홈페이지에 연재한다. 창의력을 발휘하기 위해 지난 10월부터 포토샵을 배워 습작을 하나둘씩 트위터에 올리기도 했다. 역시 마찬가지다. 조직도 끊임없이 공부하고, 변화해가야 한다는 것이 최 대표의 지론이다. 에서는 한 달에 한 번 전체 직원들을 대상으로 한 교육을 실시한다. 교육 내용은 마케팅 시장 전반에 대한 것에서부터 소셜네트워크서비스(SNS) 마케팅 등 다양하다. 시시각각으로 트렌드가 변하는 마케팅 시장인 만큼, 업계를 선도하지 못하면 뒤처지기 십상이라는 논리다.
최 대표는 “토요일 오전에 교육을 실시하기 때문에 직원들에게 미안한 마음도 있다”면서도 “마케팅의 경우 직원들이 다 같이 트렌드를 이해하고 공유할 때 더더욱 큰 시너지 효과가 난다”고 못을 박았다.
최 대표는 내년의 마케팅 시장 전망을 ‘모바일’에서 찾았다. 지난해 애플 아이폰이 국내 출시되면서 유무선 연동의 스타트를 끊었다는 주장이다.
“스마트폰이 확산되면서 사용자 환경은 달라지고 있습니다. 대화, 메시지, 광고 모두 웹, 모바일을 가리지 않죠. 지금도 초창기적 형태의 모바일 광고 상품이 나오고 있지만, 이런 현상이 내년에는 더욱 심화될 것입니다.”
최 대표는 “계속 변화해가는 앞으로의 환경에서는 어떤 플랫폼에서건 스토리텔링이 묻어나는 광고를 해야 한다”며 “광고 회사에 있으면 머리카락이 모두 하얘질 것”이라고 웃었다.

description.hltext_display: 10大令美企汗颜亚洲科技公司：中国公司占6席
description.author: TechWeb.com.cn
description.content:
【TechWeb报道】12月22日消息，据国外媒体报道，美国科技博客businessinsider撰文称，美国的互联网公司在全球处于主导地位，除了亚洲。美国互联网企业努力在亚洲市场耕耘，但亚洲的高科技公司根基深，更聪明，更了解本土市场。
以下是businessinsider列举的亚洲迅速崛起的高科技公司：
1.百度
Google开拓中国市场多年，但今年初基本放弃了努力，将站点迁至香港。
百度则打败谷歌成为非常成功的中文搜索引擎，占有中国60%的搜索市场和6%的全球市场，其全球市场份额与Bing持平。
甚至在某种程度上说，99%的中国网民都使用百度(当然，他们也使用其它搜索引擎，这解释了百度60%的市场占有率)。
2.腾讯
腾讯是全球第三大市值互联网公司，超过eBay和雅虎。腾讯以QQ发家，现在成为了中国最大的社交网络。腾讯的收入不仅来自广告，还包括虚拟商品和社交游戏，在此领域，Facebook和Zynga在中国无所作为。
此外，腾讯完成了AOL未完成的事：在即时消息以外建立业务。
3.土豆网
土豆网是中国版的YouTube，公平来讲，YouTube应该被称为美国版的土豆网。因为土豆网在2005年4月上线，而YouTube正式版则在同年11月上线。
现在，土豆取得了巨大的成功，拥有4000万视频内容，月访问用户超2亿，已融得1.3亿美元资金。土豆网起初提供用户原创内容，但这种方式很难在中国盈利，目前土豆网已在购买版权内容，与中国版YouTube相比更像是中国版的Hulu。
4.优士网
美国著名商务社交网站LinkedIn在中国无所作为。优士网是中国版LinkedIn网站之一，或许也是最成功的。
优士网由中国100位商业领袖创立，是一个实行邀请制的私密商务社交平台，似乎打算主导中国的个人社交网络。
5.淘宝网
eBay曾大举进攻中国，在经营数年花费了大量资金后，eBay在中国又回到了起点。
而淘宝是中国最大的C2C平台，该网站2009年商品交易总额约为290亿美元。
6.美团网
美团网是最大的中国版Groupon网站。
Groupon尚未打开中国市场。有传闻称美团网向红杉资本融资500万美元，美团网有机会让Groupon在中国对其无法构成威胁。
7.Naver（韩国搜索引擎）
Naver是韩国最大的搜索引擎，市场份额超过70%，Google在韩国的份额为2%。
与Google不同的是，Naver并不抓取网页，也不根据链接对网页进行排名，因为Naver初创时，韩语互联网的规模还太小。
相反，Naver类似于一个问答服务，韩国互联网用户互相帮助超找信息，在此基础上产生的海量数据成为Naver搜索引擎数据库的主要内容。
社交搜索在硅谷是一大流行词，但事实上它已在韩国存在了10年以上。
8.Mixi（日本社交网站）
Facebook侧重在真实身份社交，日本的社交网络用户则喜欢使用昵称和头像。此外，日本网民很注重保护自己的隐私，在这一点上，Facebook提倡更开放。
这就是为何Mixi能主宰日本的社交网络。Mixi在日本的市场份额达到80%，该公司已在日本上市。
9.GREE（日本LBS网站）
Foursquare在美国的LBS(基于位置服务)领域风生水起，但在日本，Mixi主宰基于桌面的社交网络，GREE则统治移动社交网络。GREE 2008年在东京证券交易所上至，估值为10亿美元。
10.乐天(日本电子商务网站)
乐天是日本最大的电子商务公司，它不走亚马逊或eBay的商业模式，而是拥有自己独特的B2B2C模式。现有商店、卖家和公司都可以在乐天上建立店面。
因为乐天没有自己的库存，它的净利润率达到了20%，使得乐天拥有丰厚的资本可以扩张到其它的类别。在中国，乐天与百度建立起伙伴关系，这是一个聪明的主意，因为百度需要商业专家，而乐天需要中国伙伴。此外乐天还收购了美国网站Buy.com及法国最大电子商务网站PriceMinister.com。显然乐天具有全球野心，让人无法小视。
也有一些服务在亚洲取得了成功：
1.Twitter
Twitter在日本很流行，许多日本名人使用Twitter服务，Twitter在日本还推出了一种付费服务：付费阅读流行歌手的Twitter消息。一些人将Twitter在日本的成功归功于其极简约的网站设计风格，虽然大多数成功的日本网站在西方人看来都有些杂乱。
2.雅虎
雅虎可能是在日本最成功的西方互联网公司。雅虎日本是日本最大的门户网站，遥遥领先于Google。此外，雅虎还拥有阿里巴巴39%的股份。事实上，当前雅虎的大部分价值来自亚洲资产。
雅虎在日本的成功为其他美国公司上了一课：在任何情况下，都要与本地公司合作，例如在中国是阿里巴巴，在日本是软银。要谦逊地进入当地市场，而不是照搬美国的模式。
也许这是Google或

description.hltext_display: U.S. Population: 308,745,538
description.content:
The U.S. population as of April 1 was 308,745,538 people, a 9.76 percent growth over the 2000 population, Census Bureau Director Robert Groves said Tuesday.
Among other things, the census declares the number of seats each state has in the 435-member House of Representatives and is linked to state redistricting to ensure congressional districts are roughly equal in population. The census also helps determine how federal funding is distributed.
The changes in population means a shift of 12 House seats affecting 18 states, Groves said during a news conference. States gaining seats include Arizona, Florida, Georgia, Nevada, South Carolina, Texas, Utah and Washington. Losing seats will be Illinois, Iowa, Louisiana, Massachusetts, Michigan, Missouri, New Jersey, New York, Ohio and Pennsylvania.
Thirty-two states experienced no change in House representation, Groves said.
With four, Texas gained most seats, Groves said. It marks the seventh consecutive census in which Texas saw a gain in congressional representation, he said.
California will have 53 House seats, followed by Texas with 36 seats, and New York and Florida tied at 27 seats, Groves said. Seven states have one representatives.
The average population size for congressional district is 710,767 people, up from 646,952 people in 2000, Groves said.
Starting in February, the Census Bureau will begin releasing to states information that can be used in redistricting, he said.
The most populous state was California, with 37,253,956 people and Wyoming was the least populous, with 563,626 people. Regionally, the South and the West picked up most of the population increase, 14,318,924 and 8,747,621 people. The Northeast and the Midwest reported smaller gains of 1,722,862 and 2,534,225.
Commerce Secretary Gary Locke, in whose department the Census Bureau resides, called Tuesday "a really important day for the American people."
He said the census came in on time and was $1.87 billion under budget. Its operating budget was about $7 billion.
He thanked Americans for either mailing in the 10-question form or responding to census-takers when they followed up to take the information in person.

description.hltext_display: Utah dance teacher Joan P. Kingston dies
description.content:
12:52AM
Friends and family say it seems only fitting to say goodbye to Joan P. Kingston, one of Utah’s dance pioneers, from center stage.
Kingston, an original dancer with the Ririe-Woodbury Dance Company and a longtime Utah dance teacher, died Dec. 19. A celebration of her life will be held Tuesday from 2-4 p.m. at Rowland Hall’s Larimer Center in Salt Lake City.
As a performer, Kingston will be remembered for a dynamic stage presence and grand sense of theater. Company co-founder Joan Woodbury recalled Kingston as “a fabulous dancer, skilled at tap, as well as modern dance, ballet and musical comedy.”
Kingston studied and performed with celebrated choreographers such as Jerome Robbins, Alwin Nikolais, Murray Louis, Anna Sokolow, Lucas Hoving, Willam Christensen, Ruth Currie and Yuriko Kikuchi.
In 2006, she was given the Utah Dance Education Orgaizations’s lifetime achievement award for her work teaching thousands of students during a 50-year teaching career.
Kingston launched the first dance programs at East and Olympus high schools, where she started the first male dance class. From 1985 to 2003, she taught at Rowland Hall-St. Mark’s, where she motivated students to think independently and imagine creatively.
“Joan gave me a place where I could blossom and thrive, not just as a dancer but as a young person,” said James Pierce, a former student who became a musical theater performer in Utah and on Broadway. “I don’t know that I would have had a career in dance had it not been for all that Joan gave to me.”
Rudi Riet, now a systems analyst at Georgetown University, remembered Kingston’s dance classes as a highlight of his high school days. “I was a ski racer in Rowmark Ski Academy — not the typical dance class target audience at the time — and Joan made me feel just as needed and talented as the folks who had dance credentials in the class,” he said.
Published Dec 16, 2010 06:18:02PM 0 Comments
Published Dec 14, 2010 06:43:01PM 0 Comments
Published Dec 10, 2010 07:06:03AM 0 Comments
Nationally, Kingston served as a dance consultant for the National Endowment for the Arts, traveling all over the country to mentor teachers. She served on the Utah Arts Council Dance Advisory panel, helped write the core curriculum for the Utah State Office of Education and, for many years, headed the Utah Dance Association.
Joan was born to Mildred Penrose (and John Tanner, whom she never met) on June 29, 1932 in St. Anthony, Idaho. She was raised by her grandmother, Ruth McQuarrie Penrose, and a tight-knit family of aunts, uncles and cousins.
She earned a degree in modern dance at the University of Utah, and married Ray Kingston in 1956. Together they raised three children: Erik, Patricia Quirk and Kait Kingston-Eckman.
Kingston was diagnosed with Pick’s disease in 2007, which robbed her of the ability to speak and write, yet she continued to communicate through expressions and gestures, even in her final moments. “Her arms were under the blankets, and I kept seeing the blanket rise,” said daughter Kingston-Eckman. “After about three times, she just lifted her arms completely out of the covers. There was effort involved in this, like ‘I have to reach, I have to reach.’ I felt like it was fitting that it was very dance-like.”
Dance critic Kathy Adams was a colleague of Joan Kingston on the Rowland-Hall staff.

description.hltext_display: Population growth pushes New Mexico to 2 million
description.author: Adriana Gómez Licón \ El Paso Times
description.content:
2010 Census Map
Census 2010
When census numbers were revealed Tuesday, Sun Belt states scored another victory at the expense of the Rust Belt region.
Western and Southern states gained more congressional seats as the Midwest and Northeast lost political power, according to the first installment of the 2010 count unveiled by the U.S. Census Bureau.
Western states had increased their population by 19.7 percent from 1990 to 2000, but this time around the states grew by 13.8 percent.
Sparsely populated New Mexico followed the Western trend. The state added 240,133 people, for a 13.2 percent increase to 2 million people. The growth was below the threshold needed to add one more representative.
Adelamar Alcantara, director of the geospatial and population studies
Census factoids about your city and region
at the University of New Mexico, said building permits began to precipitously drop after 2006.
"I am surprised that we even grew," she said.
New Mexico, Alcantara said, has never generated as many jobs as Nevada, Utah or Arizona, where political power in the U.S. is shifting.
In the early 2000s, jet manufacturer Eclipse Aviation and an Intel plant in Rio Rancho created jobs. But in the past few years, the economy sank.
Several call centers, for example, have closed. Alcantara said the fast rise and fall of Eclipse Aviation at Albuquerque left many people jobless.
"There's no major economic driver in New Mexico," she said. "It's primarily government."
One of the sparks of hope for New Mexico's private economy is Lea County,
where a uranium-enrichment facility is supplying vast amounts of nuclear energy to the nation, Alcantara said.
The nation as a whole grew 9.7 percent to 308,745,538 people, said Robert Groves, director of the Census Bureau. It is the slowest growth rate since 1940, he said.
The South gained eight seats in the U.S. House of Representatives -- four in Texas and two in Florida -- but lost one in Louisiana. South Carolina and Georgia also earned one seat each. In the West, Arizona, Nevada, Utah and Washington each gained one seat.
The big losers were Ohio and New York, which each lost two seats in the House. More states in the Midwest and Northeast lost congressional representation.
The Census Bureau allocated 435 seats based on a formula of equal distribution. The states that have the largest numerical increases in population receive more congressmen. Now, each representative has on average 710,767 constituents.
Texas gained 4.3 million people, more than the Northeast and the Midwest regions combined. Now the Lone Star State's population is 25.1 million.
Nevada was the fastest-growing state. It increased its population by 35.1 percent to 2.7 million.
Michigan was the only state where population fell. It lost 54,804 people and is now at 9,883,640.
The South and the West had been expanding in the past few decades and between the early and mid-2000s, mostly driven by immigration.
But the growth slowed because of the recession and tougher laws against undocumented immigrants.
In Colorado, the economic growth was stronger in the 1990s, and population counts reflect it.
The state added more than 1 million people between 1990 and 2000 -- a growth of 30.6 percent. But this decade it gained 727,935 people, or a 16.9 percent rise.
"In the 1990s, we were gaining all sorts of different types of jobs high-tech, telecom," state demo grapher Elizabeth Garner said.
She said the two recessions hit Colorado's labor market. Still, it is a destination for people migrating for outdoor recreation opportunities, Garner said.
"People come to Colorado for certain amenities," she said.
Adriana Gómez Licón may be reached at agomez@elpasotimes.com; 546-6129.

description.hltext_display: Buyers circle Burrup Fertilisers
description.content: Major players are circling Burrup Fertilisers Pty Ltd after being placed in receivership last week, PPB Advisory says. PPB Advisory was appointed as receivers on Friday by Burrup's lenders ANZ Banking Group Ltd following a default by Burrup and its financial guarantors Pankaj Oswal and Radhika Oswal. It followed ongoing litigation between Oswal Group and Norwegian group Yara International, which owns 35 per cent of Burrup, and other matters including potential financial irregularities, ANZ said. Burrup Fertilisers is the largest ammonium producer in the country, with its plant near Karratha in the Pilbara. It produces around 800,000 tonnes each year. It is understood that ANZ, Burrup's main financiers, called in the receivers, and it has been reported the bank is owed around $800 million. "Numerous enquiries from parties expressing interest in acquiring the business have been received," PPB Advisory said on Wednesday in a statement. "These parties are all significant players in the sector, each with the capacity to undertake an acquisition transaction of this magnitude." Incitec Pivot and Wesfarmers Ltd are seen as likely bidders but Commonwealth Bank Global Markets Research said Yarra International had the shortest odds. "Owning 35 per cent of the asset already and its contract to distribute production put Yarra in the box seat," it said. PPB Advisory said the plant was performing well, with production running ahead of forecast. "Cashflow has been strong since the appointment," it said. "Sufficient liquidity is available for suppliers now - in contrast to the position prior to the appointment." ANZ on Friday said it "expects to make a full recovery" of monies owed by Burrup. Mr Oswal on Monday fired back at media reports that he had fled the country, saying he was in India visiting his daughter and would return to Perth early next month. "It should also be noted that the company is highly profitable," he said in an emailed statement. Mr and Mrs Oswal are frequently seen in Perth's social pages for their lavish parties and are halfway through building what is arguably Australia's most expensive house in the swanky suburb of Peppermint Grove.

event_or_fact.property: It should also be noted that the company is highly profitable
he had fled the country, saying he was in India visiting his daughter and would return to Perth early next month.

description.hltext_display: Takter årets tränare
description.content:
Jimmy Takter har fått Glen Garnsey Award som Årets Tränare i USA.
Foto: TARZAN
[Idag 07:20]: De amerikanska hästsportjournalisterna har röstat fram Jimmy Takter som Årets Tränare, The Glen Garnsey Award.
Bakom utnämningen finns förstås Hambletoniansegern med Muscle Massive, men även Jimmys förmåga att presentera sina talanger i stallet på perfekt sätt. Att Takter dessutom haft stora framgångar med passgångare, däribland obesegrade See You At Peelers, har gjort sitt till.
Totalt har Takters hästar vunnit 119 lopp och hans hästar har tjänat 7,9 miljoner dollar.
George Brennan tog hem titeln Årets körsven. Han har suttit bakom passgångaren Shark Gesture som har dominerat under säsongen, och körde även danskägde Wishing Stone till seger i Kentucky Futurity.
Brennan blev under året elfte körsven i historien som passerade 100 miljoner dollar inkört totalt i karriären.
Takter och Brennan kommer att få sina utmärkelser och hyllas 27 februari i Fort Lauderdale.

description.hltext_display: "中 지준율 내년에 23%까지 오른다"
description.content:
[이데일리] 입력 2010.12.22 17:26
"정부, 물가상승 억제위해 지준율 올릴 것"
내블로그에 저장
[이데일리 임일곤 기자] 중국 은행권의 지급준비율이 내년에 사상 최고치인 23%까지 오를 수 있다는 전망이 나왔다.
22일(현지시간) 차이나데일리에 따르면, 류 정웨이 흥업은행 수석 이코노미스트는 중국 정부가 인플레이션을 억제하기 위해 내년에 지급준비율을 23%까지 올릴 것이라고 말했다. 이는 인민은행이 그동안 제시한 지급준비율 중 최고치다.
류 이코노미스트는 이날 한 포럼 연설에서 "미국의 양적완화 정책과 중국의 과도한 유동성 및 임금 인상으로 중국 정부는 내년에 인플레이션을 통제해야 한다"며 이같이 주장했다.
그는 당장 지준율이 내년 1분기 부터 오를 것으로 전망했다. 지준율이 현재 18.5%에서 4.5%포인트 오를 경우 되면 최소 1조3000억위안(1950억달러)의 유동성이 묶일 것이라고 분석했다.
앞서 장 샤오휘 인민은행 통화정책위원회 위원장도 올해초 성명서에서 지준율이 23.5%까지 오를 수 있다고 언급한 바 있다.
중국의 물가상승률은 최근 가빠른 추세를 보이고 있다. 지난 11월 중국 소비자물가지수(CPI)는 연율 5.1%를 기록해 28개월래 가장 빠른 속도를 보였다.
한편 중국 통화당국은 과도한 유동성 흡수를 위해 전체 예금기관을 대상으로 올 들어 6차례 지준율을 인상한 바 있다. 지난 10일 인민은행이 전체 예금기관에 지급준비율 0.5%포인트 인상한 것을 감안하면 오는 20일부터 6개 대형은행에 적용되는 지준율은 19%가 된다. 또한 기타 대형 은행들은 18.5%, 중소 은행은 16.5%가 적용된다.
＜ⓒ종합 경제정보 미디어 이데일리 - 무단전재&재배포 금지＞
내블로그에 저장
"中 지준율 내년에 23%까지 오른다" [이데일리 임일곤 기자] 중국 은행권의 지급준비율이 내년에 사상 최고치인 23%까지 오를 수 있다는 전망이 나왔다.
22일(현지시간) 차이나데일리에 따르면, 류 정웨이 흥업은행 수석 이코노미스트는 중국 정부가 인플레이션을 억제하기 위해 내년에 지급준비율을 23%까지 올릴 것이라고 말했다. 이는 인민은행이 그동안 제시한 지급준비율 중 최고치다.
류 이코노미스트는 이날 한 포럼 연설에서 "미국의 양적완화 정책과 중국의 과도한 유동성 및 임금 인상으로 중국 정부는 내년에 인플레이션을 통제해야 한다"며 이같이 주장했다.
그는 당장 지준율이 내년 1분기 부터 오를 것으로 전망했다. 지준율이 현재 18.5%에서 4.5%포인트 오를 경우 되면 최소 1조3000억위안(1950억달러)의 유동성이 묶일 것이라고 분석했다.
앞서 장 샤오휘 인민은행 통화정책위원회 위원장도 올해초 성명서에서 지준율이 23.5%까지 오를 수 있다고 언급한 바 있다.
중국의 물가상승률은 최근 가빠른 추세를 보이고 있다. 지난 11월 중국 소비자물가지수(CPI)는 연율 5.1%를 기록해 28개월래 가장 빠른 속도를 보였다.
한편 중국 통화당국은 과도한 유동성 흡수를 위해 전체 예금기관을 대상으로 올 들어 6차례 지준율을 인상한 바 있다. 지난 10일 인민은행이 전체 예금기관에 지급준비율 0.5%포인트 인상한 것을 감안하면 오는 20일부터 6개 대형은행에 적용되는 지준율은 19%가 된다. 또한 기타 대형 은행들은 18.5%, 중소 은행은 16.5%가 적용된다.
＜ⓒ종합 경제정보 미디어 이데일리 - 무단전재&재배포 금지＞

description.hltext_display: Freed, gun-owner wants to clear his name
description.author: JASON NARK
description.content:
THE RAZOR WIRE atop the prison fence glistened yesterday morning and winter's first winds whipped tears from Sue Aitken's eyes. But the foreboding walls, the frigid air and almost two years of guilt did not dampen her mood. "I haven't woken up with a smile in a long, long time," she said, beaming with excitement as she went inside.
An hour later, her son, Brian Aitken, 27, walked out of Mid-State Correctional Facility, in Burlington County near Fort Dix, less than 24 hours after New Jersey Gov. Chris Christie commuted to time-served his seven-year sentence for weapons possession.
Christie's decision followed media coverage including a Nov. 30 Daily News story that attracted national attention and drew support for Aitken in hundreds of online comments on the newspaper's website, philly.com. Aitken's attorney, Evan Nappen, said Monday that the People Paper's coverage had "played a part in freeing an innocent man." Back at the Aitken residence in Mount Laurel, having left the prison together yesterday, mother and son shared a long, silent embrace in the driveway - just a few yards from where his life fell apart on Jan. 2, 2009. "This is it," he said. "This is where it all began." On that day, Aitken, an entrepreneur, media consultant and graduate student, had told his mother that his life wasn't worth living anymore after his ex-wife canceled visitation with their young son. When he left the house, Sue Aitken called the police out of concern, but hung up before they answered.
Police showed up anyway, found handguns in the trunk of his car, and Sue Aitken has grappled with her decision ever since. Although Aitken bought the weapons legally in Colorado, he was convicted and sentenced to seven years in prison. "Brian knows how I feel about calling 9-1-1," Sue Aitken, her voice choked with emotion, said yesterday at a kitchen table covered in Christmas cards, paperwork and a white poinsettia.
Aitken stared at his mother across the table while she grappled with the memory. He has said that he does not blame her for his arrest.
Sporting a beard and a shaggy head of hair, Aitken avoided extravagance in his first hours of freedom in four months, opting for a hot shower and a shave, a cold beer with a slice of pizza, and spending the holidays with his family. "I could really go for a Yuengling and a slice of Mack and Manco's," he said, referring to a popular dining spot on the Ocean City boardwalk. He'll also get a frozen container of turkey-noodle soup that his mom's been saving to savor during the long stretches of silence. "I haven't had any alone time," he said. "For 24 hours a day, I'm on a tier with 40 guys. Someone is always awake, someone is always smoking and someone is always yelling." His biggest priority, he said, is getting the opportunity again to see his son, Logan; he lost all visitation rights after his arrest. "That's what this all boils down to. For the last two years, I just wanted to be my son's father," he said. "I'm looking to spend the next couple of days on the phone with anyone who can help me see my son again." Christie's commutation does not clear Aitken's conviction or criminal record, and he has yet to hear from the New Jersey appellate court. He is not content with freedom, though, and plans a return to court. "This is not over," he said. His case, he said, hinges on an exemption in New Jersey's gun laws that allows gun owners to transport their weapons if moving to another residence. Aitken had moved back to New Jersey from Colorado, where he purchased the guns legally in 2007, and claims he was in the process of moving from his family's home in Mount Laurel to Hoboken at the time of the arrest.
When police searched his car in Mount Laurel on Jan. 2, 2009, they found handguns, locked and unloaded in a box in the trunk of his car, along with hollow-point bullets and high-capacity magazines. One officer said he also saw boxes of clothes and dishes in Aitken's car.
The Burlington County Prosecutor's Office and former Superior Court Judge James J. Morley both said that Aitken's defense team did not present enough evidence at trial to support the moving exemption. Although the jury asked to see the exemption on three separate occasions, Morley refused. The Burlington County Prosecutor's Office declined to comment on Aitken's commutation. Shortly after Aitken's trial concluded, Christie chose not to reappoint Morley, partly because of rulings he had made in an animal-cruelty case involving a police officer and calves and another involving a 45-year-old teacher's aide who had sex with a 16-year-old boy.
Morley yesterday told the Daily News that Christie's decision to commute Aitken's sentence was "hardly shocking" but said it was no reflection on his own conduct during the trial. "The governor's actions were based on the facts of the case and the severity of the sentence," he said. "I neither wrote the statute nor sentenced Mr. Aitken, although the sentence, particularly the three-year period of parole ineligibility, is mandatory under the statute." Aitken's release was lauded by gun-rights groups, including the NRA, which called New Jersey's gun laws "ridiculous." But Bryan Miller, executive director of CeaseFire NJ, an organization devoted to reducing gun violence, cautioned that gun-rights advocates shouldn't read too much into Christie's decis

description.hltext_display: KISA, 연탄 나눔 봉사활동 펼쳐
description.content:
, 연탄 나눔 봉사활동 펼쳐 정현정 기자 iam@zdnet.co.kr 2010.12.22 / PM 04:47 , ()은 22일 송파구 거여동에서 노사가 함께하는 ‘사랑의 연탄 나눔’ 봉사활동을 벌였다.
지역주민을 위한 사회공헌활동의 일환으로 실시된 이번 ‘사랑의 연탄 나눔’ 봉사에는 추운 날씨에도 불구하고 e콜센터 118 상담원을 비롯한 임직원, 노조위원장과 한국인터넷드림단원 등 총 118명이 참여했다.
직원들이 매월 급여에서 자발적으로 기부한 성금으로 마련된 연탄 3천장은 송파구 거여동의 15가구에 전달됐다.▲ ()은 22일 송파구 거여동에서 노사가 함께하는 ‘사랑의 연탄 나눔’ 봉사활동을 벌였다. 이날 봉사활동에는 서종렬 원장(가운데)를 비롯해 임직원과 노조위원장, 한국인터넷드림단원 등 118여명이 함께 했다.는 지금까지 IT기관의 특성을 살려 어르신을 위한 인터넷 효앨범을 증정하는 ‘인터넷 세대공감’과 정보보호 온누리 캠페인·사랑의 헌혈운동·사랑의 자선장터 개최·노숙자 대상 무료배식·영아 일시보호 봉사·118 사랑의 쌀나누기 후원 등을 실천하는 ‘인터넷 지역공감’ 등 사회공헌활동을 실시해 왔다. 서종렬 원장은 “소외된 이웃들이 추운 겨울을 따뜻하게 보내는데 조금이나마 도움이 되기를 바란다”며 “앞으로 는 다양한 사회공헌 활동을 통해 사회적 책임을 다하는 기관, 지역주민에게 더 가까이 다가가는 기관이 되겠다”고 말했다.

description.hltext_display: The Energy/Water Nexus
description.content:
Liquid fuels production and the generation of electricity from many sources requires substantial amounts of water. In addition to considerations about water quantity, is water quality affected in the process of meeting society’s increasing energy requirements? Plan to participate in this important discussion on the relationship of energy and water. This discussion will be moderated by Judy Adler, senior program officer, Turner Foundation
John Crittenden, director, Brook Byers Institute for Sustainable Systems, Georgia Tech
Dr. Crittenden’s research interests involve pollution prevention, energy/water dynamics, heat and mass transfer and systems modeling. He is a member of the National Academy of Engineering and is a Georgia Research Alliance Eminent Scholar. Dr. Crittenden has a PhD in Civil and Environmental Engineering from the University of Michigan.
Brennan Smith, program manager, Wind and Water Power Technologies, Oak Ridge National Laboratory
Dr. Smith’s work focuses on energy, water and environmental optimization in hydropower-thermal systems. Specific interests include: energy-water interdependencies in regulated water basins, water use optimization for integrated river systems and effect of hydropower on water availability and riverine ecosystems. Dr. Smith’s PhD in Civil and Environmental Engineering is from the University of Iowa.

event_or_fact.property: Brook Byers Institute for Sustainable Systems

description.hltext_display: Boka: "Möchte mir einen Namen machen"
description.content:
(FIFA.com) Mittwoch 22. Dezember 2010
Er ist zwar nur 1,67 Meter groß und wiegt gerade einmal 67 Kilogramm, doch auf dem Platz beweist das Kraftpaket aus der Elfenbeinküste, was in ihm steckt. Die Rede ist von Arthur Boka. Der gelernte Verteidiger spielt mittlerweile in seiner fünften Saison in der Bundesliga für den VfB Stuttgart und gehört dort zu den Stützen seines Teams.
Seine Statur und Spielweise ähnelt indes der eines ehemaligen Weltmeisters aus Brasilien, woher auch sein Spitzname afrikanischer Roberto Carlos stammt. "Es freut mich, dass ich mit einem so großen Spieler verglichen werde. Doch ich bin Arthur Boka und möchte mir selbst einen Namen machen", sagte der selbstbewusste Internationale im Interview mit FIFA.com.
Bokas Fussballer-Laufbahn begann in seiner Heimat Abidjan, wo der Linksfuß im April 1983 das Licht der Welt erblickte. In der dortigen Fussballschule von ASEC Mimosas fiel er schnell den europäischen Talent-Spähern auf und wechselte 2002 nach Belgien zum KSV Beveren. Von der Jupiler League führte ihn sein Weg nach Frankreich zu Racing Straßburg, wo ihm in der Ligue 1 endgültig der internationale Durchbruch gelang.
Sprungbrett FIFA WM™
Nach der FIFA WM 2006™ in Deutschland, bei der Boka alle drei Gruppenspiele mit den Elefanten bestritt, verpflichtete der VfB Stuttgart den Abwehrspieler und sollte diesen Schritt in der Folgezeit auch nicht bereuen.
"Der deutsche Fussball hat in den vergangenen Jahren unheimlich an Qualität gewonnen. Die Bundesliga gehört zu den stärksten Ligen der Welt. Neben dem Sportlichen gibt es Unterschiede vor allem in der Infrastruktur. Stadien und Trainingszentren sind hier auf dem modernsten Stand", verglich Boka die Bedingungen in Belgien und Frankreich mit den aktuellen im Schwabenland gegenüber FIFA.com.
In Stuttgart feierte der 27-Jährige auch seinen bisher größten Erfolg auf Vereinsebene, als er 2007 die deutsche Meisterschaft bejubeln durfte. Auch in den folgenden Spielzeiten wusste Boka mit seinen Teamkollegen zu überzeugen. Platz sechs (2007/08), Platz drei (2008/09) und erneut Platz sechs in der Vorsaison spiegelten die erfolgreiche Arbeit des Vereins wider.
Boka lobt die Entwicklung des Klubs
"Die Meisterschaft war ein tolles Erlebnis. Die sportliche Entwicklung ist insgesamt positiv. In den vergangenen neun Jahren hat sich der Verein achtmal für einen internationalen Wettbewerb qualifiziert, davon dreimal für die Champions League", lautete die Analyse Bokas im Exklusiv-Interview mit FIFA.com.
Aktuell jedoch befindet sich der VfB in der vielleicht schwersten Krise seit Mitte der 70er Jahre, als man zum zweiten Mal den Gang ins deutsche Unterhaus antreten musste. Zwölf Punkte aus 17 Spielen, nur drei Siege bei elf Niederlagen, zwei Trainerentlassungen und Abstiegsplatz 17 – so sieht die düstere Bilanz nach der Hinrunde aus.
Auf der internationalen Bühne präsentiert sich die Mannschaft des neuen Trainers Bruno Labbadia hingegen viel besser. Die Gruppe H der UEFA Europa League beendeten Boka und Co. als souveräner Tabellenführer vor den Young Boys Bern, dem FC Getafe und Odense BK.
Im Dienst der Mannschaft
"In der Europa League hatten wir einen guten Start, entsprechend geringer war der Druck in den folgenden Spielen. Jetzt gilt es, im neuen Jahr diesen Schwung in die Zwischenrunde mitzunehmen", blickte der Ivorer gleichzeitig zurück und nach vorne, denn in der Runde der letzten 32 wartet mit Benfica Lissabon ein Aushängeschild des portugiesischen Fussballs.
Auch wenn es für seine Mannschaft in diesem Jahr nicht wirklich rund läuft, befindet sich Boka indes in einer guten Form. In zwölf von 17 Partien stand der 58-malige Nationalspieler der Elfenbeinküste in der Startformation der Schwaben und konnte in der Bundesliga bereits zwei Tore verbuchen, außerdem bereitete er drei Treffer vor.
"Ich besetze diejenige Position, auf der mich der Trainer aufstellt. Derzeit spiele ich im linken Mittelfeld. Von einem Mittelfeldspieler sollen möglichst noch mehr torgefährliche Aktionen ausgehen, als von einem Defensivspezialisten. Das hat bisher gut geklappt", erklärte der Ivorer seine bislang guten Leistungen.
Festes Mitglied der Elefanten
Wichtig ist dies auch für seine Karriere in der ivorischen Nationalmannschaft, mit der er an zwei FIFA Fussball-Weltmeisterschaften™ teilnahm. 2006 in Deutschland und im Sommer dieses Jahres gehörte er zum Kader der Elefanten und kam zu insgesamt vier Einsätzen beim weltweiten Kräftemessen.
"Unser letztes Gruppenspiel bei der vergangenen WM hatte etwas Schönes und Enttäuschendes zugleich. Einerseits konnten wir im Spiel gegen Nordkorea den ersten Sieg feiern, andererseits reichte es nicht zur Qualifikation für das Achtelfinale", erinnerte sich Boka im Gespräch mit FIFA.com an das Turnier am Kap der Guten Hoffnung.
Die Elfenbeinküste galt bei beiden WM-Turnieren als Geheimfavorit, schied jedoch zweimal nach der Vorrunde aus. Eine Enttäuschung für das afrikanische Schwergewicht, wie Boka zugab: "Die Erwartungshaltung unserer Landsleute ist immer sehr hoch und entsprechend auch der Druck, der auf der Mannschaft lastet. Bisher haben wir die Erwartungen bei großen Turnieren noch nicht ganz erfüllt, doch daran arbeiten wir kontinuierlich."
Neue Chance 2012?
Derzeit befinden sich die Ivorer auf dem Weg zum nächsten großen Turnier, dem CAF Afrikanischen Nationen-Pokal 2012. In der Qualifikationsgruppe H sind die Elefanten mit zwei Siegen (3:0 gegen Ruanda und 1:0 gegen Burundi) aus zwei Partien optimal gestartet. Im März 2011 steht dann die nächste Begegnung auf dem Programm, wenn es vor heimischer Kulisse gegen Benin geht.
"Wir sind in der Favoritenstellung und wollen dieser gerecht werden. Dennoch wissen wir um die Stärken der anderen Teams und müssen gewappnet sein. Die Qualifikation für den Afrika Cup in Gabun und Äquatorial-Guinea ist natürlich das Ziel", gab Boka abschließend die klare Marschroute gegenüber FIFA.com aus.
Und wer weiß, vielleicht schafft es die Elfenbeinküste mit Arthur Boka dann, an die Leistung von 1992 anzuknüpfen, als man das bislang einzige Mal die Krone des afrikanischen Fussballs in das westafrikanische Land holen konnte...

description.hltext_display: Das Geheimnis der Freistöße
description.content:
Wer schaut nicht gebannt auf den Bildschirm wenn Christiano Ronaldo in typischer Pose zum Freistoß antritt? Einen Freistoß über oder um die Mauer ins Tor zu zirkeln, gilt nach wie vor als eines der größten Kunststücke im Fussball. Auch in EASPORTS™ FIFA11 steht vor traumhaften Freistößen zunächst einmal das Training.
Wer, wie, in welcher Situation? – Die Freistoßbasics in FIFA11
Ob es sinnvoll ist, einen Freistoß direkt aufs Tor zu schießen oder doch lieber einen Teamkollegen anzuspielen, hängt maßgeblich von der Position des Freistoßes ab. Grundsätzlich erhöhen sich eure Chancen, ein Tor zu erzielen, je zentraler und näher Ihr zu diesem steht. Bei Freistößen von der Seite ist es hingegen sinnvoll, in den Strafraum zu flanken.
Elf Spieler, aber wer ist der richtige Schütze für die Freistöße? Das könnt Ihr in EASPORTS™ FIFA11 am besten anhand der Spielerfähigkeiten entscheiden. Ein guter Freistoßschütze zeichnet sich vor allem durch hohe Werte bei den Fähigkeiten "FKA" und "CRV" aus.
Die Herausforderung – Freistöße direkt verwandeln in FIFA11
Im Rahmen dieses Tutorials wollen wir Euch zwei Möglichkeiten vorstellen, wie Ihr in EASPORTS™ FIFA11 Freistöße direkt verwandeln könnt.
Freistoß über die Mauer:
Richtung: Bei einem Freistoß von links sollte der linke Pfosten genau neben dem äußersten Verteidiger in der Mauer sein. Bei einem Freistoß von rechts genau andersherum, d.h. der rechte Pfosten neben dem äußeren Verteidiger.
Schussstärke: Je nach Entfernung die Schusstaste so lange gedrückt halten bis zwischen zwei und drei Balken des Schussbalkens ausgefüllt sind.
Effet: Um den Ball über die Köpfe der Verteidiger zu heben, den rechten Analogstick nach oben drücken.
Freistoß um die Mauer:
Richtung: Bei einem Freistoß von links sollte der linke Pfosten auf Höhe des zweiten Verteidigers von innen sein. Analog dazu bei einem Freistoß von rechts, den rechten Pfosten in eine Linie mit dem zweiten Verteidiger von innen bringen.
Schussstärke: Generell sollte die Schussstärke etwas geringer sein als bei einem Freistoß über die Mauer, also zwischen zwei und zweieinhalb Abschnitte des Schussbalkens gefüllt sind.
Effet: Seid Ihr links vom Tor positioniert, dann den rechten Analogstick nach rechts oben drücken, um den Ball um die Mauer zu zirkeln. Ist die Freistoßposition rechts vom Tor, dann den rechten Analogstick nach links oben drücken.

description.hltext_display: Meteorite Yields Building Blocks Of Life
description.content:
U.S. scientists say they've found amino acids where they shouldn't be -- on a meteorite that formed from an asteroid so hot it should have destroyed the acids.
NASA researchers say the amino acids, the building blocks of life, may have formed through some mechanism that does not require water, increasing the chances of finding life beyond the solar system, ScienceNews.org reported Tuesday.
"Amino acids are forming in environments that we really didn't think were possible," Daniel Glavin of NASA's Goddard Space Flight Center in Greenbelt, Md., says.
He and his colleagues found the material in a fragment of the asteroid 2008 TC3 that was spotted before it slammed into Earth's atmosphere and rained meteorites onto the planet's surface.
The sample they analyzed was classified as a ureilite meteorite, a kind that originates from parent asteroids devoid of water and thus unable to form amino acids by known mechanisms.
Any new way of naturally producing amino acids "really increases the likelihood, in my opinion, of life existing elsewhere in the universe," Glavin says.

event_or_fact.property: Amino acids are forming inenvironments that we really didn't think were possible
