description.hltext_display: Rubalcaba, Chacón, Jiménez y el director del CNI explican el miércoles los gastos reservados de sus departamentos
description.content:
El PP aprovechará para preguntar al vicepresidente sobre los supuestos pinchazos telefónicos a los controladores
MADRID, 22 (EUROPA PRESS)
Los ministros de Interior, Alfredo Pérez Rubalcaba, de Defensa, Carme Chacón, y de Asuntos Exteriores, Trinidad Jiménez, así como el director del Centro Nacional de Inteligencia (CNI), general Félix Sanz Roldán, darán cuenta este miércoles de las previsiones presupuestarias de los fondos reservados de sus respectivos departamentos ante la respectiva comisión parlamentaria.
Esta comparecencia parlamentaria de los ministros y del jefe de la inteligencia española, que se celebra a puerta cerrada, estaba prevista para el pasado jueves, pero tuvo que anularse tras haberse convocado una sesión plenaria especial para debatir y votar la prórroga del estado de alarma decretado a raíz del 'plante' de los controladores aéreos.
Ha sido el presidente del Congreso, José Bono, como presidente a su vez de esta comisión parlamentaria, el que ha fijado esta nueva fecha de la comparecencia de los citados ministros y del director del CNI, que también deberá explicar, a petición de IU-ICV, la acción de la inteligencia española en zonas con presencia española en Afganistán.
Además, el primer partido de la oposición, a través de su vicesecretario de Comunicación, Esteban González Pons, anunció este lunes la intención del PP de que Rubalcaba aclare en la citada comisión "los asuntos oscuros" que se ciernen sobre su Ministerio, entre los que citó las posibles "instrucciones" al CNI para que se interviniesen las conversaciones de los controladores aéreos.
FONDOS CASI CONGELADOS
Los Presupuestos Generales del Estado para el año que viene mantienen prácticamente congeladas las partidas destinadas a sufragar los gastos reservados de los tres ministerios citados, que suman un total de 25,1 millones de euros. Sólo se ha aplicado un pequeño recorte de 12.660 euros a la reservada para la Secretaría de Estado de Defensa.
La dotación más amplia, 17,8 millones euros, como es habitual sigue correspondiendo al CNI, que es el organismo que gestiona tres de cada cuatro euros destinados a afrontar gastos reservados. Es tradición que el propio responsable del CNI, en la actualidad Félix Sanz Roldán, acompañe al responsable de Defensa, para dar cuenta de los que se han reservado para los servicios de inteligencia.
Dado que se trata de fondos de especial naturaleza, las explicaciones se ofrecen en sesión secreta ante la Comisión de Gastos Reservados, que preside José Bono, y de la que sólo forman parte los diputados del Congreso (uno por grupo) autorizados por la Cámara Baja para acceder a información reservada.
En concreto, a la cita están convocados José Antonio Alonso (PSOE), Soraya Sáenz de Santamaría (PP), Josep Antoni Duran i Lleida (CiU), Josu Erkoreka (PNV), Gaspar Llamazares (IU-ICV) y Francisco Jorquera (BNG-Grupo Mixto).

description.hltext_display: 구글 세계지도, 한글로 본다
description.content:
정윤희 기자 yuni@zdnet.co.kr 2010.12.22 / PM 04:48 , 는 에서 영어, 일본어, 프랑스어 지명 및 세계 주요 도시 지명을 한글로 표기하는 기능을 출시했다고 22일 밝혔다.
구글은 한글 표기 기능은 한국 사용자가 더 쉽게 세계 지역을 검색하고 검색된 지역을 살펴볼 수 있을까 하는 고민에서 기획됐다고 설명했다. 예컨데 ‘뉴욕 월스트리트’를 검색하면 한글로 표기된 지명이 각각 데스크톱 지도와 모바일 지도에 나타나는 식이다.
PC 지도 탭 부분에는 기존에 없었던 한국어 탭이 생겼다. 한국어 탭은 지역 언어로 된 지명과 한글로 된 지명 사이를 전환할 때 사용 가능하다. 모바일 지도에서는 휴대폰 언어 설정을 바꾸어 주면 된다. 구글은 향후 한국어 탭 기능을 모바일에도 적용될 수 있도록 준비 중 입니다. ▲ 한글 지명이 적용된 한국어 지명 표기는 지역 언어를 소리 나는 대로 한글로 바꾼 음역 방식을 채택했다. 현지 발음에 가까운 지명을 사용함으로써 현지에서 길을 찾거나 장소를 찾아가실 때 사용자가 도움을 받을 수 있도록 하기 위해서다. 한글 지명 검색도 가능하다. 한글로 ‘파리 꽁띠가’, ‘도쿄 시부야’를 구글 모바일 지도에 검색어로 넣으면 된다.
한글 지명 표기는 ‘기계 학습’이라고 불리는 컴퓨터 학습 알고리즘에 의한 것이다. 해당 지명에 대해 위키피디아 등에서 얻은 한글 데이터를 이용해, 각 언어를 한글로 음역하는 규칙을 기계 학습으로 생성하는 방식이다.
홍선기 구글 프러덕트 매니저는 “해외 여행 중에는 한국어로 된 세계 지도가 유용한 도구로 활용될 것”이라고 말했다.

description.hltext_display: Population surge gives Texas 4 new US House seats
description.content:
AUSTIN, Texas – A surge of Hispanic residents and other population gains have Texas poised to add more congressional clout than any other state, but a partisan fight now looms over exactly where the new seats should go.
Texas is gaining four seats in the U.S. House, twice as many as Florida, the only other state to pick up multiple ones, according to new population figures announced Tuesday by the U.S. Census Bureau. All told, Republican-leaning states will pick up at least a half dozen House seats thanks to the 2010 census, which found the nation's population growing more slowly than in past decades but still shifting to the South and West.
With Texas Republicans using recent elections to fortify their already solid control of the state Legislature, the political process of redrawing the state's congressional map would seem to benefit the GOP, too.
But Democrats say not so fast.
Boyd Richie, chairman of the Texas Democratic Party, said Hispanic and black population growth account for the additional seats, and he vowed to fight for a redistricting plan that takes their numbers into account.
"A legal and fair redistricting process must produce new congressional districts that reflect the Hispanic and African American population growth," Richie said. "Our Democratic numbers may be down, but we are not out. Democrats cannot and will not allow our voices to be silenced in this critical process."
The Census Bureau said the nation's population on April 1 was 308,745,538, up from 281.4 million a decade ago. The growth rate for the past decade was 9.7 percent, the lowest since the Great Depression. The U.S. population grew by 13.2 percent from 1990 to 2000. Michigan was the only state to lose population during the past decade. Nevada, with a 35 percent increase, was the fastest-growing state.
The new numbers are a boon for Republicans, with Texas leading the way among GOP-leaning states that will gain House seats, mostly at the Rust Belt's expense. Following each once-a-decade census, the nation must reapportion the House's 435 districts to make them roughly equal in population, with each state getting at least one seat.
In all, the census figures show a shift affecting 18 states taking effect when the 113th Congress takes office in 2013. The political power follows the high population growth, shifting toward the south and west and away from the industrial Midwest and northeast.
With reapportionment settled, the far more politically divisive process of redistricting is set to begin. In Texas, both major parties were bracing for a showdown over the state's new residents, beginning a fight that is sure to spark court action. But with Republican supermajorities in the Legislature, the temptation to run the table will be strong.
Rep. Pete Gallego, D-Alpine, said if the federal courts don't intervene to compel fairness, Republicans will likely produce a map that gives their party the advantage in three or perhaps even all four of the new seats.
"It is very easy to overreach when you're holding the map and have the pen in your hand," he said.
Despite the party's recent gains in the November legislative elections, Republicans won't have unchecked authority to draw the state's congressional map to benefit themselves.
Civil rights laws require that the interests of minority voters be protected as district boundaries are redrawn, and Texas is one of the states whose redistricting plans require "pre-clearance" by federal authorities under the Voting Rights Act.
Democrats are also counting on an assist from the Obama administration, which could have a significant voice in the pre-clearance process. It is the first time since the Voting Rights Act passed that the Justice Department will be in Democratic hands during the redistricting process.
Hispanic growth doesn't automatically translate into Democratic growth, though. Two heavily Hispanic congressional seats in South Texas flipped to Republicans this year. There also are several new Latino GOP members about to be sworn into legislative seats.
South Texas Rep. Aaron Pena, who recently left the Democrat Party and became a Republican, said Texas Latinos are more conservative than their counterparts in western states such as California and Nevada.
Pena, who sits on the House Redistricting Committee, said his "educated guess" was that Republicans would get three of the four seats.
"The Hispanic community is increasingly up for grabs," Pena said. "It's truly a swing population."
Texas already had the largest Republican delegation in Congress, holding 20 of the state's 32 seats. In the 2010 elections, the party picked up another three seats, two of them in heavily Latino districts in South Texas. With all the new growth, Texas will now have 36 seats and 38 presidential electoral votes.
Federal lawsuits are essentially guaranteed as part of the process, and if the past is any guide, the courts will have a major say in how the lines are finally drawn. In 2001, the Texas Legislature deadlocked on Congressional redistricting, leaving the federal courts to redraw all the districts. In 2006, the U.S. Supreme Court ordered that new lines be drawn in several districts to protect the rights of Hispanic voters in South Texas.
Starting early next year, most state governments will use detailed, computer-generated data on voting patterns to carve neighborhoods in or out of newly drawn House districts, tilting them more to the left or right. Sometimes politicians play it safe, quietly agreeing to protect Republican and Democratic incumbents alike. But sometimes the party in control will gamble and aggressively try to reconfigure the map to dump as many opponents as possible.
The U.S. is still growing quickly relative to other developed nations. The population in France and England each increased roughly 5 percent over the past decade, while in Japan the number is largely unchanged, and Germany's population is declining. China grew at about 6 percent; Canada's growth rate is roughly 10 percent.
The 2010 census results also are used to distribute more than $400 billion in annual federal aid and will change each state's Electoral College votes beginning in the 2012 presidential election.
Apart from the respective four- and two-seat gains in Texas and Florida, Arizona, Georgia, Nevada, South Carolina, Utah and Washington are all picking up one new U.S. House seat. Ohio and New York will lose two House seats each. Losing one House seat are Illinois, Iowa, Louisiana, Massachusetts, Michigan, Missouri, New Jersey and Pennsylvania.
Each House district represents an electoral vote in the presidential election process, meaning the political map for the 2012 election will tilt somewhat more Republican.

description.hltext_display: Parlament in Athen stimmt über Sparhaushalt ab
5-3-2 - eine Taktik für Euch?
description.content:
(FIFA.com) Dienstag 21. Dezember 2010
"Der Sturm gewinnt Spiele, die Abwehr Meisterschaften." Wer auf diesem Weg FIFA Interactive Champion werden möchte, dem empfehlen wir, mit einem 5-3-2 aufzulaufen. Das 5-3-2 wird heutzutage selten eingesetzt, was nicht heißen muss, dass man damit nicht erfolgreich sein kann: So gelang es der griechischen Nationalmannschaft im Jahr 2004, mit dieser Formation die Europameisterschaft zu gewinnen - und das obwohl die Griechen individuell nicht am besten besetzt waren.
Fünf Verteidiger als Basis
Die drei zentralen Abwehrspieler haben die Aufgabe, sich auf die gegnerischen Stürmer zu konzentrieren.
Dazu kommen zwei Außenverteidiger, die im 5-3-2 eine Schlüsselrolle einnehmen. Sie müssen einerseits Angriffe über die Außenpositionen verhindern und andererseits mit Flankenläufen für Gefahr sorgen.
Die drei Mittelfeldspieler sehen sich häufig einer Vielzahl von gegnerischen Mittelfeldspielern gegenüber. Deshalb ist es im Mittelfeld wichtig, durch versetzte Positionen möglichst viel Raum abzudecken.
Die Hauptaufgabe der beiden Stürmer besteht selbstverständlich darin, trotz der geringen Unterstützung durch die defensiv ausgerichteten Mitspieler für Torgefahr zu sorgen.
Den Ball erobern und dann Kontern!
Der größte Vorteil des 5-3-2 liegt auf der Hand: wenig Freiräume und Torchancen für den Gegner. Nach einer Balleroberung kann man zudem über schnelle Vorstöße für Torgefahr sorgen. Das 5-3-2 bietet sich insbesondere gegen offensive Aufstellungen mit Betonung des Flügelspiels, wie das 4-3-3, an, da die beiden Außenverteidiger Angriffe über die Flügel effektiv unterbinden können. Die Aufstellung könnt Ihr im Menü Team-Management festlegen.
Kein leichter Job für die Außenverteidiger
Die Hauptschwierigkeit beim 5-3-2 besteht darin, mit den wenigen Offensivkräften Torchancen zu generieren. Dies gelingt oft nur, wenn sich die Außenverteidiger in die Angriffe einschalten. Da diese aber auch defensive Aufgaben zu erfüllen haben, solltet Ihr darauf achten, dass die Außenverteidiger über gute Ausdauerwerte verfügen. Sollten die Spieler in der Startformation diese Voraussetzungen nicht erfüllen, hilft oft ein Blick auf die Auswechselbank.
Fazit
Zusammenfassend lässt sich sagen, dass das 5-3-2, obwohl es im modernen Fussball selten zum Einsatz kommt, in EA SPORTS™ FIFA11 eine sinnvolle Aufstellung ist. Auch wenn man viel offensive Schlagkraft einbüßt, kann man dem Gegner durch das eigene Abwehrbollwerk das Leben schwer machen.
Was haltet Ihr von der 5-3-2-Formation in EA SPORTS™ FIFA11? Wiegt die verstärkte Abwehr den Verlust von Offensivkräften auf?

description.hltext_display: WestSide Corporation Limited Secures Funding For Dawson Acquisition From New Hope Corporation Ltd And Energy Infrastructure Trust
description.content:
Rialto Energy Limited announced that the placement of 6,664,681 shares at an issue price of AUD0.125 per share to raise AUD833,085 completed. Proceed will be used to partially fund the AUD1 million advance to CLNR.
Brigham Exploration Company announced that it has priced its offering of 14,000,000 shares of common stock at a public offering price of $18 per share. Net proceeds from the offering will be used primarily to fund an acceleration of the Company's development drilling program on its core 161,900 net acres in the Williston Basin. The offering is scheduled to close April 13, 2010. In connection with the offering, Credit Suisse Securities (USA) LLC and Jefferies & Company, Inc. are acting as joint book running managing underwriters and Johnson Rice & Company, Raymond James, RBC Capital Markets, Tudor, Pickering, Holt & Co., Howard Weil Incorporated and Thomas Weisel Partners LLC are acting as co managing underwriters for the offering. The Company has granted the underwriters a 30 day option to purchase up to 2,100,000 additional shares to cover over allotments, if any.
Roxi Petroleum plc announced that it has issued 3,600,000 new ordinary shares of GBP0.01 each in the Company (Ordinary Shares) at an exercise price of GBP0.10 per share.

description.hltext_display: 年代綜合台撤照 NCC：多次違反衛星法！年代:：遭撤照沒有依據(東森新聞)
description.content:
討論 (+)
調整字級：
NCC下午突然召開記者會，宣布將對年代綜合台祭出撤照懲罰，NCC今天以年代綜合台節目未與廣告區分，情節嚴重決議撤照，並祭出新台幣210萬元罰款。NCC表示年代綜合台從2月換發執照後，多次違反衛星法，因此決定將年代綜合台撤照處分。
而年代綜合台傳出遭撤照後，年代電視也馬上召開記者會說明，年代執行董事王宜陵批NCC引用爭議法條，遭撤照沒有依據。

description.hltext_display: ESPN Chicago blog: Irish bringing high energy to Sun Bowl
description.content:
According to Notre Dame football coach Brian Kelly, the Fighting Irish did what they were told in Tuesday's final full practice before their trip to the Sun Bowl in El Paso, Texas. Then they added some unexpected pop to a session that satisfied Kelly and his staff.
"Today was a good day," Kelly said. "It was fast, there was high-paced action. It was supposed to be tag-off today and it ended up in tackling. That's a good sign. I've been on teams that didn't want to play the bowl game; they just wanted to get through it, get the season over with and get out of here. These guys want to play the game. They got a lot of gas in the tank."

description.hltext_display: TNI AL Butuh 39 Kapal Selam Tambahan
description.content:
BOGOR, TRIBUN- Armada angkatan perang Tentara Nasional Indonesia Angkatan Laut membutuhkan tambahan alat utama sistem persenjataan (alutsista) berupa pengadaan 39 unit kapal selam.
"Indonesia perlu menambah kekuatan armada angkatan laut. Wilayah laut kita sangat luas dan membutuhkan pengamanan yang intensif dari gangguan pihak luar," kata Wakil Kepala Angkatan Laut Laksamana Madya TNI Marsetio, Rabu(22/12/2010), di Bogor.
Laksamana Madya TNI Marsetio berada di Bogor, mengikuti kegiatan Apel Komandan Satuan (AKS) yang digagas Korps Marinir.
Apel Komandan Satuan diikuti 84 pesera terdiri dari komandan satuan di lingkungan Korps Marinir.
Menurut Marsetio, alutsista yang dimiliki armada angkatan perang TNI AL masih jauh dari kategori memadai kebutuhan yang dihadapi.
"Alutsista yang dimiliki TNI AL perlu ditambah dan diperkuat. Terutama jumlah kapal selam perlu ditambah, karena saat ini baru ada beberapa unit," terangnya.
Dikatakannya, Indonesia merupakan negara kepulauan terbesar di dunia. Keberadaan jumlah kapal selam yang memadai sangat mendesak, guna menjamin keamanan kedaulatan wilayah NKRI.
"Kita membutuhkan tambahan kapal selam sebanyak 39 unit," ujar Marsetio.
Penambahan kapal selam bagi armada perang TNI AL, diharapkan dapat membantu tugas dalam mengamankan keutuhan wilayah laut NKRI.
"Kapal selam tersebut akan disebar ke berbagai penjuru laut NKRI. Terutama pulau-pulau terluar dan wilayah laut yang rawan diklaim negara asing akan mendapatkan pengamanan ekstra," imbuhnya.
Pengamanan ekstra wilayah laut diharapkan dapat menjamin keutuhan dan kedaulatan NKRI.
"Kedaulatan dan keutuhan wilayah NKRI harus kita pertahankan. Tidak boleh ada sejengkal pun tanah yang lepas ke pihak asing," demikian Wakil Kepala Angkatan Laut Laksamana Madya TNI Marsetio. (*)

description.hltext_display: Study: African Elephants In Two Species
description.content:
Researchers say gene studies may have settled a long-running debate by proving there are two distinct species of African elephants, savannah and forest species.
Scientists say the two types have been separated for at least 3 million years and are genetically completely different from each other, the BBC reported Tuesday.
Savannah-dwelling elephants, weighing 6 or 7 tons, are about twice as heavy as the elephants living in forest habitats.
Along with other differences in size and shape, this led some researchers to conclude there are two species -- the savannah elephant, Loxodonta africana, and the forest species, Loxodonta cyclotis.
Scientists from the United States and Europe say genetic studies have proved the case.
"The divergence of the two species took place around the time of the divergence of the Asian elephant and woolly mammoths," Michi Hofreiter, a specialist in ancient DNA at the Britain's York University, said.

description.hltext_display: Pemerintah Siapkan Ganti Rugi Petani Gagal Panen
description.content:
Petani di Babulu, Penajam Paser Utara
JAKARTA, TRIBUN - Pemerintah bakal mengganti gagal panen yang dialami petani akibat cuaca ekstrim yang terjadi.
Wakil Menteri Pertanian Bayu Krisnamukti di Kantor Kementerian Koordinator Bidang Perekonomian, Jakarta, Rabu (22/12/2010) mengatakan langkah ini bertujuan menjaga stabilitas produksi pertanian nasional.
"Kita akan prioritaskan memperhatikan nasib petani. Kalau memang ada gagal panen, maka akan kita ganti mulai dari bibit sampai pupuk. Alhamdulillah sampai sekarang, iklim ekstrem belum sampai membuat gagal panen secara nasional," sebut Bayu, usai rapat ketahanan pangan di kantor Menko Perekonomian, Rabu (22/12/2010).
Lebih lanjut, dikatakannya, hinga kini cuaca ekstrem masih belum sampai membuat gagal panen massal pada lahan pertanian daerah penghasil.
Tetapi, menurutnya, di beberapa daerah memang terjadi petani gagal panen akibat cuaca ekstrem. Guna mengantisipasi kondisi tersebut, imbuhnya, pemerintah akan mengganti gagal panen yang dialami petani-petani tersebut untuk menjaga stabilitas produksi pertanian nasional.
Pemerintah, kata Bayu, sangat memberikan apresiasi kepada para petani Indonesia yang mampu berupaya mempertahankan produksi di tengah ketidakpastian iklim. Karena itu pula, pada tahun 2011 pemerintah akan lebih riil lagi memperhatikan nasib para petani.
"Tahun depan telah kita anggarkan Rp 3 triliun dalam APBN untuk antisipasi cuaca ekstrem. Rp1 triliun untuk cadangan beras, Rp1 triliun untuk stabilisasi harga, dan Rp1 triliun lagi untuk konsentrasi ketahanan pangan serta lainnya. Mengganti lahan petani yang gagal panen masuk dalam anggaran ini,'' sebutnya.(*)

description.hltext_display: Activists remember the 101 homeless in Philly who died in 2010
description.author: Robert Moran
description.content:
Several hundred people gathered late Tuesday afternoon at John F. Kennedy Plaza to observe Homeless Memorial Day and bring attention to the 101 people in Philadelphia who struggled with homelessness but died this year.
As participants, including those who have lived on the streets, held candles and signs with each person's name, the names were read aloud in the frigid evening air at LOVE Park.
Among them was Nicole Piacentini, one of the victims in the Kensington stranglings.
Others could only be identified by first names or nicknames, including John, Rick, Skip, Vanessa, and Shabazz.
Not all the people named were homeless at the time they died, but all had experienced homelessness at some point, organizers said.
Oliver Burrus, 48, held a sign for a woman he never met, Deborah Harmon.
Burrus, who said he had been homeless and drug-addicted for most of 20 years, now lives at the Susquehanna Park recovery house in the Strawberry Mansion section.
He said he had kept busy with several daily meetings to help with his drug recovery and that his next step is to get his GED.
Burris, who came to Philadelphia from New York about 15 years ago, said he was trying to keep his life simple, "just making the meetings, go to school, get my life back in order, and leave the rest to God." Also Tuesday, the city's Homeless Death Review Team, convened by the Medical Examiner's Office, released a report analyzing 43 people who died while homeless in 2009.
The report, described as the first of its kind in Philadelphia, found that the most common contributing factor in the deaths reviewed was alcoholism or drug intoxication.
Sister Mary Scullion, founder of Project HOME, led the ceremony and addressed the tough economic realities being faced on many levels. "Unemployment and poverty are increasing, foreclosures continue at a record rate, and shelters and food pantries cannot meet the increased demand," Scullion said. "We use this occasion to call on all Philadelphians and all America to wake up and recommit ourselves to ending homelessness," she said. "While we seek economic solutions for our country, we cannot forget our most vulnerable citizens." Scullion warned supporters that politicians facing shortfalls in government budgets would look to slash social programs. "We also recognize we're in a new political climate in Pennsylvania," she said of the outcome of November's elections. "We have to get involved more and more in our civic engagement." According to Project HOME, homelessness in Philadelphia declined in the late 1990s, but has been on the rise since 2000.
The most recent overnight count of people sleeping on the streets found 352 in Center City. That same night in November, about 2,600 people were living in emergency shelters, including about 1,000 children.
City Councilwoman Jannie L. Blackwell also appeared at the commemoration to present Scullion with a proclamation recognizing Homeless Memorial Day, which is marked annually on the first day of winter.
Contact staff writer Robert Moran at 215-854-5983 or bmoran@phillynews.com.

description.hltext_display: Japanin talouskasvu hidastuu ensi vuonna
description.content:
, hallitus kertoi keskiviikkona. Talouden odotetaan kasvavan ensi vuonna 1,5 prosenttia, kun tänä vuonna kasvua kertyi 3,1 prosenttia. Kasvua jarruttaa yksityisen kulutusen hiipuminen ja elvytystoimien vaikutusten vähentyminen. Esimerkiksi heinä-syyskuussa talouskasvu pomppasi 4,5 prosenttia vuotta aiemmasta. Heinä-syyskuussa Japanissa kuluttajat ostivat etenkin autoja ja tupakkaa. Japanissa hallitus on tukenut vähemmän ympäristöä kuormittavien autojen ostajia, mutta tämä tuki päättyy. Tupakkaa kuluttajat ostivat, sillä tupakkavero kiristyy.
Japanissa vienti vetää hyvin, mutta taustalla häilyy pelko siitä, että se alkaa hyytyä. Japanin - maailman kolmanneksi suurimman talouden - vienti kasvoi marraskuussa 9,1 prosenttia verrattuna viime vuoden marraskuuhun. AFP, AP

description.hltext_display: Avatar vuoden piraattielokuva
description.content:
Avatar oli vuoden eniten laittomia latauksia netissä kerännyt elokuva. TorrentFreak-sivuston mukaan leffaa ladattiin laittomilta sivustoilta yli 16 miljoonaa kertaa.
Kaikkien aikojen menestynein elokuva sai laittomat lataajat liikkeelle, sillä Avataria ladattiin kolmanneksen enemmän kuin viime vuoden piraattilistan kärkeen yltänyttä Star Trek -elokuvaa. Sitä ladattiin laittomasti alle 11 miljoonaa kertaa.
Tämän vuoden listalla toisena on sarjakuvafilmatisointi Kick-Ass, jota ladattiin laittomasti yli 11 miljoonaa kertaa. Kolmanneksi eniten piraattilatauksia tehtiin Inception -scifi-leffasta. Sitä ladattiin torrent-sivustoilta lähes kymmenen miljoonaa kertaa.

description.hltext_display: Seura: Työttömyys on vaalien tärkein kysymys
description.content:
Seuran Taloustutkimuksella teettämän kyselyn mukaan puolueiden kannanotot työttömyyteen ovat tärkein yksittäinen asia äänestyspäätöstä tehtäessä. Työttömyyskantoja piti erittäin tai melko tärkeänä 93 prosenttia vastaajista. Seuraavaksi tärkeämpinä pidettiin kannanottoja ympäristönsuojeluun ja euromaiden velkakriisiin. Niitä piti tärkeinä yli 80 prosenttia vastaajista. Ehdokkaan tärkeimpänä ominaisuutena pidettiin samanlaista arvomaailmaa äänestäjän kanssa.
Taloustutkimus haastatteli tutkimusta varten 965 henkilöä marraskuun loppupuolella. Tutkimuksen virhemarginaali on 3 prosenttiyksikköä suuntaansa. YLE Uutiset

description.hltext_display: FDP-Politiker fordern Ende der Debatte über Westerwelle
Editorial - Burr has the courage to support repeal of military gay ban; McIntyre doesn't
description.content:
The impending death of the "Don't Ask, Don't Tell" policy is as historic as President Harry Truman's integration of the military more than half a century ago and the more recent acceptance of women into military academies and virtually all capacities in the military.
The main difference is that gays have been serving honorably in the military for years ? they just weren't permitted to reveal their sexual orientation.
When President Clinton signed Don't Ask, Don't Tell in 1993, it was seen as a breakthrough of sorts. Previously, applicants were asked on their enlistment form whether they were homosexual. Those who checked yes were automatically disqualified.
But the policy also created an unacceptable double standard. Gays who were open about their sexual orientation or who revealed it after enlisting were discharged; those who stayed comfortably (for the more squeamish members of their unit, that is) in the closet were permitted to serve.
Since the law's implementation in 1993 more than 13,000 people have been discharged from military service under DADT. That's 13,000 people who had volunteered to serve their country. Most did so honorably, but once they were out of the closet they were out of the military.
Defense Secretary Robert Gates, a capable holdover from the Bush administration, has supported eliminating this outdated policy. The Pentagon plans to phase in the change to cause the least possible disruption.
There will be service members who object, and even some who decide to leave the military because they now know which members of their unit are gay. Some people never will believe that gays have a place in our armed forces. That's too bad, but doing the honorable thing trumps the feelings of those who refuse to believe that the equal rights guaranteed by the Constitution apply to all Americans.
Adm. Mike Mullen, chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, summed up the importance of last weekend's historic vote: "No longer will able men and women who want to serve and sacrifice for their country have to sacrifice their integrity in doing so. We will be a better military as a result."

description.hltext_display: Breaking News: ENI, GDF SUEZ
description.author: financial.de
description.content:
ENI: Laut dem „Handelsblatt" gerät der Energiekonzern mit dem Fiskus in Konflikt. Gegen neun Manager des Unternehmens ermittelt die Staatsanwaltschaft. Die Staatsanwaltschaft wirft ENI vor, in den Jahren 2004 bis 2008 die Erdgaseinfuhren von rund zehn Mrd. Kubikmeter nicht deklariert und damit 1,7 Mrd. Euro Steuern hinterzogen zu haben.
GDF SUEZ: Der Energiekonzern will nach Angaben des CEO der italienischen Tochter Italcogim Energie, Valero Camerano, seinen Gasabsatz in Italien bis 2014 auf rund 8 Mrd. Kubikmeter verdoppeln. Dies ist Teil der Bestrebungen, zu einem der größten Energiekonzerne des Landes aufzusteigen. Das zusätzliche Gas wird der Konzern aus Nordafrika, Nordeuropa und in Form von verflüssigtem Erdgas (LNG) beziehen. Derzeit kauft das Unternehmen rund 3 Mrd. Kubikmeter Gas für den italienischen Markt vom italienischen Wettbewerber Eni, der sein Gas zum Großteil aus Libyen bezieht. Daneben verfügt GDF SUEZ über 2 Mrd. Kubikmeter Gas für seine Kraftwerke in Italien.

description.hltext_display: Faut-il payer des impôts locaux pour un box de stockage ?
description.content:
Entre deux déménagements, je vais louer un box de stockage. Vais-je devoir payer des charges et des impôts locaux ?
Vos réponses
1 | La rédaction de VotreArgent.fr – 22/12/10 - 08:41
Vous n'aurez à payer ni les unes, ni les autres. La convention signée avec la société de stockage n'est pas un bail. En conséquence, vous ne payez pas un loyer, mais une redevance d'occupation. En effet, vous n'avez le droit d'y entreposer que des objets ne présentant aucun risque d'endommager l'emplacement. Par conséquent, vous n'avez pas à payer, en sus de votre redevance, d'impôts locaux, comme la taxe d'habitation, ni de charges (électricité, chauffage, aération…).

description.hltext_display: Politics key to investment
description.content:
(Bangkok Post - McClatchy-Tribune Information Services via COMTEX News Network) --
Politics will remain a critical challenge for the Thai economy next year, says Sombat Thamrongthanyawong, rector of the National Institute of Development Administration (Nida).
Since anti-government protests erupted in April, Thailand has been listed as one of seven countries that are not safe to visit or invest in, he said.
"If next year the red shirts escalate the level of protests, you'll have to consider how disastrous it would be for Thailand," warned Dr Sombat.
However, Atchaka Sibunruang, the secretary-general of the Board of Investment (BoI), argued that investors' decisions were unlikely to be affected should political dissent remain moderate, adding that BoI incentives would not change even with a change in government.
Dr Atchaka predicted growth next year in key sectors including processed food, automobiles and auto parts, electronic components, hard-disk drives (HDD) and HDD parts, and energy production.
She said the BoI was in the process of including more industrial sectors that qualify for BoI incentives, including those with low technology.
"We will not be able to compete if we continue to depend on industries that do not use a lot of skilled labour," she said.
BoI applications next year are estimated to reach 400 billion baht, the same as this year. "This is because we are not yet sure whether large projects worth hundreds of billions of baht such as the upstream steel project can occur," she said.
This year the Thai industrial sector has been hard hit by many factors such as the Map Ta Phut regulatory impasse, politics, the bearish world economy and a rising labour shortage.
Applications for BoI privileges in the first 11 months of this year totalled 378 billion baht, a 6% increase from the same period last year. The number of applications totalled 1,400 projects, a 42% increase from 992 last year.
This year, 40% of the investment approved by the BoI is Thai-owned, with 25% joint investments with foreign firms.
Siam Cement president and CEO Kan Trakulhoon said the strengthening Japanese yen had triggered a second wave of investment from Japan.
"More investment will come from small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). [These companies] are now comfortable investing in Thailand," said Mr Kan, adding that Thai SMEs need to add value and bulk up their research and development in order to compete. Did you know?

description.hltext_display: E&Y accused of Lehman whitewash: Report
description.content:
NEW YORK: The New York's attorney general is accusing accounting giant Ernst & Young of helping Lehman Brothers Holdings Inc disguise its financial condition for more than seven years, while collecting more than $150 million in fees from the firm, according to a media report.
"New York's attorney general Andrew Cuomo is accusing E&Y of helping Lehman Brothers disguise its financial condition for more than seven years, while collecting more than $150 million in fees from the firm," The Wall Street Journal reported.
The lawsuit filed by Cumo alleges that firms engaged in practices to temporarily erase as much as $50 billion in Lehman assets. This often occurred near the end of a quarter, allegedly making the company look much healthier than it was, the report noted.
The two companies worked together from 2001 until Lehman's 2008 collapse.
The accounting maneuver, called Repo 105, was used to shift the assets off Lehman's books in return for a promise to buy back the securities at a premium days later. Cash received by Lehman immediately was used to pay down other debts.
"Ernst directly facilitated an accounting sleight of hand that burnished the securities firm's balance sheet," the report said quoting the lawsuit.
While citing E&Y's statement, the report said that there was "no factual or legal basis" to bring a claim against the firm, and that it would vigorously defend against the claims in Cuomo's lawsuit.
"Lehman's accounting was in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles, and Lehman's bankruptcy was not caused by any accounting issues," it added.
The 32-page civil-fraud lawsuit depicts a cozy relationship between the big accounting firm and its client. Two of Lehman's chief financial officers -- Christopher O'Meara and David Goldfarb were former E&Y employees during much of the seven-year period when the transactions in question occurred.

description.hltext_display: Anlegerportal "Emissionsmarktplatz" als virtuelle Unternehmensbörse am Beteiligungsmarkt zur Kapitalbeschaffung
description.author: HorstWerner
description.content:
Das Anlegerportal www.emissionsmarktplatz.de führt am Beteiligungsmarkt Beteiligungsangebote und Investoren zusammen. Hier kommen Anbieter und Interessenten von Unternehmensbeteiligungen zusammen. Mit einem öffentlichen Beteiligungsangebot unter Beachtung der kapitalmarktrechtlichen Vorschriften ( siehe www.finanzierung-ohne-bank.de ) kann das Unternehmen mit einem professionellen Finanzmarketing Beteiligungskapital einwerben.
Der www.emissionsmarktplatz.de bietet kapitalsuchenden Unternehmen die Möglichkeit, aus der "grauen" Masse der anderen Unternehmen hervorzutreten und im Internet in den Fokus der Investoren, Privatanleger und Beteiligungsgesellschaften bzw. Finanzdienstleister zu gelangen. Mit Hilfe des Investor-Relations-Portals haben kleine Unternehmen mit einem Beteiligungs-Exposé und größere Unternehmen mit einem Kapitalmarktprospekt als sogen. Emissionsunternehmen die Möglichkeit zur Akquisition von Kapital und Investoren. Das Anlegerportal verhilft zu einer intensiven Pflege des Kontakts zu Anlegern und interessierten Investoren – vor, während und nach der Kapitalbeschaffung. Mit einer sogen. Landing-Page wird die Interaktivität zu potentiellen Kapitalgebern gesteigert. Der Emissionsmarktplatz.de ist das älteste und führende professionelle Unternehmensbeteiligungs-Portal, auf der alle Formen ausserbörslicher und vorbörslicher Unternehmensbeteiligungen angeboten werden. Mit dem Online-Marketing – einem der wichtigsten Kommunikationsinstrumente – kommt Bewegung in jedes Beteiligungsangebot. Investoren und Unternehmen werden zusammengeführt.
Das Finanzportal Emissionsmarktplatz.de vermittelt einer Vielzahl von Finanzdienstleistern und Anlegern einen umfassenden Überblick über alle entscheidungsrelevanten Daten zu ausserbörslichen Kapitalmarktemissionen und öffentlichen Beteiligungsangeboten. Der Emissionsmarktplatz.de ist eine virtuelle Unternehmensbörse für Kapitalgeber und Unternehmer.
Was grundsätzlich für ein erfolgreiches öffentliches Beteiligungsangebot und ein kleines „Going Public“ erforderlich ist und welche Instrumente Unternehmer dabei nutzen können, erfahren Unternehmer in der kostenlosen Fachbroschüre „Finanzkommunikation zur Anwerbung von Investoren“, 26 Seiten, die Interessenten kostenfrei unter info@emissionsmarktplatz.de anfordern können.

description.hltext_display: Bond des prix à l'importation en novembre en Allemagne
description.content:
BERLIN (Reuters) - Les prix à l'importation ont augmenté de 10% annuels en novembre en Allemagne, pourcentage sans précédent depuis novembre 2000, a annoncé mercredi l'Office fédéral de la statistique.
D'un mois sur l'autre, leur hausse est de 1,2%. Les économistes interrogés par Reuters anticipaient une hausse mensuelle de 0,5% et annuelle de 9,3%.
L'énergie, les matières premières et les métaux ont produit l'impact le plus fort sur les prix à l'importation.
Bureau de Berlin, Wilfrid Exbrayat pour le service français, édité par Dominique Rodriguez

description.hltext_display: Breaking News III: PSI, SEVEN PRINCIPLES
description.author: financial.de
description.content: PSI: Das Softwareunternehmen veräußert den Bereich Telekommunikation, der bislang in der Konzerntochter PSI Transcom GmbH angesiedelt war, an die Unternehmensberatung SEVEN PRINCIPLES AG. Der Bereich Telekommunikation der PSI Transcom ist ein IT-Dienstleister mit rund 35 Mitarbeitern im Netz- und Servicemanagement für Telekommunikationsanbieter. PSI setzt mit diesem Schritt die thematische Fokussierung auf Softwareprodukte für Energieversorger, Schwerindustrie und Verkehrsinfrastrukturen fort. Parallel zum Verkauf hat PSI im Laufe des Jahres zusätzliche Investitionen in die neue Leitwarte für die Rohstoffgewinnung getätigt, die auf Basis der PSI-Energieleittechnik entwickelt wurde.

description.hltext_display: Courchevel, une montagne de clichés
description.content: L'avenir de la station ne se joue pas ce mardi. Tant que des oligarques ukrainiens viennent arroser Courchevel de cinq millions d'euros pour un anniversaire comme ce week-end, on peut lui prédire sans risque un avenir doré. Mais le paradis blanc du Gotha de ce bas-monde n'est pas qu'un écrin de luxe à leurs excès. C'est aussi une vraie station de sport. Taina Barioz y est licenciée et n'en démord pas : « Courchevel n'est pas une station bling bling. Les gens ne voient parfois que ce côté mais on organise aussi beaucoup d'événements sportifs ici, été comme hiver. » Devenir une étape incontournable Anna-Sophie Barthet, compagne au club, confirme une image en trompe l'il : « C'est vrai qu'il y a du luxe, de l'élégance. Mais ça ne résume pas tous ceux qui viennent skier ici. » Ce mardi matin dès l'aube, la station sera assaillie d'une foule enthousiaste venue voir les meilleures techniciennes du monde dévaler la piste Emile Allais. Ce sera la première course de Coupe du monde organisée à Courchevel depuis 1979 et la victoire du légendaire Ingmar Stenmark. Adeline Roux, du comité d'organisation, est ravie de voir le bout du tunnel : « C'est un engagement de plus de quinze ans. Maintenant, on doit être à la hauteur », prévient-elle, la voix serrée.Assurée de voir revenir le Cirque Blanc trois fois d'ici à 2014, elle sait que la station n'a qu'un droit à l'erreur limité si elle veut pérenniser l'épreuve : « On doit être au top dès cette année. Nous voulons devenir une des étapes incontournables du calendrier », assure Adeline Roux. Des concerts rock, de la voltige aérienne, un slalom pour les personnalités et d'anciens champions : tout a été prévu pour divertir les 10 000 visiteurs espérés. « Notre retour souligne que nous sommes bien une station de ski. On veut s'affirmer. Mais je n'oublie pas un objectif de communication planétaire pour notre belle station. » Tout de même

description.hltext_display: Letters to the editor - Dec. 22, 2010
description.content:
Tannis F. Nelson, Wilmington Editor?s Note: The writer is a former N.C. PTA president and a former member of the N.C. State Board of Education?s Charter School Advisory Committee.
Photo ID will prevent voter fraud
Your Dec. 17 editorial ?A non-crisis,? regarding the need to present identification when voting misses the point.
Requiring identification does help to prevent election fraud and does not necessarily deny people their right to vote. Of the 26 states that require ID, several forms of identification are allowable. You cite ?18 cases of double voting in 2008? in North Carolina. Those were only the ones that were caught! Our legislators need to require identification to help prevent a crisis.
While they are involved in bringing North Carolina election law into the 21st century, the provision that allows husbands and wives to vote in the same booth, by mutual consent, needs to be amended.
The abusive behavior allowed in these situations is prevalent. If a person needs assistance in the booth, polling station officials can select assistance from an objective party who is not related.
Nancy B. Kreider, Oak Island
Convention center a boondoggle
Several of us, maybe several hundred, tried to argue against buildingthis never-ending money-losing project (the convention center). Nobody holds conferences anymore.
Security, video conferences and lack of available hookers have made Skype into a multimillion-dollar business.
Why travel, eat bad hotel food, get drunk and make a fool of yourself in front of strangers when you can do that at home?
Wade Griffis, Wilmington
Clintons again offer 2 for 1? President Obama?s call on Bill Clinton on the Dec. 10 to help sell the compromise tax cut bill to Congress and the American people reminds me of the old saying, ?when the going gets tough, the tough go shopping,? since Obama had to attend a Christmas party with his wife.
It was probably good strategy to bring in a ?closer? (baseball term) since Bill Clinton was the last president to balance the budget going back to the late 90s so he has some credibility in this area. Maybe Bill can be called upon by Hillary to exert some needed leadership and expertise in U.S. foreign policy recently revealed by Wikileaks ? as being dysfunctional.
The more interesting aspect of Obama abdicating his leadership responsibilities is the possibility of facing the Clinton?s as the nominee in the 2012 Democratic National Convention.
The Clintons could be a formidable opponent to Obama whereby they could offer ?two for the price of one? (an old axiom in the military when a commander enlists his or her spouse to complete needed executive tasks without being paid).
The question remaining then would be who would be calling the shots (Bill or Hillary). Obama should think twice about calling on a ?closer? like Bill Clinton in the future and think through the implications.

description.hltext_display: Noens : « Un souvenir incroyable »
description.content: Nastasia, après votre troisième chrono dans le tracé initial, comment avez-vous vécu lattente jusquau second départ ? Quand tout le monde vient de te féliciter après la première manche, tu essayes de rester les pieds sur terre et te souvenir qu'il y en a une deuxième. Ce n'est pas simple : la preuve, ça ne s'est pas passé comme je voulais sur le deuxième tracé. Cest une grosse déception ? Je suis déçue du résultat bien sûr, mais tout de même contente d'avoir vécu cette journée. C'était quand même extraordinaire avec tout ce monde. J'espère que c'est de bon augure pour les prochaines courses ici. Un deuxième Top 10 en deux slaloms, ça reste encourageant C'est vrai mais je visais un Top 5, voire le podium. Je suis quand même contente parce que je vais partir dans les quinze premiers dossards sur les prochaines étapes. Ça change un statut. Garderez-vous de belles images de ce retour de la coupe du monde à Courchevel, 31 ans après ? Bien sûr ! Cette course, c'est la seule en France. Comme les Mondiaux il y a deux ans à Val d'Isère, ça restera un souvenir incroyable.

description.content: The serial killer who police say sexually assaulted and strangled three women, and possibly attacked three others, in a city neighborhood rife with drugs and prostitution might want to hope that authorities find him before...

description.hltext_display: Stan Wischnowski named Inquirer's top editor
description.author: Alan J. Heavens
description.content:
Stan Wischnowski, a veteran journalist who has presided over The Inquirer's front page for a decade, was named the newspaper's editor Tuesday by publisher Gregory J. Osberg to applause from reporters, editors, and photographers gathered for a holiday party in the newsroom.
Wischnowski, 48, has served as acting editor since Oct. 8, when The Inquirer, the Philadelphia Daily News, and Philly.com emerged from bankruptcy under the new ownership of Philadelphia Media Network.
Osberg, a former Newsweek executive, credited Wischnowski's permanent appointment to his "collaborative style" and said he had exhibited the leadership and news judgment to manage the dominant news-gathering organization in the nation's fourth-largest media market. "I look forward to working with Stan in further revitalizing The Philadelphia Inquirer by focusing its content on relevant stories impacting the Philadelphia region and embracing and accelerating digital innovation," Osberg said. Osberg noted that Wischnowski had moved decisively to support and showcase the newspaper's investigative reporting, continuing an examination begun a year ago of the city's criminal court system while maintaining aggressive coverage of the Philadelphia Housing Authority and the Philadelphia School District's procurement practices.
Osberg praised the enthusiasm and commitment of the company's employees to making the paper's new corporate owner "the most successful regional media company" in the country. He pointed to "small victories" in the last 10 weeks of new ownership that included "unparalleled sports coverage," the launch of vertical mobile applications, and an explanatory series that delved into a hidden hunger crisis in Philadelphia's First Congressional District, one of the poorest in America.
Wischnowski has been at The Inquirer since 2000, and had been deputy managing editor/operations and vice president for shared services before his appointment. "This is the opportunity of a lifetime," said Wischnowski, adding that he always considered The Inquirer "one of the greatest newspapers in the country." The 26-year newspaper veteran worked at several metropolitan papers as a high-ranking editor, including deputy managing editor/news and acting managing editor at the Rochester Democrat and Chronicle, and Sunday copy desk chief at the Detroit News.
Wischnowski praised the commitment of the new ownership to technology and to the growth of the two newspapers and the website.
The new editor offered unqualified praise for his staff of reporters and editors, who, he said, possess "the commitment and passion" to write the next great chapter of The Inquirer's history.
In the last 10 weeks, "the level of investigative reporting has been the best that we've done this year," he said, adding that this effort to serve "our loyal readers" has been "the hallmark of The Inquirer throughout its history." Wischnowski is the fifth editor of The Inquirer in the last 10 years. He succeeded William K. Marimow, a two-time Pulitzer Prize-winner who returned to investigative reporting after almost four years in the job. Amanda Bennett, Walker Lundy, and Robert J. Rosenthal preceded Marimow.
Wischnowski is a native of Kankakee, Ill., and received a bachelor of arts degree in journalism from Western Illinois University.
He and his wife, Shawn, reside in West Chester. They have three children in college: a son studying business at Sacred Heart University in Fairfield, Conn., a son in law school at Iowa, and another son studying law at Pennsylvania State University.
Contact staff writer Alan J. Heavens at 215-854-2472, aheavens@phillynews.com, or Twitter: @alheavens.

description.hltext_display: Roxi Petroleum plc Announces Issue Of Equity
description.content:
Rialto Energy Limited announced that the placement of 6,664,681 shares at an issue price of AUD0.125 per share to raise AUD833,085 completed. Proceed will be used to partially fund the AUD1 million advance to CLNR.
Brigham Exploration Company announced that it has priced its offering of 14,000,000 shares of common stock at a public offering price of $18 per share. Net proceeds from the offering will be used primarily to fund an acceleration of the Company's development drilling program on its core 161,900 net acres in the Williston Basin. The offering is scheduled to close April 13, 2010. In connection with the offering, Credit Suisse Securities (USA) LLC and Jefferies & Company, Inc. are acting as joint book running managing underwriters and Johnson Rice & Company, Raymond James, RBC Capital Markets, Tudor, Pickering, Holt & Co., Howard Weil Incorporated and Thomas Weisel Partners LLC are acting as co managing underwriters for the offering. The Company has granted the underwriters a 30 day option to purchase up to 2,100,000 additional shares to cover over allotments, if any.
Roxi Petroleum plc announced that it has issued 3,600,000 new ordinary shares of GBP0.01 each in the Company (Ordinary Shares) at an exercise price of GBP0.10 per share.

description.hltext_display: Le Japon devait voir sa croissance réduire de moitié en 2011-12
description.content:
TOKYO (Reuters) - La croissance économique du Japon ralentira durant l'exercice 2011-2012 qui débute le 1er avril prochain et ne représentera plus que la moitié de celle de l'exercice en cours en raison d'un fléchissement des exportations et de la consommation intérieure, selon les prévisions diffusées mercredi par le gouvernement.
Toutefois, les prix de détail sortiront de leur spirale baissière, prévoit aussi le gouvernement japonais.
Tokyo anticipe une croissance du PIB de 1,5% réel en 2011-2012 contre 3,1% en 2010-2011.
L'inflation mesurée par les prix de détail serait nulle sur le prochain exercice, et non plus négative comme elle l'aura été sur les trois exercices précédents, et le gouvernement anticipe une inflation à nouveau positive d'ici la fin de l'exercice 2011-2012, le 31 mars 2012.
"Mais il faudra peut-être attendre encore longtemps avant que le gouvernement n'annonce que le pays est sorti définitivement de la déflation car il faut prendre en compte plusieurs indicateurs économiques", a déclaré un haut fonctionnaire ministériel.
Le gouvernement ne donne de prévision que pour les prix de détail dans leur ensemble, alors que la Banque du Japon préfère suivre ces prix hors produits alimentaires frais pour se faire une meilleure idée de l'évolution de l'inflation.
Par ailleurs, le gouvernement a révisé en baisse, dans son rapport de décembre, son opinion sur les exportations et le sentiment des entreprises en raison du ralentissement de la reprise en Asie et d'un yen qui reste fort.
Toutefois son diagnostic d'ensemble de la situation économique n'a pas varié. Il estime que l'économie reste au point mort et que sa situation est délicate, avec en particulier un taux de chômage élevé.
C'est dans son rapport d'octobre que le gouvernement avait pour la première fois depuis février 2009 revu en baisse son diagnostic d'ensemble de la situation économique.
Beaucoup d'économistes anticipent une contraction du PIB au quatrième trimestre 2010, l'expiration de mesures publiques de relance se faisant sentir sur le secteur industriel. Ils prévoient toutefois une reprise de la croissance l'an prochain, dans le sillage des exportations et de la demande intérieure.
Tokyo réaffirme enfin que l'une de ses grandes priorités est la lutte contre la déflation, avec le concours de la Banque du Japon.
Rie Ishiguro et Kaori Kaneko, Wilfrid Exbrayat pour le service français, édité par Dominique Rodriguez

description.hltext_display: Cerca de 70 municipios informarán sobre el Plan de Vivienda de Canarias
description.content:
El Boletín Oficial de Canarias ha publicado en su edición de hoy martes, 21 de diciembre, la resolución de la Consejería de Bienestar Social, Juventud y Vivienda del Gobierno canario, por la que el Instituto Canario de la Vivienda subvencionará este año con un total de 900.000 euros la implantación y mantenimiento de 66 oficinas gestoras de vivienda destinadas a facilitar información y ofrecer apoyo a la gestión de actuaciones protegidas en materia de vivienda.
Se trata de una subvención que anualmente concede el Gobierno a los ayuntamientos canarios para la implantación y mantenimiento de oficinas gestoras de vivienda para la información y apoyo a la gestión de actuaciones protegidas en materia de vivienda
La responsable canaria de Vivienda, Inés Rojas, asegura que "con la participación de los ayuntamientos conseguimos llevar las variadas ayudas y subvenciones del Plan de Vivienda de Canarias a muchas más familias, ya que instalamos una oficina informativa en su municipio y con ello agilizamos la gestión, evitamos desplazamientos innecesarios de la ciudadanía".
Rojas asegura que "las administraciones locales, las administraciones más cercanas a la ciudadanía, son las aliadas del Gobierno que nos están permitiendo hacer realidad nuestros objetivos marcados en el Plan"
La actividad subvencionada consiste, principal y obligatoriamente, en la realización de actividades encaminadas a la implantación o mantenimiento de oficinas gestoras de vivienda para la información y apoyo a la gestión de actuaciones protegidas en materia de vivienda.
Así mismo estas oficinas prestarán asesoramiento e información a la ciudadanía interesada sobre el nuevo Registro de Demandantes de Vivienda Protegida puesto en marcha por el Gobierno canario con el objeto de facilitar la adjudicación y venta de viviendas protegidas.
El Plan de Vivienda de Canarias contiene medidas que inciden en favorecer el acceso de la ciudadanía a la vivienda, lo que hace especialmente necesario, lograr la máxima difusión del mismo, a través de las oficinas de información o ventanillas únicas de información en materia de vivienda.
Como especifican las directrices de elaboración del Plan actual se deberá fomentar "la implicación en la ejecución del Plan de Vivienda de Canarias de otras administraciones públicas con competencias en materia de vivienda como son los cabildos insulares y ayuntamientos"

description.hltext_display: Breaking News II: Allianz, Pfleiderer
description.author: financial.de
description.content:
Allianz: Der Versicherer will einem Bericht der „FAZ" zufolge unter Berufung auf den Vorstandsvorsitzenden, Michael Diekmann, in 2011 Staatsanleihen von Euro-Staaten kaufen. Das betrifft auch Staatsanleihen von hoch verschuldeten Staaten. Wichtig ist demnach die Botschaft an die Regierungen, dass sie stabile, langfristige Investoren haben.
Pfleiderer: Der vor dem Bruch seiner Kreditverträge stehende Holzverarbeiter hat drei Monate länger Zeit, um ein Konzept zur Weiterführung des Unternehmens zu erarbeiten. Mit ihren Banken hat das Unternehmen nach eigenen Angaben ein Stillhalteabkommen unterzeichnet, das bis zum 31.03.2011 gilt. Dem Stillhalteabkommen hätten alle Gläubigerbanken zugestimmt. Die Institute verzichten bis zum 31.03.2011 auf die Fälligstellung ihrer Kredite sowie auf die Regeltilgung.

description.hltext_display: BlueSLR - Foto-Fernsteuerung via Smartphone-App
description.content:
Bild vergrößern 857 400 http://img3.magnus.de/image-r857x400-C-666f8d6f-39048593.jpg © blueslr
Apps, die eine digitale Spiegelreflexkamera steuern können gibt es gleich mehrere.
So zum Beispiel das kostenlose Onone DSLR Remote Lite, das nur das Auslösen anbietet und das fotografiere Bild dann zeigt. Das Tool benötigt aber, genauso wie das 2 Dollar teure Remote DSLR Camera Control, immer noch den Rechner, denn die Kamera muss mit dem Rechner verbunden sein.
Bild vergrößern 480 320 http://img3.magnus.de/image-r480x320-C-6a223fc4-39048671.jpg © blueslr
© blueslr
Anders sieht das bei blueSLR von Xequals aus: Das App setzt auf einen Hardware-Adapter der an den USB-Anschluss der Kamera kommt. Via Bluetooth nimmt dieser Kontakt mit iPhone, iPod oder iPad auf und bietet so die Fernsteuerung der Kamerafunktionen an. Unter Idealbedingungen lassen sich so knapp 100 Meter überbrücken und aus der Ferne Schärfe, Belichtungszeit und Blende steuern. Zudem übermitteln die kleinen Apple-Mobiles auch die GPS-Daten, so dass man damit eine Zuordnung der Aufnahmen an eine Karte erledigen kann.
Bild vergrößern 480 320 http://img3.magnus.de/image-r480x320-C-20362157-39048675.jpg © blueslr
© blueslr
Derzeit klappt das allerdings erst mit Nikon-Modellen. In der blueSLR for Nikon Essential DSLR Variante mit der D3100 und D5000. Variante zwei arbeitet mit der D90 und D7000 zusammen und nennt sich blueSLR for Nikon Advanced DSLR. Dass man den Schwerpunkt im Profilager sieht zeigt sich schon durch den Umfang mit dem die blueSLR for Nikon Professional DSLR zusammenarbeitet: D2Xs, D3, D3s, D3x, D200, D300, D300S, D700. Für die Canon-Modelle soll ein entsprechender Adapter in der Entwicklung sein.
Bild vergrößern 480 320 http://img4.magnus.de/image-r480x320-C-737aa074-39048677.jpg © blueslr
© blueslr
Alle drei Varanten kosten das gleiche: 110 Euro – das dazu notwendige iOS-App BlueSLR gibt es dann kostenlos. Lauffähig ist letzteres auf jedem iPad, iPhone ab 3G oder iPod Touch ab 2G.

description.hltext_display: County's jobless rate climbs to 17 percent
description.content:
San Benito County's unemployment rate approached 17 percent in November, a jump of more than 3 percent from October and more than 5 percent higher than the statewide rate.
The California Employment Development Department last week reported that the state's jobless rate was unchanged at 12.4 percent in November, while the U.S. rate increased to 9.8 percent. The amount of non-farm jobs in the state totaled more than 12.8 million, an increase of 1,600 jobs over the month.
The county's unemployment rate of 16.9 percent was up from 13.6 percent in October and 1.3 percent higher than the rate in November 2009. Of the local labor force of 25,800, 4,400 people were out of work in November, according to the state statistics.
In nearby counties, the unemployment rate last month was 12.5 percent in Santa Clara and Santa Cruz, and 12.2 percent in Monterey.
The EDD released the figures a day after Congress voted to renew jobless benefits for 2 million people out of work nationwide.
"Ag has been somewhat buffered from the economy," said Jess Brown of the Santa Cruz County Farm Bureau. "The consumer has cut back on restaurants but not on eating."
State analyst Jorge Villalobos said, "There's not a lot of positives," comparing this year to last year.
Bill Tysseling of the Santa Cruz Chamber of Commerce said the year-over-year unemployment is "worrisome but also not much of a surprise. We've known that construction, retail and leisure have been hit hard by the recession."
Though retail and leisure are showing signs of a turnaround, "employers are understandably cautious about adding new workers and increasing wages," he added. "The theme of most conversations at chamber meetings and events is the need to stay strong for another couple of years in the face of unacceptably high unemployment rates."
He sees improved prospects for export and preference for re-use as trends that present opportunities for local businesses.
Meanwhile, the new tax legislation signed into law by President Barack Obama last week includes a reauthorization of federal unemployment extension benefits for another 13 months.
While the legislation does not adds to the current maximum of up to 99 weeks of benefits available, it does adds more time for eligible unemployed workers to be able to collect those maximum benefits while trying to secure a job.
More than 250,000 unemployed workers in California faced possible interruptions in their unemployment benefits this week if the new federal legislation wasn't enacted by Dec. 18.
POST A COMMENT
If you are under 13 years of age you may read this message board, but you may not participate. Here are the full legal terms you agree to by using this comment form.

description.hltext_display: Fernando Bañolas lamenta que Isidro Rexachs añore los tiempos pasados en materia de Sanidad
description.content:
El consejero de Sanidad sale al paso de la pretensión del presidente del Sindicato de Médicos de Las Palmas de que Canarias devuelva las competencias al Estado de Sanidad y le recuerda los logros alcanzados tanto en infraestructuras como servicios en los últimos años.
El consejero advierte que Canarias es la segunda Comunidad del Estado (después de Valencia) que más destina a la Sanidad Pública, con un 40,3% de los Presupuestos Generales de 2011, y que ese porcentaje continúa creciendo año tras año, lo que muestra bien a las claras el peso específico de la Sanidad en el conjunto de las políticas del Gobierno canario
El consejero de Sanidad, Fernando Bañolas, lamenta profundamente que el presidente del Sindicato Profesional de Médicos de Las Palmas, Isidro Rexachs, añore tanto el pasado y reclame "a estas alturas" la devolución al Estado de las competencias en materia de Sanidad.
"¿Es que olvida las carencias que sufríamos en la época del Insalud?, ¿olvida el presidente del Sindicato Profesional de Médicos que Canarias no era precisamente muy bien tratada antes de que se recibieran las transferencias en materia sanitaria?".
Con estas preguntas, el consejero Bañolas pretende salir al paso de "las descabelladas reivindicaciones de un señor que olvida lo que los canarios tuvimos que sufrir hasta la llegada del Estado de las Autonomías, que nos ha permitido avanzar y dotarnos de infraestructuras y servicios con los que nadie, ni los mismos profesionales de la Medicina, habíamos ni siquiera soñado".
Ante la queja de que la Sanidad canaria es la que sufre un mayor recorte en todo el Estado, el consejero de Sanidad advierte de que el Ministerio de Sanidad ha rebajado también sus presupuestos en un 8,8%, y que en Canarias "no es la Sanidad la que específicamente sufre un mayor recorte; son los Presupuestos Generales de la Comunidad Autónoma de Canarias los que sufren esa mayor reducción en relación con otras Comunidades del Estado, comunidades algunas de ellas con un régimen de financiación especial, como es el caso de Cataluña tras la reforma del Estatut; o de Navarra, que goza de un régimen foral especial, con las que no nos podemos comparar.
Canarias es de las comunidades que sufren, por el contrario, un déficit de financiación en materia sanitaria que el propio Estado cuantifica en unos 10.000 o 15.000 millones, y cuya subsanación no ha estado entre las prioridades del Gobierno de Rodríguez Zapatero".
"Y si nuestros Presupuestos para 2011 bajan en mayor proporción de lo que lo hacen los de otras comunidades, no hay que olvidar que Canarias es también una de las regiones que más han sufrido las consecuencias de la crisis: los Presupuestos de la Comunidad Autónoma de Canarias para 2011 están hechos desde la objetividad y la responsabilidad", añade el consejero.
"Canarias invirtió y se endeudó mientras pudo hacerlo, y gracias a ello tenemos hoy una Sanidad y unos servicios públicos que son la envidia de muchos países de nuestro entorno; pero ha llegado la hora de parar y actuar con responsabilidad. No podemos seguir endeudándonos como lo quiere hacer Cataluña. Tenemos que conseguir que no sólo este año, sino también los años venideros, dispongamos de los recursos necesarios para pagar las nóminas de los funcionarios y mantener la calidad de los servicios, y para eso", insiste, "no me canso de llamar a la responsabilidad de los sindicatos y los agentes médicos y sanitarios".
Bañolas quiere recordar también a los profesionales que se movilizan llevados por mensajes en exceso alarmistas de algunos líderes sindicales que Canarias es, detrás de la Comunidad Valenciana, la autonomía del Estado español que más dedica a la Sanidad pública, con un 40,3% de sus Presupuestos Generales para 2011, un 0,49% más que el año en curso, "es decir", explica, "que la Sanidad ha sido y seguirá siendo, junto con la educación y los servicios sociales, la prioridad absoluta para este Gobierno".
Frente a los mensajes alarmistas de algunos profesionales y sindicatos, que auguran que aumentarán las listas de espera y se colapsarán los servicios, Fernando Bañolas recuerda que de enero a junio de 2010 se consiguió una reducción del 33,8% de las listas de espera quirúrgicas de larga duración (de más de seis meses), y que en los últimos meses del año se mantiene esa tendencia.
Por último, el consejero se congratula por los datos de la Encuesta de la Salud de Canarias 2009, que arrojan un alto nivel de satisfacción (en torno al 85%) de los usuarios del Servicio Canario de Salud, "lo que demuestra que son sólo algunos, los que precisamente con más responsabilidad deberían actuar en estos momentos, los que nos quieren pintar un panorama tan negro".

description.hltext_display: Vigilance orange pour 20 départements en prévision de nouvelles chutes de neige
description.content:
Vingt départements de la moitié nord de la France, de la Loire-Atlantique aux Ardennes, ont été placés en vigilance orange par Météo France en raison de chutes de neige attendues mercredi en fin de journée.
Par ailleurs, la vigilance orange est décrétée pour la Moselle et le Bas-Rhin en raison de risques de crue.
Les chutes de neige atteindront de 5 à 10 cm sur les départements de l'Ile-de-France, sur l'Aisne (02), les Ardennes (08), l'Eure (27), l'Eure-et-Loir (28), l'Ille-et-Vilaine (35), la Loire-Atlantique (44), le Maine-et-Loire (49), la Mayenne (53), le Morbihan (56), l'Oise (60), l'Orne (61) et la Sarthe (72).
La pluie traversera dans la matinée l'Aquitaine et les Charentes avant de remonter vers le nord où, en butant sur l'air froid, elle se transformera en neige sur le nord des Pays de la Loire et les collines normandes.
"Ces chutes de neige s'étendront en soirée et la nuit suivante au bassin parisien et aux Ardennes et pourraient être précédées d'un peu de verglas", prévient Météo France.
"Cet épisode neigeux débutera vers 18h00 sur le Pays de Loire, 19h00 sur l'Ile-de-France, 20h00 sur la Bretagne, le sud de Normandie et la Picardie", selon les prévisionnistes de Météo France.

description.hltext_display: Aktien Europa Eröffnung: Moderate Gewinne
description.author: dpa-Afx
description.content:
PARIS/LONDON (dpa-AFX) – Die wichtigsten europäischen Börsen haben am Mittwoch an ihre Vortagesgewinne anknüpfen können. Der EuroStoxx 50 rückte um 0,20 Prozent auf 2.882,78 Punkte vor. In London gewann der FTSE 100 minimale 0,01 Prozent auf 5.952,25 Punkte hinzu und für den Cac 40 ging es in Paris um 0,10 Prozent auf 3.931,37 Punkte nach oben.
Versorger, Technologiewerte und Banken gehörten zu den bevorzugten Branchen. Entsprechend standen Werte wie Unicredit und Nokia mit Kursgewinnen von jeweils knapp einem Prozent an der Spitze des pan-europäischen Leitindex. Der Luxusgüterkonzern rückte mit Hermes International
und LVMH
einmal mehr in den Fokus. LVMH hat seinen Anteil an dem Konkurrenten mittlerweile auf mehr als 20 Prozent erhöht. Hermes zogen um 2,78 Prozent auf 161,00 Euro an. LVMH notierten zuletzt unverändert./rum/la

description.hltext_display: In brief: Customs officers seize fake Barbies
description.content:
Thousands of counterfeit Barbie dolls in cargo shipments from Mexico were recently seized by U.S. Customs and Border Protection officers at the Zaragoza Bridge, officials said Tuesday.
CBP officials said the shipments included phony dolls, styling heads and play sets that looked like real Barbie toys by the Mattel company. CBP officers contacted Mattel and determined that the dolls were illegal clones of Barbie.
"The items in questions did not bear the Barbie name or trademark but their overall appearance and packaging was confusingly similar to the genuine item and therefore constituted trademark infringement," Ana Hinojosa, CBP director of field operations in El Paso, said in a statement.
CBP officials said the two shipments were seized Friday and Saturday and had a total worth of more than $30,000 but could be worth 10 times more in retail sales.
Daniel Borunda
Police arrested a woman after she allegedly fled the site of a hit-and-run while drunken driving with her child in the car Tuesday.
Police said Aqueda Valenzuela, 37, was driving a red 1991 Nissan Pathfinder when she struck another vehicle in the 8600 block of Dyer Street about midnight Sunday. They found Valenzuela's car in a parking lot in the 8100 block of Dyer about an hour later, police said.
Police found Valenzuela with a young child inside a nearby business. Investigators allege that she was intoxicated while driving.
Police declined to say how old the
child was, pending a Child Protective Services investigation.
Maggie Ybarra
State investigator among slain males
A Chihuahua state police investigator was one of nine males killed in two attacks Tuesday in Juárez.
The first assault occurred at lunchtime when gunmen fired about 50 rounds at men on a street and inside Tony gorditas shop in colonia Melchor Ocampo, police said.
State investigator Luis Alonso Rojas Garcia, 29, was among the five men slain. Officials said Rojas joined the state prosecutor's office in May 2009. The other victims were Jesus Andres Oreza, Armando Ortiz Luna, Jose Soto Murguia and a man who had not been identified.
The second attack occurred about 1:30 p.m. when shooters with AK-47s killed four people in the garage of a home in colonia Riveras del Bravo. Police identified the dead as Raul Alberto Jimenez Carreon, 16; Luis Daniel Jimenez Carreon, 18; Francisco Perales Bañuelos, 23; and Julio Cesar Barbere Cardenas, 34.
Daniel Borunda
Police ID man killed in motorcycle crash
El Paso police on Tuesday released the name of a man killed Monday afternoon in a motorcycle accident.
Police said Alfonso Ortegon, 50, was riding his 2010 Harley-Davidson north in the 5100 block of Doniphan Drive when Maria Chavez, 47, pulled out of Graphite Drive in front of him in a green Ford Explorer.
Ortegon, of the 2800 block of Penwood Drive, was taken to University Medical Center of El Paso, where he died. He wasn't wearing a helmet, police said.
Police said Chavez, of the 200 block of Cuprite Drive, failed to yield the right of way while turning onto Doniphan. The front of the SUV hit the right side of the motorcycle.
Speed and alcohol were not factors in the collision, police said. The investigation is continuing to determine whether charges will be filed. Chavez and three passengers in the Explorer were not injured.

description.hltext_display: Poker um Hochtief dauert an – ACS derzeit noch weit von 30 Prozent entfernt
description.author: dpa-Afx
description.content:
ESSEN/MADRID (dpa-AFX) – Der Poker um den Essener Baukonzern Hochtief dauert an. Der spanische Konkurrent ACS konnte zwar im Rahmen seines laufenden Übernahmeangebots seinen Anteil seit dem 14. Dezember kaum erhöhen und hält jetzt 27,26 Prozent an Hochtief. Dies war aber auch nicht zu erwarten, nachdem die Spanier in der vergangenen Woche angekündigt hatten, die Offerte erhöhen zu wollen. Zünglein an der Waage spielt weiter der Finanzinvestor Southeastern Asset Managment.
Nachdem ACS angekündigt hatte, das Gebot erhöhen zu wollen, will der drittgrößte Hochtief-Aktionär rund zwei Millionen seiner Anteile an dem deutschen Unternehmen an die Spanier abgeben. Damit würden ACS dem Ziel, mehr als 30 Prozent an Hochtief halten zu wollen, bedeutend näher kommen. Das "Handelsblatt” hatte zudem in der vergangenen Woche berichtet, dass weitere institutionelle Investoren das verbesserte Angebot annehmen wollen.
Der um seine Unabhängigkeit kämpfende Essener Baukonzern hatte seinen Aktionären auch die Ablehnung des verbesserten ACS-Angebots empfohlen. Die Offerte spiegele nicht den Wert von Hochtief wider. ACS hatte seine Offerte an die Hochtief-Aktionäre am 15. Dezember überraschend aufgestockt und bietet jetzt neun statt acht eigene Aktien für fünf Hochtief-Papiere.
Gemessen an aktuellen Börsenkursen bewertet die verbesserte ACS-Offerte eine Hochtief-Aktie mit rund 64,50 Euro. Am Aktienmarkt kostet das Hochtief-Papier zuletzt 64,84 Euro./zb/wiz

description.hltext_display: 티토 오티즈-호제리오 '내년 3월 격돌'
description.content:
'UFC 최고 악동에게 주어진 마지막 기회'오는 2011년 3월 26일 미국 워싱턴 시애틀에서 열리는 'UFN 24'에서 티토 오티즈(35, 미국)와 안토니오 호제리오 노게이라(34, 브라질)가 라이트헤비급 매치를 벌인다. 미국 격투사이트 'MMA정키'는 미국의 스파이크TV에서 무료중계되는 'UFN 24' 대회의 메인이벤트에서 오티즈와 호제리오가 맞붙을 것이라고 보도했다. 이번 대결은 오티즈가 이미 자신의 트위터를 통해 '호제리오가 다음 상대다'라고 글을 올리면서 소문이 무성했다. 아직 정식발표는 되지 않았지만 두 파이터 모두 계약에 동의한 만큼 사실상 확정됐다고 봐도 무방하다. 1997년 'UFC 13'을 통해 종합격투기에 데뷔한 오티즈는 켄 샴락, 비토 벨포트, 반더레이 실바 등의 파이터들을 꺾으며 활약해왔다. 2003년 랜디 커투어에게 패하며 라이트헤비급 챔피언 벨트를 빼앗기기 전까지 5차 방어전을 성공했으며 이는 UFC 라이트헤비급 최다 방어 기록이다.
그러나 최근 오티즈의 성적은 4패 1무로 최악에 가깝다. 2006년 12월 척 리델에게 TKO패 한 이후로 승리가 없다. 지난 10월에는 TUF 시절의 제자인 맷 해밀에게 판정패하며 '퇴출' 위기에 놓였다. 이번 호제리오전은 오티즈에게는 마지막 기회나 다름없다.
반면 호제리오는 형 노게이라보다는 늦게 옥타곤을 밟았지만 종합격투기 전적 19승 4패의 준수한 기록을 갖고 있는 '강자'다. 지난 'UFC 119'에서 무패의 라이언 베이더에게 판정패하기 전까지 7연승을 달리고 있었다. 형에 버금가는 주짓수 실력과 안정된 복싱 스킬이 호제리오의 무기다. 호제리오에게 있어 오티즈는 '반드시 넘어야 할 시험대'다. 최근 기량의 하락세와 단조로운 패턴으로 연패를 거듭하고 있는 오티즈에게 패한다면 타이틀전 기회는 더욱 멀어지게 된다.
이번 경기가 확정되기 전에 데이나 화이트 UFC 대표는 오티즈에 관해 "이번이 마지막 기회일 것"이라고 못 박았다. 이번 경기가 오티즈의 은퇴전이 될 가능성이 더 높은 가운데, '헌팅턴비치 배드보이'가 기사회생할 수 있을지 주목된다.■ 'UFN 24' 예상대진2011년 3월 26일(현지시각) 미국 워싱턴 시애틀 TBA 아레나
라이트헤비급 매치
티토 오티즈 vs. 안토니오 호제리오 노게이라
관련기사
[엠파이트 오픈캐스트 발행] 격투기보다 재미있는 엠파이트 오픈케스트'힘 빠진' 일본 연말이벤트, 이유는 왜?②클릭클릭자카레, 로비 라울러와 '스포 1차 방어전'클릭 '힘 빠진' 일본 연말이벤트, 이유는 왜?①클릭'독설왕' UFC 대표, 4살 여아 수술비 쾌척 '훈훈'클릭키워드 링크
추성훈 /김동현 /표도르 /UFC /K-1 /브록 레스너 /미르코 크로캅 /알리스타 오브레임 /바다 하리 /양동이 /정찬성 /아리아니 셀레스티 /얼티밋수다
[믿을 수 있는 격투기 뉴스, 신세기 격투스포츠의 길라잡이 엠파이트 (www.mfight.co.kr)] 임태운(기자) taewoonlim@gmail.com

description.hltext_display: [문답]하종선 사장 '허각, 음대 안나와 자격박탈..그런 심정'
description.content:
16:53 국내외 빠르고 정확한 투자정보를 한눈에...매일 매일 하루 두번 무료로 만나보세요.
현대상선 40,000 -100 -0.25% 기준일:조회일기준과거70영업일 / 20분지연 [이데일리 안재만 기자] 하종선 현대그룹(현대상선(011200)) 전략기획본부 사장은 채권단의 양해각서(MOU) 해지조치와 관련, "슈퍼스타 K2의 `허각`이 음대를 나오지 않았다고 자격을 박탈당했을 때 어떤 심정이겠느냐? 그와 같은 심정"이라고 억울하다는 입장을 다시 내비쳤다.
현대건설 인수전을 주관해 온 하종선 사장(사진)은 "프랑스 나티시스은행으로부터 받은 1조2000억원의 대출금은 브릿지론이 맞다"고 확인했다.
채권단이 MOU를 해지하면서 제시한 중재안에 대해서는 "현대그룹이 위법한 방안에 공범이 될 수 없다"며 거부의사를 밝혔고, 이번 소송이 현정은 회장의 뜻에 따른 것이라는 점도 분명히 했다.
다음은 현대그룹이 정리해서 보낸 하 사장 인터뷰 전문이다.
- 현대차 측에서 드러나지 않는 대출형태(`쓰리쿠션`으로 표현) 의혹을 제기했는데?
▲쓰리쿠션 한 적 없다. 자산을 담보로 하거나 자산을 활용한 파생상품을 만들거나 한 적 없다는 점을 분명히 밝힌다.
- 소감이 어떠신지?
▲슈퍼스타 K2의 `허각`이 음대를 나오지 않았다고 자격을 박탈당했을 때 어떤 심정이겠느냐? 그와 같은 심정이다.
현 회장님께서 그간 숱한 고난과 역경을 겪어왔다. 이번 어려움도 법원의 공정한 판단으로 극복하고 정주영 회장님, 정몽헌 회장님께서 생전에 가지셨던 유지, 북방사업, 대북사업을 위해 현대건설을 크게 쓰실 그런 날이 올 것이라고 믿는다.
- 법원 심리에서 `짜여진 각본`이라고 했는데 그게 무엇인지?
▲유재한 사장 인터뷰 내용(오늘자 조선일보)에 계획과 의도가 나타나 있다고 생각한다.
- 현대그룹의 인수자금 조달에 문제가 있는 줄 알면서도 MOU까지 맺은 까닭은 뭔가.
"입찰계약서만으론 우선협상대상자 지위를 뺏기가 어려웠기 때문이다. 입찰계약서상에는 자금조달을 문제 삼아서 인수자격을 빼앗을 수 있는 근거가 없었다. 해서 MOU에 `채권단은 합리적인 범위에서 필요한 자료제출을 요구할 수 있고, 현대그룹은 성실히 답변해야 한다`는 조항을 넣은 것이다. 현대그룹이 외환은행과 빨리 MOU를 맺지 않고 버텼으면 오히려 법적으로 현대그룹이 유리할 수 있었다. 현대그룹이 서두르다가 자충수를 둔 것이다."
저희 나름대로 법과 입찰규정에 따라 나티시스 자금 의혹을 해명하기 위해 노력했다. 세 차례에 걸친 확인서를 통해 적법한 자금임을 해명했고 의혹을 확실히 해소했다고 생각한다. 법원의 공정한 판단이 있을 것으로 믿는다.
- 재판장 분위기가 현대그룹에 유리했던 것으로 보인다. 어떻게 생각하는지?
▲변호인이 그간 비공개의무조항 때문에 하지 못했던 말을 속 시원히 얘기했다고 생각한다.
- 대출 경위 밝힐 뜻은 없는지?
▲이미 일찍이 채권단에 공문으로 설명했다. 애초 넥스젠이 투자에 참여하려다가 입찰규정상 다른 컨소시엄 멤버가 인수대금을 못 낼 경우에 대한 연대책임을 부담해야 하는 문제로 넥스젠 투자위원회가 투자를 잠정 보류하게 됐다. 이때 넥스젠이 자신의 100% 모회사인 나티시스에 상황을 잘 설명해 대출이 이루어지게 된 것이다.
언론에도 보도되었고 증권가에서도 말하고 있는 브릿지론과 유사한 대출이 이루어졌던 것이다. 브릿지론은 대형 글로벌 M&A 경우에 일단 브릿지론을 얻은 후 FI나 SI의 협의가 완결되면 대출 대신 투자의 형태로 대체하는 것이 널리 행해지고 있는 프랙티스의 하나다.
`승자의 저주`는 누구보다도 우리가 제일 우려한다. 차입금을 인수대금으로 쓰는 걸 줄이려고 지난번(11.18) 산소(창우동 선영)에서 회장님께서 투자자 접촉을 계속하고 있다고 말씀하신 것이다.
한두 달이면 대금을 완납하는 스케줄인데 그걸 못 기다리고 채권단이 MOU를 해지했다. 채권단이 제시한 SPA(주식매매계약) 조항에도 현대건설의 주식 등을 담보로 안 쓴다는 조항 위배에 대비하여 거액의 현금보증금을 내도록 하게 되어 있다. 이렇듯 안전장치들이 많은데도 불구하고 채권단이 한두 달을 못 기다리고 MOU를 해지한 것은 참으로 부당하다.
- 제 3의 자금이 있는지?
▲넥스젠 등 7개 정도의 투자자가 있다.
- 대출과 유상증자는 별개인가?
▲대출을 받아 놓았지만 FI, SI를 유치해 대체함으로써 대출금을 인수대금에 사용하는 규모를 줄이려는 것이다. 이번 M&A의 특이점은 컨소시엄 멤버 변경에 대해서 채권단의 사전 동의가 필요하다는 것이었다. 다른 M&A에서는 우선협상대상자 선정 이후 FI나 SI를 유치해도 그 추가가 자유로운데 이번 입찰에는 채권단이 현대그룹이 FI나 SI를 추가하려고 해도 동의를 안 해주겠다고 사이드로 말하고 있는 상황이었다.
그래서 현대상선 프랑스법인을 컨소시엄 멤버로 넣은 것도 향후 유치되는 FI, SI가 현대상선 프랑스법인의 유상증자를 통해 인수전에 채권단 동의 없이도 참여하는 방안이었다. 현대상선 프랑스법인을 사실상 SPC(특수목적법인)로 활용하는 방안을 처음부터 추진 중이었다.
예전(창우동 선영에서)에도 말했듯이, 하고 싶은 말이 많았지만 비공개의무 입찰규정 때문에 이런 내용들은 SPA 체결 이후 밝히려 했던 것이다.
- 추가 소송 계획은?
▲24일 오후 2시 심리를 보고나서 결정하겠다.
- 채권단 중재안에 대한 생각?
▲현대건설 이사회, 소액주주, 주요주주를 무시하는 법 위에 있는 것과 같은 제안이라고 생각한다. 현대그룹은 그런 위법한 방안에 공범이 될 수 없다.
- 이런 소송 진행이 회장님의 뜻인지?
▲그렇다.
- 추가 국내투자자 있는지?
▲동양종금증권 외에는 없다.
XML

description.hltext_display: Dangdang to diversify from books, plans expansion
description.content:
HONG KONG (Reuters) Online retailer Dangdang Inc, considered as China's answer to Amazon.com, aims for sales of general merchandise to exceed that of books and other media as it diversifies in the highly competitive e-commerce sector.
Media products, including books and DVDs, make up about 84 percent of Dangdang's sales, with the remainder from other consumer products such as cosmetics, furniture, shoes and toys. "There is no doubt that sales from general merchandise are going to rise faster than books, and will eventually exceed books," co-founder and Chairwoman Peggy Yu told Reuters via telephone in Beijing on Wednesday.
Yu also said the company had no plans to tap overseas markets, but would focus on China, where its 1.3 billion population is becoming increasingly affluent on the back of strong economic growth. "It's hard to find another massive market like China where there is one language and a common consumer culture, apart from the United States in the 50s and 60s," she said. "If we can serve mainland customers really well, our business will have many years of development." Dangdang shares have fallen by almost 30 percent since hitting a closing high of $32.79 days after its trading debut on December 8, as concern over its competitiveness in China's highly fragmented e-commerce sector.
(Reporting by Huang Yuntao and Lee Chyen Yee; Editing by Chris Lewis)
